description: Download the #1, most comprehensive and highest rated Indian stock app for BSE/NSE on Android. Keeping tabs on the global economy means keeping tabs on the Indian economy. This app gives you the tools to follow India's biggest and most important stock exchanges, the BSE and the NSE. Stock Watch offers the latest Indian stock market news, NSE futures and options, equity futures and options, BSE/NSE intraday charts, and Indian company stock quotes. Keep track of your stock portfolio with a stocks watch list. The business/finance world is changing fast, especially in India. With Stock Watch, you're assured of staying on top of events as they happen. Live Stock Quote (2-5 min delayed): Live feeds ensure the fastest quotes! Stay on top of the Nifty and Sensex with intraday charts and tallies of daily gainers and losers in Indian markets. Stock tips: Get Indian stock tips from market experts Analyst Corner: Track leading fund houses and their analyst views on a specific stock. Get current view and change in their recommendations over a 90 day period. Get a consensus view on the stock. Stock Search: On device Search-Suggest feature. Saves you the effort to type out entire company name and helps find stocks faster Futures & Options: Check developments in equity and index derivatives. Stocks Watchlist: Keep a close watch on stocks most critical to you! Update by the tick. Latest and fastest refresh cycles. Sort by Name, Price, Change and % change. Finance/Business News: Get the most relevant news that make the market across ALL business sources. Check news on Indian markets and stocks, updated regularly Global Indices: Get a snapshot of leading global indices in one place. Price feed provided by www.bseindia.com/ www.nseindia.com and value addition by C-MOTS INFOTECH Do you need help? Have a suggestion or want to discuss something with the team! We would love to hear from you. Send us a mail on snapworktechnologies@gmail.com or add us on Gtalk.
release_text: Stock Widget Infographics in Expert Commentary SGX Nifty BankNifty F&O/ CNXIT F&O/ NFTYMCAP50 F&O Font changes for enhanced readability Share news and expert commentary through sms/email Move to SD card Optimized battery consumption Forex: Exchange rate of Rupee vs leading currencies Stock specific analyst recommendations Expert views on specific stocks Enhanced Watchlist: Sorting facility Company Announcements Optimized Stock Quotes and WatchList Registration Fix Notification Color Change

description: The Auto-Rotate Widget allows you to toggle the auto-rotate screen settings on and off quickly and easily! The Auto-Rotate Widget is free and its design integrates seamlessly with the Android look and feel. Please consider getting the donate version if you like the Auto-Rotate Widget and want to support its developers. We would really appreciate it! If the widget doesn't show up in the widget list after installation, please try restarting your device. Please have in mind that in order to work, widgets cannot be installed on the SD Card. After installation, the widget needs to be added to the home screen: Tap the Launcher, select Wigets, tap and hold the Auto-Rotate Widget and drop it to a free slot on the home screen. On earlier versions of Android: Tap and hold a free slot on the home screen, select Widgets, tap the Auto-Rotate Widget. Ratings and comments are highly appreciated. If you have any issues with this widget, please don't hesitate to contact us. Keywords: widget lock screen auto switch control automatic landscape portrait toggle rotate rotation orientation settings
release_text: Design improved for recent versions of Android Design improved for early versions of Android Bug fixes for early versions of Android.

description: Travel Bangkok, Thailand: illustrated guide, phrasebook, and maps. (Mobi Travel) MobileReference guides help you get the most out of your vacation. The guides are available for most destinations worldwide and always include FREE offline GPS maps. Over 3 million MobileReference Travel Guides have been downloaded. The world’s most popular electronic guides developed for your smartphone have the following features: ✔ GPS map loads to your smartphone memory - no network access needed once the app is downloaded. ✔ GPS map displays your location along with nearby sights and attractions. ✔ MobileReference guides use vector-based maps so they load quickly and are easy to zoom and scroll. ✔ Unlike other travel guides, GPS coordinates for attractions have been verified by users on the ground. ✔ Attraction articles can be accessed from both an alphabetical and a categorical index. ✔ Top 10 attractions article features sights that no visitor should miss. ✔ Articles include tips on what to do and see in your destination. ✔ Articles can be added to a list of favorites. ✔ Phrasebooks include list of common words and phrases. ✔ The top restaurants have been individually selected by MobileReference editors. These restaurants are marked by a star in the EAT chapter and are plotted on the GPS map. ✔ No ads ✔ No roaming charges MobileReference Travel Guides provide detailed, practical information about attractions, landmarks, transportation, cultural venues, dining, lodging, history and much more. They are indexed alphabetically and by category, making it easier to access individual articles. Attractions can be viewed on an offline GPS map along with your current location so that you can easily find attractions near you as you explore the city. This fully-functional guide is absolutely free. The full version (only $4.99) adds Text-To-Speech and expands articles with more information about attractions, history, culture, itineraries, phrasebooks and more. Listen to complete articles on the go with Text-To-Speech: double-tap on a word to start Text-To-Speech from the selected word or select Menu > Start Text-To-Speech. TABLE OF CONTENTS: Essentials: Phrasebook | Eat | Drink | Sleep | Respect | Cope | Contact | Stay Safe | Units Conversion 1. General: Name | History | Geography | Climate | Economy & Demographics | Administration | Orientation 2. Maps: Thailand | Bangkok | Districts | BTS, MRT & ARL | Saen Saep | Chao Phraya | Railway | Ayutthaya | Chao Phraya River | Rattanakosin | Thonburi 3. Transport: Get in | Get around | Metro | Boats | Skytrain | Railway 4. Attractions: Top 10 | Itinerary | Do | Buy | Markets | Palaces | Buildings & Structures | Places of Worship | Parks & Gardens 5. Culture: Museums | Cultural venues | Emerald Buddha | Sports 6. By Area: Districts | Streets & Squares | Get out 7. Thailand: Do | History | Culture -MobileReference®. Free maps for worldwide destinations™.
release_text: ✔ Tourist information and content update ✔ Improved map functionality (with Points of Interest filter & directional compass) ✔ New restaurant listings ✔ Improved handling of different screen sizes and rotations ✔ New and improved user-friendly design

description: Too much chatter in your classroom? Tired of telling classes to reduce their noise level? Then download the Quiet Classroom App. Select your own noise level and microphone sensitivity, which will be stored in the memory for your convenience and ‘start listening’. Once the noise rises above your chosen level an alarm of your choice will sound, signalling to the children that they need to reduce their sound level. The absence of a visual indicator prevents students becoming distracted during independent task work. Features: • Simple ‘start’ and ‘stop’ listening buttons. • Scale to choose your own sound level which the app automatically saves. • Choice of alarm sounds. • Microphone sensitivity level. How To Use: Quiet Classroom has been designed to be simple to use, simply move the slider to your chosen volume level, and click the microphone icon to start listening for noise. At the end of your lesson simply click the stop button to stop listening. Due to the wide range of Android capable products Quiet Classroom is designed to be configurable to your particular device. For instance, you can control the sensitivity of the microphone in the settings page, and your sensitivity level will be saved. There are also a choice of three different warning sounds which may be previewed on the settings page. If you'd like to trial the app first there is a free version available here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.eduapp.quietclasstrial

description: Improve your cross country riding with the Course Walk app. Designed specifically for Eventers by Eventers. This app is a useful tool for amateurs and professionals alike. Course Walk uses GPS technology to record and display your cross country course. This app will help you prepare for your course by: • Recording the course track and distance in meters • Identifying minute markers - NEVER wheel your course again and improve your ability to meet optimum time! • Take photos of fences and mark the location of compulsory flags • Fence and photo galleries for easy viewing of the pictures • Play function retraces the entire course, displaying the fences as you go • Share your course on MyCourseWalk.Com • Download courses from MyCourseWalk.Com onto your phone. • Event Organizers can print course maps off of MyCourseWalk.com • Conveniently links to Eventing Dressage tests and Live Scoring • Auto correction of minute marker position if optimal time is given • Elevation profile displays the terrain along the course with minute markers and fences • Uphill, flat, and downhill slopes can be shown in different colors on the map • No cellphone reception or data connection required to record and view course walks Organizer & Course Designer Features (MyCourseWalk.com): • Print crosscountry and show jumping course maps for your shows • Make last minute edits to the track and fence positions • Add/Edit fence descriptions • Add/Replace fence pictures • Share course maps with your competitors • Fence list with distances and time IMPORTANT: If CourseWalk is unstable, please disable the "Hardware Acceleration" in the app settings. Contact us if you have any suggestions on how to make the app better!
release_text: Version 3.0.4: - Bug fixes Version 3.0.1: - Complete redesign - Optimized tablet layout - Ability to record show jumping courses - Use pictures from phone gallery - Add/replace pictures from downloaded courses - Vertical profile with average grade between minute markers - Ability to download/share your courses and edit in app

description: Along the twists and turns of the climb, get ready for a hill driving challenge! You get to drive transporting trucks on hills loaded with goods as you race to get them to the destination. The hill driving can be exciting and adventurous as you have to maneuver and drive the heavy truck along hills and dangerous paths. Watch out for bumps and sharp turns as they can make the load fall off the trailer. Hill driving with loaded trucks is the most challenging driving adventure! Learn how to be a great driver as you race against time to the warehouse uphill. This could be the hardest driving challenge ever as the heavy load, massive trucks and climbing a steep hill can get the best of you. CAUTION: Don’t drop the load or you’ll destroy the goods and fail the level. Hill Climb Driver 3D features include: • 3 transporter trucks for you to drive uphill • 30 exciting and adventurous hill tracks for you to enjoy • Completely free and smooth gameplay • Real 3D graphics and hillside environment for hill climbing If you enjoy 4x4 driving then we are sure you would love to drive this 4x4 truck on hillside track. Stay tuned for next titles since this is just beginning for 4x4 driving experience. Guys show your support by leaving a positive review. Don't forget to like us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/Tapinator

description: Talking Goggles can recognize images and speaks out what it finds. - Recognizes almost any image within seconds. Logos, landmarks, books, products, artwork, text and more.. - Shows the description of the image and speaks it out to you. - Speaks it out using the correct accent of your selected language. - Includes a torchlight to assist in reading. - Video mode. Talking Goggles will continuously check the video stream for any familiar images, and will present it and speak it out when it finds something. - Easy copy function. Use goggles as a scanner/translator and use the results in any other application. - Look up more details on the image found by doing a direct search. Or, if it is a product, check where it is available nearby, and show a price comparison. Don't know the name of that actor on that poster? Just point your camera at it and Talking Goggles will tell you! Want to find out if that product is really the cheapest around? Take a picture and let Talking Goggles do a comparison for you. Point Talking Goggles at a logo, and you will be told the name of the company after which you can do a search for it. Talking Goggles is particularly good at recognizing book covers and posters. Try it out! Talking Goggles gives you amazing possibilities. We are constantly improving the app further, please contact us on support@sparklingapps.com for any comments or suggestions.

description: The Killer Whale Spyhop Sticker is a beautiful way to decorate your homescreen. Stickers (sometimes also referred to as magnets) are nice widgets to place images on your background. You will receive all three sizes by downloading. HOW TO INSTALL Please remember that this is a widget, not a normal app. It will not show in the app drawer. In order to place it on the home screen, tap and hold an empty space on the home screen and select widgets. The sticker (or magnet) will be in the widget list, select it in order to place it. The widget menu is often also located in the personalization menu. Can’t find your ultimate sticker or magnet in the market yet? Do you have any other comments or ideas? Please contact us at info@orcraphics.biz . Please also report bugs and issues here. We will try to fix it immediately. description: Business battle with smart AI. Qualified addictive and exciting game. "MONEYPOLY" is a fusion of the card-battle game and the board game(like the Monopoly). You can enjoy the thrill of the card-battle game and the addictiveness of the board game simultaneously. You'll walk on the way for the master of restaurant business. Work proceeds by your dice. Roll the dice and make corresponding moves. In the land you arrive, a special event will happen. You should make your store in as many lands as possible.(Board game) At a store of yours, you can collect money. But at enemy's store, you must pay a toll. There are various cards(chance card and franchise card). Those cards help your business. You must use cards effectively to win the game. It is similar to the magic card of the trading card game. It is a very important fact which makes this game exciting. Anyway do your best to earn the goal money earlier or bankrup your rival. The rule of this game isn't difficult. Just choose what you want as the flow. You can try the donut business game in the Arcade mode separately. Never miss this game, if you want a creative and substantial entertainment. Easy and addictive the 'MONEYPOLY' will keep your adrenaline going.

description: Spanish Baby Flash Cards now available for Android! Categories include: Food items, Animals, Alphabet, Transportation, Numbers, Colors & Shapes, Clothing, Household items, Body Parts, Outdoor items, Music Instruments/Arts & Learning. ★ Over 450 words! ★ 12 Categories - All in 1 App! ★ Kids tested - they love it! Parents tested - they love it! ★ Building vocabulary has never been so much fun ★ Large words and letters ★ Large icons and buttons ★ Professional voice overs recorded in production studio ★ High quality images ★ Real sounds where applicable ★ Question mode for parent-child interaction ★ Great memory building exercise Building strong Spanish vocabulary has never been so exciting for preschoolers and toddlers. eFlash Educational Baby Flash Cards in Spanish features over 450 high quality images with text and voice overs. There are additional real sounds where applicable (such as a lion's roar or an ambulance siren) to enhance visual and auditory learning and memory simultaneously. Parents have the option to turn voice overs off during parent-child learning session and turn voice overs on when the child is self-learning. They can enable Question Mode to display 4 images and ask the child to click on the right answer. Complexity of words is perfect for ages 1 to 4 so two or more young siblings can play together and even teach each other!

description: We change lives! BodySpace is a revolutionary social fitness platform. It’s the best personal trainer combined with the world’s largest online fitness community. It’s a complete system of innovative workout tools, cutting-edge trackers, fresh content, and social features designed to help you become your best self. The best fitness app, BodySpace is the bridge between dream and do. It’s your ongoing transformation station. Pick a training program that is perfect for you: • Choose from one of dozens of BodySpace programs built by PhD's, Professional Trainers and Athletes such as Jim Stoppani, Kris Gethin, Jamie Eason, Ashley Conrad, Lee Labrada and many more. • Choose from one of our thousands of top rated Community built programs. • Choose the program that is perfect for you based on your goal, experience level, gender, age, duration or number of workouts per week. • Apply the training program to your BodyCalendar and get a daily to-do list with reminders. Not ready for a full training program? No problem...start by simply finding the perfect workout: • Choose from thousands of workouts created by BodySpace and our Community. • Locate your workout by goal, experience level, gender, age, duration, cardio and muscles targeted. Explore the thousands of exercises in BodySpace: • Find the perfect exercise based on exercise type, muscle group and equipment. • Watch the instructional video or read through the step-by-step instructions. • Sort the exercises by our Community ratings. Fitness Tracker: • Track all the details of your workouts with exercise tips, videos, previous stats, rest-timers and more. • Watch as your workout stats (weight lifted and cardio times) hit millions of pounds and hundreds of hours. Ready to add supplements to your transformation? • Shop Bodybuilding.com's massive selection of top brands directly from BodySpace. Looking for others to help you meet your health and fitness goals? • Ability to manage your BodySpace friends & followers. • BodySpace news feeds from your friends & followers.

description: Fully Configurable & customizable trip checklist/planner with everything you need for any trip. Save time typing the list as it comes pre-populated with a comprehensive list. This app is all you need to ensure you don't forget anything before your travel. With options to add/edit/delete/copy/move/rearrange/sort/export and duplicate you can quickly customize the list anyway you want. Check/uncheck and reuse everytime you go on trips. Easy and very intuitive thumb friendly check/uncheck options. With ability to create multiple lists - you can easily create lists for different types of trips. Customize it to your preference. UNLIMITED lists are supported. PLEASE NOTE: All the features listed in the description are INCLUDED with the purchase. The in-app purchase option is used only if you want to purchase additional templates (in addition to trip list). The app does NOT need internet connection. Your privacy is guaranteed. We back our app with 100% refund ANYTIME beyond the refund window. If you are not satisfied for any reason, just send us an email. New Features! - Tablet support. Quick navigation - just swipe right to reveal the left pane. "Quick add" features. You can add notes, quantity and an additional measurement. Auto sort ability. Checkout more features below. Features include: - Tablet support. - Quick navigation. For small screen devices, just swipe right to reveal the left pane. - Create new lists from factory templates in minutes. - Add/Edit or delete lists/items/categories. - Quickly add item or category from the same screen with the "Quick Add" feature. - Add Notes, Quantity and an additional measurement (weight/volume/temperature etc) for each item. - Hide/Unhide checked items, move checked to bottom/top. - Ability to delete all checked items. - "Add After This" or "Add Before This" option to insert items wherever you want and quickly. - Password protect from prying eyes. - Option to check all/uncheck all so you can reuse the list again. - Copy or Move between lists, categories and items. Quickly creates your own personal list in matter of minutes. - Auto Sort either in ascending or descending order. - Rearrange items/categories/lists using drag/drop. - Indicates the total number of items and the number of items that need to be completed. - Color coded (green, yellow and red) for a visually appealing presentation - Export/Backup all lists to external storage and import them back when needed. - Edit your list on your computer and import it back. - Easily email with your friends / family using any sharing client you have on your device. - Send and share via Bluetooth to any bluetooth enabled device - Easily send to your printer (via email - Needs email to print support on your printer)
release_text: - Option to purchase more templates. - Tablet support. Swipe right to reveal left pane. - Action Bar for all menu options. - Auto Sort options. - Drag/Drop for rearranging. - Quick Add feature. - Add Notes, Quantity and addt'l measurement for each item. - Multiple Checked item options - Move items to bottom/top, show all, hide checked - Delete All checked items.

description: Word Breaker has now been updated to include screenshot support for New Words With Friends! Word Breaker, the go-to favorite word game solver on Android, is now better than ever! Read on to discover the massive improvements and additions we’ve made: Word Breaker is the ultimate Scrabble cheat when you’re stuck! Word Breaker fully supports, including importing screenshots, from the following games: Words with Friends (including New Words With Friends (WWF2) Beta), EA Scrabble (North American & International), and Wordfeud. We also provide support for the following games, but without screenshot importing: Aworded (Angry Words), Classic Words Solo, Wordsmith, and Words by Post. TOP FEATURES: - Lightning fast! - Honest! We give you *all* of the results. We will never hide the best scoring words from you. - Board Solver Mode maximizes your score by calculating the other words in play! - Screenshot Importing reads your game directly into Board Solver! Incredibly easy to use, just snap and go! (See list of supported games above.) - Our original and still ground-breaking Ghost Mode allows you to peek at the game underneath! - Local dictionary! Why should you have to always be online to use other cheats? Download your favorite dictionaries and take them on the road! Also, like everything else, dictionaries are free! - Track what’s left in the bag! Our exclusive “Remaining Tiles” screen helps you predict what letters you’ll get next! - Supports wildcards and blank tiles! Even better, you can easily tell word breaker what location and patterns to look for. - Highly customizable, including filters for word length! - Available is SEVEN languages, including English, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Spanish, and Portuguese! Aside from its ability to build words, Word Breaker is also a learning and optimization tool. Learn to strategize using the Board Solver, discover how to get multiple crosswords in a single play, and always have an idea of what tiles have yet to be played. You can also use it to solve everyday problems, puzzles, and anagrams. Word Breaker has even been used in the classroom to teach English - something we think is just amazing! Word Breaker FULL has no advertisements whatsoever. Additionally, users of Word Breaker FULL gain early access to all the cool new features, improvements, and language updates we regularly deliver. This is a thank you for supporting what we do. ----- TIPS AND TRICKS: ★ Having trouble with Ghost Mode? Try this: Install the utility app "Auto Memory Manager" (https://market.android.com/details?id=com.lim.android.automemman&hl=en), and make the following changes: 1) Selected the "Mild" settings. 2) Increase the "Hidden Application" setting to 10MB. 3) Power cycle your phone. Note: Firecracker Software LLC is not associated with the Auto Memory Manager app in any way. ★ How to take a screenshot: - Press and hold “Volume Down” and “Power” for one full second. - On certain phones, this combination is “Home” and “Power.” - Very old phones running Android 2.x cannot take screenshots without the help of a 3rd-party app. ★ Having trouble with Screenshot Importing? 1) Completely zoom out before taking a screenshot. This way, the whole board is visible and Word Breaker can properly scan every tile. 2) Make sure all of your playable tiles are on the tile rack, not on the game board. This ensures the results you get are valid. 3) Make sure nothing is obscuring the game. Facebook Chat Heads, app trays, and notification pop-ups can all interfere with Word Breaker. ★ Is a suggested word not accepted by your favorite word game? Check what dictionary you’re using against our recommendations below: WWF: ENABLE Angry Words: ENABLE EA Scrabble: TWL Wordfeud: TWL Wordsmith: ENABLE Words By Post: TWL Classic Words Solo: SOWPODS This app is in no way associated with Zynga, Inc, makers of the popular game Words With Friends.

description: AIMP for Andorid is light mobile version of AIMP audio player for Android OS. Please, report about all bugs into our forum: http://www.aimp.ru/forum/index.php?board=141.0 or write mail to support. Current version contains: + Supported formats: *.ape; *.mpga; *.mp3; *.wav; *.ogg; *.umx; *.mod; *.mo3; *.it; *.s3m; *.mtm; *.xm; *.aac; *.flac; *.mp4; *.m4a; *.m4b; *.mpc; *.wv; *.opus; + CUE Sheet support + 8-band equalizer + Automatic detection of data encoding in tags + Album Art supports (from tags / from file folder) + An ability to repeat playlist / track / playback without repeating + An ability to play music from File Managers + An ability to control playback from notification area (for Android v3.0 and newer) + An ability to control playback via Headset + An ability to group files by template + An ability to sort files by template / manually + An ability to search files in filtering mode + An ability to delete files physically + An ability to load files from selected folder + An ability to quick add all music from all SD-cards + An ability to play files from the File Manager applications + Integration with standard lock screen (for Android v4.0 and newer) + Widget for the desktop + Widget for the lock screen (for Android v4.2 and newer)
release_text: * Common: the hungarian, slovak, swedish and tatar localizations have been added * Common: BASS libraries were updated to latest versions * Player: Playback quality have been improved for tracker music - Fixed: Common - text encoding detects incorrectly in some cases - Fixed: Player - an error occurs in some cases when trying to send data to the Simple Last.fm Scrobbler

You can hear everything that interests you (biographies, stand-up comedy, musings, mystery, science, marketing, ...), while driving, traveling by subway, or go jogging. And totally free. Features - Compatibility with Chromecast. also iVoox on your TV - Single Application Audio suggests you based on your tastes and what you hear - Play in real time over 3G and WiFi, can also be downloaded for offline listening - The playback position of the discharge is maintained even change audio - You can save your audio to listen to later interest - Automatically synchronizes with your web profile iVoox.com - Maintained gratuia Application with advertising. For more information on how to remove ads iVoox.com visit. - Single: Brand audios that interest you, and send them with 1 single click to the playlist - Controls the lock screen - Subscription Management The requested permissions are for the management of incoming calls while the audio is playing, so you can stop it. ** If you have any problems with the application, write us through the feedback option or info@ivoox.com **

description: An application that optimizes the daily collection of information has finally been launched! We have achieved the number one spot for Popular and New and News and Magazines (Paid)! http://myfeetr.com 　 I want a more efficient way to read only the news I need. I just want to collect the information that is relevant to me. Have you ever felt like this? We understand that your time is precious and you do not wish to spend it checking the news. Now we have some good news for you! With the RSS reader Feetr you will be amazed at how easily and efficiently you can gather information. All you need to do is set up filters to pick out information that you are interested in! The application will automatically collect the right information and remove any unnecessary noise to provide you with just the relevant articles. This filter functionality allows you to sift through the articles provided by your configured RSS feeds. It removes any news that does not match your set keywords! I do not want to read articles that have been retweeted more than 100 times on Twitter! This application is also perfect for this case. It cleans up the large amounts of information coming from all your RSS feeds by removing all the noise! Please pay closer attention to this level of freedom! For example, it can also be used in the following ways: ・When you want to receive RSS feeds of all the personal blogs of famous celebrities but only want to read the travel articles. ・When you want to configure the application to receive articles on gourmet cuisine for western food, Chinese food, and Japanese food, but only want to read about the dishes that contain sesame seeds. ・When you want to catch the latest news about people you are interested in by creating an RSS feed for notifications from Twitter, Facebook, mixi, google and other SNSs. ・When you want to create an RSS feed to send you periodic Google search results so you can analyze changes in the data. With this application you can do all this, and more. Easily configure the application to receive the news that you are interested in and customize filters in whichever way you want! You can use it in an infinite number of ways! "It looks like too much hard work; I couldn't possibly do that!" If this is how you feel, then please do not worry. The application already has many articles from already configured feeds. And you can add more from your device. "I’m using an RSS reader but I’ve configured so many feeds that I always end up with many articles that I don’t want to read so I’m fed up." "Even if I do read some news, I just keep pressing the ‘Mark all as read’ button." If you feel this way, we would very much like you to use this curation application that will optimize the information just for you! This is what an application that can collect and optimize news articles looks like! Example Uses ・Collect information from RSS fees such as news sites, blogs, and more. ・Configure the URL of services that deliver search results such as Amazon, Google, or Yahoo Auctions! 　The search results are updated immediately, and you can also apply a filter before analyzing those results. ・Configure the URL of services that deliver updates from Twitter, Facebook, mixi, and more. 　Check out each others' movements to arrange appointments and give presents more efficiently. Use your own ideas to use the application in many other different ways! Even just thinking of new ways to use it can be lots of fun. Application Details ・This application is an RSS reader. ・Apply a filter to the collected articles to optimize the content just as you like it. ・Compatible with RSS searches. This application provides functionality to easily add new sites that deliver content. ・Uses a proprietary engine that allows you to add filters and RSS feeds easily and seamlessly. ・Also supports non-Japanese sites.
release_text: 1.0.0 first

description: This is a mobile app for locating LPG stations around Europe. There are two features at the moment: - See all LPG stations in a country on a map (needs to be online to see the map) - A list of LPG stations closest to your current location (needs GPS coordinates). Please send an e-mail to info@myLPG.eu if you have any suggestions, problems or if you just want to say hi. Bare in mind, that this app is still in beta. Features: - over 28.600 LPG stations - 39 countries - nearest stations - an interactive map for each country - more to come... Station info window now shows also the coordinates. If you click on the info window one more time, the coordinates (latitude and longitude) will be saved to clipboard (you can paste it in your favorite navigational app). It is possible in a limitated way to save the map for offline usage, but please test it before you need it on the road.
release_text: Updated the LPG station database - February 23 2015. Slightly different design.

description: When a little blue Dragon called Bluppy found that his girlfriend was kidnapped by the aliens, the little dragon sets out a long journey to rescue his true love. Can the dragon prevail in one of Android's best games and save his girlfriend? His fate's in your hands! Dragon Rush Pro is an incredibly addicting action game where you launch your dragon off rockets and roll it at high speed through a challenging trail that is filled with random obstacles. You need to guide the dragon to collect the coins to keep or boost the speed. How to Play: Tilt to steer the dragon through obstacles. Tap anywhere on the screen to jump. Collect the coins to keep and boost the speed of the dragon. Game Features: - Five uniquely designed maps - Beautiful enhanced graphics - Online and offline leader board - Two adorable dragon characters, Bluppy and Winnie (need to unlock)
release_text: Fixed some minor bugs. Thanks for your love of our game!

description: Prenatal Lullabies offers a variety of tender and soothing music that helps stimulate the auditory nerve functioning and enhance brain development of a fetus. Specially designed and highly recommended by obstetricians and researchers, Prenatal Lullabies utilizes leisure music with slow tempo resembling mothers' own heart beats when they are at rest. Mozart's piano sonatas are also included, well recognized as a solid assistant in fetus brain development. Benefits brought by Prenatal Lullabies: When listening to music, a mother-to-be is actually sharing a peaceful moment with her unborn baby who is also listening. Prenatal music is good for fetus brain development by promoting right brain functions and stimulating creative cells activity. A state at relaxation is most suitable for a fetus to grow soundly. Totally relaxing with the music helps a mother-to-be staying at a peaceful mood; it also helps the unborn baby to cultivate an artistic temperament much earlier. description: ‘Visage Lab’ is a professional beauty laboratory for your facial photos. Remove pimples and wrinkles, outline the eyes and whiten the teeth in seconds, with all operations made automatically! FEATURES AT A GLANCE: * Fully automatic face retouch * Skin makeup (skin smoothing, including removal of face shine, imperfections and wrinkles) * Eye makeup * Red eye removal * Teeth whitening * Color enhancement * In case there are several faces in a photo, all of them get enhanced! * 40+ awesome artistic effects * Easy sharing and saving WHAT IF... Would you like me to hide those horrible Pimples and Spots and smooth the Wrinkles? - asked the Concealer. I'd love to get rid of them and look younger! - exclaimed the Skin. Then the eyes need to be enhanced as well: we'll outline them and define the eyelashes. – said the Eye Liner and the Mascara. To add a final touch, let me whiten your teeth! – said the Whitening Toothpaste. Now you are ready for a photo shoot! - they said in chorus. BACK TO REALITY Of course, cosmetic products cannot speak ;) But there is magic of another sort! Discover ‘Visage Lab’ app that will enhance a face in a photo with the wave of a magic wand! Just select a portrait photo from the Gallery or make a shot with the camera and let the app do the rest. ‘Visage Lab’ applies eye and skin makeup, removes wrinkles and oily glare, whitens the teeth and performs smart color correction in seconds. Besides, it automatically removes red eye, if necessary. You don't have to learn to use complicated software like Photoshop to retouch your photos! WHAT'S MORE? After automatic enhancement has been performed, you can compare the before and after photos to evaluate the changes. Meticulous users can tweak the settings (exclude some options they think unnecessary). What's more, you can apply impressive artistic effects and backgrounds to your retouched photos to make them look more appealing. There are plenty of retro and aged photography effects, exotic backgrounds, lighting effects and color filters. It's almost unimaginable how these filters and effects can beautify your portrait! Finally, share your enhanced photos with the world via Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or Pinterest. You can also e-mail the result or save it to the Gallery. P.S. If everybody enhanced their portraits with ‘Visage Lab’, how beautiful the web world could be!

description: Welcome to our collection of traffic apps for the UK road network. We aim to deliver a traffic app that will help you keep up-to-date on the latest traffic incidents from the major roads across the UK. Whether this is a specific road or a collection of roads you want to check, our traffic apps will help you avoid traffic en-route to your destination. The UK Traffic News app is an incredibly useful tool featuring the latest updates on traffic from across the UK. Whether there is a disruptive road/lane closure; an accident; congestion or any other incident for that matter, you will find the latest updates here. This is a must-have app for anyone who travels and is perfect for accessing prior to you leaving your location, in order to help ensure you avoid any problems en-route. What you get: • Latest (Traffic updates via RSS) • Twitter (Traffic updates via Twitter) • Share (Help spread the word!) • Map (Live updates via Google Maps utilising the 'Traffic Layer' to highlight traffic flow using a highlighted line)* • Push History (Instant message history from the developers) • Feedback (Send your feedback to the developers) • Mailing List (Sign up to our mailing list) • Appdesigned4u (Link to our website) * Map (Traffic colours) Google Maps will either show current colour-coded traffic conditions on roads where data is available or display a message that data is unavailable. Please note that you may need to apply the 'Traffic' layer within Google Maps to enable this feature. This is easily achievable by simply selecting the 'Settings' feature and clicking on 'Traffic'. Important Information: For obvious safety reasons, please refrain from using this app whilst in the control of a vehicle. This is understandably for your own safety and the safety of others. Please note that this app requires the use of a stable connection to the internet to update the various in-app features. We have made every effort to ensure the in-app features apply to the specific road/s in question. However, from time to time there may be other unrelated information included. All of the traffic feeds in this app are reliant on the various sources keeping these up-to-date. Please understand that we have no control over this and we simply can only advise our users to try the in-app feature at a later date/time to see if the applicable feature has been updated. Please understand that this app utilises various advertising in the form of banners and various page links to external sites. Although many of the adverts are not related to the app itself, they have been included to help support the ongoing development of the app. Please view our other related apps in the app store (if available) that do not include any advertisements, and may instead include extra features! There will typically be a small extra charge for an ad-free higher specification version. If you do experience any issues with this app, please contact us using the 'Feedback' facility in the app rather than leaving us a negative star rating and/or review. We will always try to endeavour to fix a problem in the app for the benefit of all of our users. Finally, if you do like our app, please be so kind to leave us a high star rating and a review. We greatly appreciate your support! Disclaimer: This app is in no way associated to any of transport organisations used in this app in the UK or beyond. All of the feeds included are the property of their respectful owners, and this app simply serves the purpose of directing the user to that specific source. The RSS traffic feeds utilised are provided by the Highways Agency ( http://www.highways.gov.uk ) and are freely available to use for commercial purposes.
release_text: What's new in this version: * Bug fixes

description: Ski Buddy is not your typical "ski tracker" app that gives your ski statistics at the end of the day, after the fact. Instead, Ski Buddy gives your ski statistics in real time as you ski by speaking over your earphones. Your speed, altitude, distance traveled, and time of day are spoken at user selected intervals. In addition, a unique "ski mode" gives statistics for each run as it is completed. When you get off the lift at the top and start skiing down, you will hear "Starting new run". Ski Buddy will record your top speed, average speed, distance, vertical, and duration as you ski down the run. When you get on the lift at the bottom and start back up, a run report will automatically be spoken. Run reports can also be sent to your Android Wear watch. When you get off the lift at the top again and start back down, the process will repeat. Run statistics are saved as is the track for the run. At any time, you can review the statistics for your runs as well as view the track of the run on a map. Ski Buddy is truly a new kind of ski app that gives your ski statistics in real time as you ski. Plus Features: - Expanded reporting in Ski Mode. Top speed, average speed, vertical drop, distance traveled and duration are reported for each run. Both spoken reports and notifications to Android Wear include these statistics. - A Ski Statistics display provides viewing of cumulative values for duration, distance and vertical, and overall top speed and average speed across all runs. In addition this display allows viewing of the stats for each individual run. - Runs can be viewed on Google Maps which shows ski lifts and runs for many resorts. Markers show the locations of the run start, top speed, and finish. Pan and zoom are supported, as are normal, satellite, hybrid, and terrain views. - Screen colors can be customized to your liking. - Option to Suppress Repeats. When this option is set, speed and altitude values will not be spoken if they are the same as the previously spoken value. - Application audio is automatically muted during incoming phone calls. - If music is playing, it will be paused while the app speaks. - Option to calculate altitude from barometric pressure instead of GPS.
release_text: - Added support for Android Wear - Run reports can be sent to your Android Wear smartwatch - A new setting was added to enable/disable notifications to smartwatches - Bug fixes

description: Money Back Guarantee! - We are very confident in our product. ► EMAIL and PRINT and SAVE all your text messages or a thread of messages. ► UPLOAD your text messages to EVERNOTE, DROPBOX, Google DRIVE and other cloud services. ► The email or uploaded file will have the person's name, phone number, dates, times and messages. ► This app will load all your text messages or a specific thread into an email (or file to be uploaded). You can then choose to send this email to yourself or someone else. It is very simple to use and the email ( or upload ) of your texts can then be printed or saved. ► Filter your texts by Thread, Date, Date Range and Last Number Of Days ►3 easy and quick steps all from your phone. No need to mess with a computer. ► Some apps send your personal texts through their own servers. This app does not do this and so your privacy is assured. We cannot respond to comments left on the Google Play Store. If you already have the app, please use the "Contact Us" form" built into the app. If you do not have the app and have questions, please email georgehammerle@gmail.com . Using this app is a great way to save off texts or create a copy in case you need them for a legal proceeding. Many people need their texts for court cases. And after they are emailed to you, you can print them out and present them in court. Or use this app to get a copy of the texts from someone that is harassing or threatening you. Uses : ► email my texts ► print text messages ► email text messages ► Creating a hard copy of your texts ► Work Related Threads ► Save a copy of conversation with customers ► Forward the email ► email conversation ► print conversation ► save text messages ► send your texts ► backup texts ► Print your SMS ► print texts ► print SMS ► save SMS ► Backup text messages ► email text messages ► Backup SMS ► Backup to Gmail ► save texts ► Upload and Save Texts to Dropbox ( requires FREE Dropbox App ) ► save your texts / SMS to Evernote ( requires FREE Evernote App ) ► Upload and Save Texts to Google Drive ( requires FREE Google Drive App ) ► Upload and Save Texts to Google Keep ( requires FREE Google Keep App ) Great For : ► Legal Proceedings ► Contractors work order changes ► Real estate communications ► Harassment Cases ► Divorce Case ► Custody Hearings ► Any Court Case ► Saving any SMS texts ► Contractors - change work orders ► Landlords / Tenants ► Husband / Wife Issues ► Back up / print work related threads Some cell phone carriers charge $30 or more to provide a print out of your texts. Download this app and save yourself a lot of money and a lot of hassle. On some very select phones, this app does not support the text in Multi-Media Messaging ( known as MMS ) example : picture messages. And some text messaging apps convert long SMS into MMS. Most phones are supported and if supported, only the text from the MMS messages will be included. The pictures cannot be included in the email because multiple pictures quickly exceeds the email size limitation. Some apps that email each text, require you to enter your email address and password. That is a security risk. Do not give out your password to anyone! This app does NOT require you to enter your email address and password, so your privacy is maintained. This app does not automatically email each text as they are received. That would be hundreds or thousands of emails a day for many people. This app does NOT delete or modify any of your text messages. Before you delete your texts, make sure you have received them in the email or that they have been properly uploaded. We also want to thank all the very nice people that have taken the time to let us know how the app has helped you in your lives. We very much appreciate the positive feedback and we are fortunate to have many very wonderful customers. Thank you for your time and have a wonderful day! zee Software Apps

description: Mobile Admin for Minecraft allows to you manage your Minecraft server and even chat with other players right from your phone! Paid version adds: - Real time chat - Server control widget - Multi-Server support via login screen (define and save multiple servers) - Interactive server console screen - Online/Offline users listed - User statistics including login time, blocks placed/broken and deaths. - Player skins in list - Multi-User support - Third party plugin support such as Dynmap For more information and to download the MobileAdmin plugin, please visit http://www.kaltner.net IMPORTANT: this application requires you to run your own Minecraft server using Bukkit or hMod (or variants like Canary). Permissions: android.permission.INTERNET Self explanatory. android.permission.WAKE_LOCK The app keeps a wake lock during screen off so it can complete the quit process. android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION This is coarse location, not fine. I use this for basic analytics via Flurry. I can only tell general location from this, not where you live. ;) com.android.vending.CHECK_LICENSE Self explanatory. android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE This is used by the license check to identify the hardware, nothing more. android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE Self explanatory.
release_text: * Renamed the application to Mobile Admin for Minecraft * Fixed an issue with player images (potentially causing large amounts data usage)

description: A complete reference solution for writing, for work, for study, because you want to express yourself well, or just for the love of words, the Collins Thesaurus of the English Language 2010 Complete & Unabridged includes over 377,000 synonyms and antonyms, and has been fully updated to include all the latest new words. What's that word on the tip of your tongue? Want to avoid using tired or ugly words like 'nice' or 'get'? Collins Thesaurus of the English Language 2010 provides hundreds of thousands of related and alternative words to boost your vocabulary. Stuck with your crossword? Let the thesaurus help you find that tantalizing solution to tricky clues. This is a fully functional trial! Features include:  • Key synonyms for each sense, offering the most helpful alternative  • Opposites provide you with another way of expressing yourself  • A wide range of Idioms and phrases included  • Related words to help you expand your vocabulary  • Cross-references  • Quotations add wit, sparkle and originality  • Illustrative examples from real English show how the entry word is used  • Usage and regional labels to help you identify areas of usage  • Extensive coverage of English as an international language  • 550 Subject word lists add an extra dimension to your vocabulary A SEARCH TOOL featuring search autocomplete to help you find words quickly by displaying predictions similar to the terms you're typing. You also get enhanced search extras including:  • A quick search of words while you type.  • A 'fuzzy filter' for when you are not sure of the correct spelling of a word.  • A 'keyword' search for finding key words within compound words.  • A wild card search function ('*' or '?') which can replace a letter or entire parts of a word.  • Download dictionary definitions locally for offline word lookup. A LEARNING TOOL including a number of features that help you further enhance your vocabulary:  • A 'Favorites' feature to create custom folders with lists of words from the extensive library, including cross-curriculum words.  • History list to help you easily review looked-up words.  • Discover more using the included special language notes.  • See words in context with example sentences.  • 'Word-of-the-day' feature with dedicated homescreen widget.

Browse photos and see the most up-to-date details about your favorite homes, and instantly book a free home tour with a Redfin Real Estate Agent. description: ★☆★人気連載中作品「ミリオンドール」アニメ化決定！★☆★ 【あなたが次にハマる漫画はここにある】 累計120万DL突破！！ オリジナル漫画が全話無料！話の途中抜け、時間制限など一切なし！ GANMA!（ガンマ）は、スマホやタブレットで読むのにぴったりな オリジナルマンガ配信サービスです。 全て無料で、ここでしか読めないオリジナルの漫画が 毎週(火・木・日)に更新され、新作も続々登場！ 王道バトル、ラブコメ、日常系４コマ、ＳＦなど、 様々なジャンルの漫画が盛りだくさん だから あなたの好きな新たな漫画がきっと見つかる！ 【機能紹介】 ◆オリジナルの無料漫画が週３回（火・木・日曜）配信！ 　GANMA!でしか読めない、オリジナルの無料漫画の 　数々が、すべて無料で火・木・日曜日に配信されます。 ◆様々なジャンルの漫画が一気に読めます！ 　王道バトル、ラブコメ、ＳＦ、ギャグ、４コマなど 　様々なジャンルの漫画を一気に楽しめます。 ◆手書きによるお絵かきイラストが投稿できます！ 　読者の声がリアルタイムに作者へ届く、 　コメントやレビュー、手書きによるお絵かき 　イラストを投稿できます。 ◆読者の応援が、作家の評価につながります！ 　読者の評価やレビューをもとに、 　作品のランキングが一定期間ごとに変動します。 【こんな人におススメ】 ◆とにかく漫画が好きな人 ◆最初から最新話まで全部無料で読める漫画が読みたい人 ◆新しい漫画を発掘したい人 ◆ゲームが苦手な人 ◆ほんのちょっとのスキマ時間を埋めたい人 ◆とにかく面白いものが好きな人 ◆バトル、ファンタジー、日常系、萌え系、職業、グルメ、スポーツ、キャラもの、ヒューマンドラマ、サスペンス、少年漫画、青年漫画、少女漫画、4コマ漫画などのジャンルが好きな人 ◆kindle等で電子書籍で普段漫画や小説を読む方 【プレミアム会員特典】 ◆早読み機能 　プレミアム会員になることで（月額300円） 　週３回（火・木・日曜）配信される、 　各号の1週先の配信分のGANMA!（ガンマ）を、ひと足先に読むことができます。 【※アプリが正常に作動しないお客様へ】 必要事項をご記載のうえ下記よりお問合わせ頂けますと幸いです。 調査及び品質向上と改善に努めます。 ※レビュー欄やTwitterへのご質問には個別にお応えしておりません。 お手数ですが下記メールアドレスにお問い合わせをお願い致します。 ◆お問い合わせ先 support@ganma.jp ◆お問い合わせの際に記載していただきたい内容 ・ご利用の端末名 ・発生している現象 ・アプリが起動しない場合は、どの時点でアプリが強制終了してしまうか 【ソーシャルメディア公式アカウント】 ◆Facebookページ https://www.facebook.com/GANMAJPN ◆Twitter https://twitter.com/GANMA_JPN 【対応OS】 ◆Android OS2.3以上 ※一部の端末では、イラスト投稿機能がご利用出来ません。 【お知らせ】 《2015年2月10日》 「ミリオンドール」が2015年夏にテレビアニメ化決定！ GANMA!で人気連載中の『ミリオンドール』が、 2015年夏にテレビアニメ化されることが決定いたしました。 GANMA!の作品としては初のテレビアニメ展開となります。 また、本作のアニメ化に伴い、7月～9月にAKIBAカルチャーズ劇場にて、 出演者(声優)による定期公演も開催する予定です。 キャスト・放送局・放送日時等の詳細情報は、公式サイトにて順次発表します。 公式サイト: http://milliondoll.com/ 《2015年2月6日》 「ダ・ヴィンチ」3月号の「次にくるマンガ大賞2015」特集の 「本にしてほしいWEBマンガ部門TOP10」にて、 7位に選ばれた「GANMA!」の人気作品 「武蔵くんと村山さんは付き合ってみた。」について掲載されました。 《2015年2月2日》 姉妹サイト「つぶやきGANMA!」リリース 「秒速で笑えるマンガ」をコンセプトに スマホでリツイートされることに特化した タイムライン向けマンガ配信サービス「つぶやきGANMA!」を開始いたしました。 公式サイト http://tsubu.ganma.jp Twitterのフォロワー数が20万人以上にのぼる人気作家の作品を含め 7タイトルの中から、毎日数本の書き下ろし作品を配信いたします。 《2015年1月23日》 GANMA!アプリが累計100万ダウンロードを突破！ 《2014年7月31日》 国内累計350万ダウンロードを突破したロールプレイングゲーム「ブレイブ フロンティア」初の公式コミカライズ作品を連載開始しました。 《2014年2月20日》 2月25日より、GANMA!が週3更新(火・木・日)になりました。 《2014年1月29日》 1月30日より、プレミアム会員の特典だった「単行本化機能(作品単体として読む機能)」を無料化いたしました。 description: From Bodybuilding-Apps.com: Summer is fast approaching. Take up this 8 weeks beach body challenge and get an over all body workout, which will make you look super hot when you are sunbathing on the beach! This is one of our most popular challenges to date and gives off the best results – if you stick to it and complete all 8 weeks ! Are you looking to perfect your beach body for the upcoming summer? If so, we have the right prescription just for you. Beach Body Building Plan it's a full-body workout routine that utilizes a combination of high intensity types of resistance training combined and cardio. Weighted resistance training is the best way to burn excess fat and calories when compared to cardio alone. Research has proven this, however if you want to maximize time spent in the gym, we suggest you combine everything into a "high octane" workout that transitions between the weights and some type of cardio. The routine is simple and can be varied depending on what you have available at your local gym. You will keep the weight on the lighter side, and execute more reps so that you do not over-train or fatigue your body to where you can't finish each set. You should incorporate a variety of techniques into your workout routine and superset smaller exercises that can be done with the H.I.T. principles but you don't train the WHOLE body in one workout setting for this routine. You will stick to 1 or 2 muscle groups and train them in accordance with a planned resistance training schedule as follows. So, are you ready to start getting in shape with our 8 week Summer Beach Body Plan?

description: Sudoku - Puzzle, develop your memory and thinking. If you've been in a book store in the last six months - or an airport, waiting room or college lecture class - you've probably seen someone staring at a sudoku. Given its popularity, one might think it's some new type of porn. But no, it's just a puzzle. It's a widespread, logic-based fad of a puzzle that is simple enough to suck you in and difficult enough to keep you hooked. In this article, we'll find out what a sudoku puzzle entails, how to go about solving one and where the concept originated (hint: It's not Japan. Let's get started. Sudoku is a game of numbers - specifically, the numbers 1 through 9 - but it really isn't about math. It's about logic. Instead of 1 through 9, you could use the first nine letters of the alphabet or a set of nine symbols, and it would be the same game. The basis of sudoku is a nine-by-nine grid. You've got three sections to think about: rows, columns and boxes. The goal of sudoku is to fill each nine-square row, each nine-square column and each nine-square box with the numbers 1 through 9, with each number used once and only once in each section. It's the interaction between the rows, columns and boxes that tells you where the numbers need to go. So if you were to start with a blank grid and fill in the numbers for row 1, column 2 and box 4 according to the sudoku rules. Of course, starting with a blank grid wouldn't make it much of a challenge. A sudoku puzzle already has some of the numbers filled in, and it's your job to figure out where the rest of the numbers go. Options: - Season 4 in 35 games. 5 levels of difficulty. - Very comfortable dynamic keyboard to quickly select the correct number. - Rating game users with display of the country. You can post your score to facebook. - Displays the number of entering and remaining digits. - Painting numbers on the keypad at its full entry into the game (9 digits). - Add notes and more. It is planned to add: - New levels and seasons. - More comfortable when playing. - Ability to synchronize with your account Google, Facebook, vkontakte (vk.com), whatsapp, instagram and others.
release_text: - New season games (150 games). - Fixed some bugs.

description: Welcome to WriteKanji, the unique kanji dictionary and learner from SJC Linguistics! Only by writing will you ever learn to write, so why not give yourself the world's best tool for just that? *WriteKanji now contains 2,198 kanji characters from JLPT levels 1-5! *WriteKanji is now a fully searchable dictionary! Between Explore Mode - where you can discover new characters - and Drill Mode - where you can put your memory to the test - you'll be well on your way to recognizing and reconstructing Japanese kanji (traditional Chinese characters) like you learned it in Japan! Find characters in magazines, on TV, in the restaurant you don't know and lock them down once and for all! Thinking of getting a tattoo? Make sure you don't end up with "pork pie" written on your leg! Students and practicers of the language can use it to discover and master new and essential kanji characters from the JLPT. With an open navigation format, you'll learn something new every day! *Features: Explore Mode: -Trace stencils for each kanji while seeing translations and readings -Intuitive sliding controls for navigating Super Sets and hiding stencils from view -Quickly add kanji to your Working Set for use in Drill Mode -Use the list to track your performance in Drill Mode and skip to random kanji Drill Mode: -Intelligent drilling system helps you lock down on wanted kanji and test yourself on whatever you want! -Progress reports back to your list in Explore Mode for each Super Set so you can see your progress for each kanji Universal: -A dictionary lies at the heart of the application, allowing you to search for kanji using kana, English, or the kanji itself! -2,198 kanji in 22 Super Sets from JLPT levels 1-5 -Multiple, adjustable brushes for tailoring to different screen types, including a pressure-sensitive brush for practicing calligraphy -Adjustable shake-to-clean feature -Customizable color themes Please note that in order to get the most out of this application, you will need to be able to read kana. If you can't, we might just have a solution for you *winkwink*, but in all seriousness if you can't write kana you have no business writing kanji.
release_text: 2.0: *NOTE: YOU WILL NEED TO CLEAR DATA OR COMPLETELY UNINSTALL BEFORE UPDATING, AS THIS VERSION BREAKS YOUR WORKING SETS* *Now contains 2,198 characters from JLPT levels 1-4 *Added full search functionality (please be patient while the database loads for the first time) *New look and feel *New kanji stencils (stroke order will be restored as new data is created) *All menu items reachable via screen alone

description: Opus #1 Free uses samples from a real church organ (coming from http://www.jeuxdorgues.com ) for a great realistic sound. You can download demo recordings and a trial version from http://www.refined-apps.com/opus-1 We also offer other music apps, including a version of the full Stiehr Mockers organ (the "Ultimate" version) with Midi/USB. For details, see refined-apps.com. If you have questions, remarks or suggestions, mail us at support@refined-apps.com . -- Highlights ---------- ✓ Low latency audio Low latency audio is a weak spot of Android (see http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=3434 ). Opus #1 provides lowest possible latency on your device. ✓ High quality samples for all contained stops -- Features -------- ✓ Support for lowest latency possible on your android device. ✓ 9 different organ ranks sampled from a real church organ (coming from Joseph Basquin / http://www.jeuxdorgues.com ) ✓ 4 predefined combinations ✓ Various reverb settings (no reverb, small church, medium church, cathedral, ...) ✓ The ranks can be played together like on a real organ; up to 512 pipes simultaneously ✓ 4 1/2 octave keyboard range just like the original organ ✓ Multitouch only limited by your device ✓ Scrollable on-screen keyboard ✓ Settings for the number of displayed keys, optional vibrate on touch, ... ✓ Runs on android >= 4.0.3, phones and tablets -- Usage Tips / Hardware requirements -------- ✓ Needs ca. 9.5 MB on your sdcard for the organ samples ✓ Use headphones / external speakers for better sound; phones speakers are not made for organs ✓ For the best sound, the device should have at least a 1GHz single core processor ---- Free vs. Pro vs. Ultimate ------------ Opus #1 Pro provides all the features of the Free version plus: ✓ 15 stops instead of 9 ✓ Manual + pedal ✓ Registration view ✓ Midi via USB ✓ Midi player ✓ No ads Opus #1 Ultimate provides all the features of the Pro version plus: ✓ 21 stops (the full organ) instead of 15 ✓ 2 manuals + pedal ✓ 5 combinations -- Permissions -------- android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE to extract the sound samples onto the sdcard android.permission.VIBRATE for vibrate on touch support android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS for better audio support (OpenSL) android.permission.INTERNET and android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE to load ads
release_text: 2.6 - Improved voice management - Bug fixes - Library updates 2.5.1-2.5.3 + MIDI/USB now accepts all Roland and Yamaha devices with class "vendor-specific" + Changed default usb/midi in channel to omni, output channel to 0 + Some bug fixes + Library updates 2.5 + New sound engine + Added reverb settings (no reverb, small church, medium church, cathedral, ...) + Added further speed settings to the midi player + Library updates

description: Kids Coloring Book Fun4Kids Honey Bee Kids Educational Apps Kids Coloring Book is a fun coloring activity for preschool children. This great app keeps your kids entertained for hours. Coloring helps kids to understand coordination. It takes a lot of hand-eye coordination to color in a coloring page. Coloring helps kids to improve their focusing skills. They spend their time to complete a coloring page. Coloring helps kids to learn boundaries. Another thing that children learn from coloring pages is how to accept boundaries. Fun4Kids Educational Applications are endorsed by thousands of satisfied parents, teachers and kids from all over the world. Please reach us @ honeybee@mobyport.com for any feedback and support! We are committed to providing fun and educational experiences to support your kids' education.

description: Christmas Mahjong is the classic Mahjong solitaire puzzle game with a cute Christmas theme. The goal is to remove all of the tiles from the board. You may remove only paired free tiles. The tile is free when there are no tiles either to the left or to the right of it. The game runs and looks great on both phones and tablets. FEATURES: - Classic Mahjong solitaire game play. - Very simple to learn. - More than 20 game boards to challenge. - Universal game for phones and tablets. - Varying levels of difficulty for every skill level from casual to expert. - Free version is fully unlocked. Any in-app purchase will removes the ads. -Golds coins are rewarded for completing levels based on the levels difficulty and how fast you cleared it. -Players with save games prior to v1.0.9 will be automatically awarded coins based on their best time for each cleared level Coming Soon: -More ways to earn free bonus coins -Seasonal backgrounds and wallpapers that can be unlocked with game coins -New background music

description: Based on the classic Minesweeper brain game. The goal is to successfully mark all the mines without revealing or stepping on a mine. You must deduce the locations of mines based on the numbers that are revealed when a tile is uncovered. Features: Eight different skins or themes for appearance. Long press to reveal what is under a tile Press a square to mark it as a mine; press again to unmark Minefield scrolls up and down by flicking Three levels are available: beginner, intermediate, and advanced Top scores for each level are stored on phone and the option of submitting scores to global score list Capable of installing to SD card

description: Animal sounds is a great application for kids of age 3 months to 10 years. Supports English,German,French,Spanish and Korean languages. This app has great photos of various animals along with their sounds. Click on the small image of the animal to hear how it sounds. Uniqueness of this app is that it tells the name of the animal before it sounds(Helps small kids co-relate the name/image/sound and improves thier memory and co-relating all the senses together). Features: 1. Gallery view to show big sized images of animals . Displays animal name with animation . Text to Speech reads animal name . Shake your device to hear the animal sound . Change the language using settings menu . Switch off animal name display and use it to quiz your kids or use it as a game. 2. Grid view to show many animals in one screen . Image rotates when you click on it in grid view Settings to on/off some of all the above features. We made it a 3 step process as this primarily for children so they don't change the Ringtone/Notification/Alarm by mistake. 1. Go to settings and select save as ringtone(i.e is should be checked) 2. Now go back and long press on the bird you want(it will popup a menu with save as options) 2. Select save as Ringtone/Notification/Alarm. Now you can see the ringtone in your list of ring tones with the animal name. There are plenty of animal sounds games and apps are out there in the market but many of them support only English. This app supports German French Spanish and Korean languages. Change the language you wanted use by going into settings. Please rate this app and send your feedback about additional animal sounds or any other improvements you think will help this making a great app.
release_text: VER 3.0 1. Many new animals added 2. Bug fixes to handle slide show issue when in background 3. Improved support for screens of different size

description: Mosque Aware will put your phone into silent mode once you enter the proximity radius of 50 meters of the mosque Bait-ul-Islam while notifiying you about this action via notifications. Once you leave that 50 meter radius, your phone will go back into Normal mode. The goal is to have phones silent while in the mosque so that observers can focus at the task at hand. If the GPS is enabled the app will use a 50 meter radius extending from the center of Bait-ul-Islam. If the GPS is disabled, its recommended to have WIFI enabled (even if you are not connected to a network). Wifi is not as accurate as GPS and as such a 500 meter radius is used to compensate for the inaccuracies. Added feature is: If you accidentally turn up the volume in the mosque, the app will recognize that within a minute and put your phone in silent mode again. Enjoy! I am open to suggestions - I will check the comments frequently to see what you folks are saying. Be nice!

description: HD Keyboard skin/theme with light/baby pink background, with smooth colored pink keys. Very cute and girlie. This is NOT A STANDALONE APP. You should download one of the listed compatible keyboard apps to use this SKIN. Compatible with : - Perfect Keyboard - Smart Keyboard Pro - Ultra Keyboard - Kii Keyboard - Super Keyboard - TSwipe-Pro keyboard - Better Keyboard - May work on other keyboards also Note : For "perfect keyboard", I recommend to tweak settings in Layout->Horizontal/Vertical Layout : - Key height to be bigger (110-140) - Row gap to be smaller (30-50) This skin doesn't have launcher icon. It doesn't pollute your phone :) Please don't give bad ratings because of some errors, try to contact us first, we will handle that :) KNOWN LIMITATIONS : - Key's pop up cannot be overridden in smart keyboard, it will use the default pop up, it is that app's limitation. INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS : 1. Get one of the Keyboard applications listed above from the Google Play. If you already have one of them you like, go to step 4. 2. Enable the new Keyboard App. Go to your phone's settings, then language and keyboard settings, and enable the one of the compatible keyboard app. 3. Change the input method to that new Keyboard app. In GB phones, long press on a text box, and select "Input method", choose that keyboard app. In ICS or above, while focusing on a text box, choose input method by pressing the notification panel "Select input method". 4. Go to the settings of the keyboard app, and change the keyboard skin to the one you've downloaded. app_name: ソニーの電子書籍 Reader™
description: 【はじめての方限定！今ならポイント100円相当プレゼント】 ●Reader Storeのメールマガジンにはじめて登録された方に好きな本の購入に使用できる100ポイントプレゼント！ メールマガジンでは毎週話題の新刊やおトクなキャンペーンの情報をお届けしています！詳しくは　 http://ebookstore.sony.jp/stc/mailmag/20141101/mailmag_new/ ※キャンペーンは予告なく終了する場合があります -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ソニーの公式電子書籍アプリです。 コミック、小説、雑誌など約20万冊取扱。無料の本2,000冊以上、試し読みサンプルも充実しています。キャンペーンや優待プログラムを豊富にご用意しており、お得に本をお楽しみいただけます。 ソニーの電子書籍アプリReader はMy Sony IDもしくはSony Entertainment Networkアカウントでお楽しみいただけます。 また、お持ちのGoogleアカウントやYahoo! JAPAN IDでかんたんに会員登録をしていただくことも可能です。 アプリに関するQ&Aはこちら http://ebookstore.sony.jp/stc/support/qa/smt/ ■特徴 ＜Reader Store について＞ ・21ものジャンル別の売り場、読者が実際に読んで書いたレビューが充実。おもしろいと思える一冊に出会いやすい書店です ・レビューを書いた本を他の人が買うとソニーポイントがプレゼントされる「自分の本屋さん体験」ができるサービスをご用意しています ・毎月　約2,000冊のペースで新刊入荷しています ・約2,000冊の無料の青空文庫、無料の試し読みサンプルなど、実際のご購入前に電子書籍を体験できるラインナップが充実しています ・書籍を購入するとソニーポイントがたまります。たまったポイントで書籍を購入することができます ・書籍はクレジットカード/auかんたん決済/ソニーポイント/NET CASH(Reader Store専用電子図書券)での購入が可能です 　ソニーの電子書籍ストアReader Store　 http://ebookstore.sony.jp/ ＜アプリについて＞ ・フォントには「筑紫明朝・ゴシック」を採用、小さなサイズでもきれいな文字で書籍をお楽しみいただけます。 ・背景や文字色、余白を変更することができます（.bookを除く）。 ・文字拡大、明るさ調整、ブックマーク（しおり）、ハイライトなどにも対応。 ・最後に読んだページ位置やブックマーク（しおり）、ハイライトなどの情報を他の端末と共有できます。 ・実際の本のようなページめくりを含む多彩なページめくりアニメーションに対応（コミックのページめくりアニメーションはEPUBのみになります）。 ・デバイスのボリュームキーによるページめくりも可能です（EPUB雑誌を除く）。 ・購入した本は書籍、雑誌、コミックごとの本棚に並び、タイトル/著者名/最近読んだ本/最近購入した本で並べ替えができます。またお好みの本棚を手動で作成できます。 ・さらに同じタイトル、著者、ジャンル、出版社の場合は自動でまとめて表示することもできます。 ・購入した書籍について書名や書影を添えて”Twitter”と”Facebook”に投稿することができます。 ・購入した書籍は対応する端末間で5台まで共有できます。 ・バックアップしたコンテンツを後からアプリに取り込むことができます。 ・Android4.4以上ではメモリーカードにコンテンツを保存することができます（デバイスの制限により、Android4.4以上でもアプリからメモリカードを認識できないデバイスがあります）。 ・最後のページで、今読んだ本の続刊を読んだり、関連する本を探したり、レビューを書いたりすることができます。 ・どのページからでも「次の巻」「前の巻」をいつでも開くことができます。 ・Reader Storeタイルにソニーポイントを表示します。今月期限切れになるポイントも確認できます。 ・Android4.4以上ではフルスクリーンモードによる読書がお楽しみいただけます。コミックの見開き表示等で画像が大きく表示され読みやすくなります。 ＜動作環境＞ ・Android™ 4.0 ~ Android 4.4 ・本体RAM 1GB以上 ・本体メモリーに140MB以上の空き容量 ＜動作に必要な権限＞ ▼プライバシー - 端末のステータスとID読み取り：コンテンツ内に電話番号のリンクがある場合、タップすると電話アプリを起動 - この端末上のアカウントの検索：Push通知のための標準的な機構「Google Cloud Messaging：GCM」を使用するために必要 ▼ストレージ - コンテンツの保存・読み出し ▼ネットワーク通信 - インターネットからデータを受信する：Reader Storeからのお知らせ（Push通知）を受信 - ネットワークのフルアクセス：Reader Store へのアクセス - ネットワーク接続の表示：ネットワークが使用可能かどうかの確認 - Wi-Fi接続の表示：大容量のコンテンツをダウンロードするときにWi-Fi接続以外の時にお知らせする ▼アプリ情報 - 起動時の実行：ダウンロード処理等を実行するサービスを起動 - 実行中アプリの取得：Reader 拡張機能がインストール済みかどうかの確認 ▼電池への影響 - タブレット/携帯電話のスリープを無効にする：ダウンロード中や機器認証中のスリープ抑止 ▼システムツール - システム設定の変更：バックライトの制御、画面OFFタイマーの制御 ＜対応フォーマット＞ ・Reader Store 配信コンテンツ(.mnh)：表示するには機器認証が必要です。 ・XMDF (.zbf) ・ドットブック (.book) ・EPUB(.epub)：日本語EPUBフォーマットは、ファイルによって表示できない場合があります。 ・PDF (.pdf)：PDF1.6仕様に準拠しています。 本製品は、フォントワークス株式会社のフォントを使用しています。 XMDFはシャープ株式会社の登録商標です。 ドットブック（.book）は株式会社ボイジャーの登録商標です。 Twitter®は、Twitter Inc.の商標または登録商標です。 Facebook®は、Facebook Inc.の商標または登録商標です。 “Reader”およびそのロゴは、ソニー株式会社の日本国およびその他の国における登録商標または商標です。 その他記載されている会社名、製品名は各社の商標または登録商標です。 【関連キーワード】 電子書籍、本、小説、コミック、マンガ、漫画、ライトノベル、雑誌
release_text: Ver.3.7.2 ・アプリ内ストアから、コンテンツの試し読みができるようになりました。 ・Android 4.4のau端末で、"auかんたん決済"利用時にエラーが発生することがある問題を修正しました。 ・その他バグの修正と安定性の向上を行いました。 Ver.3.7.1 ・一部のEPUB3コンテンツにおいて、まれにページが正常に表示されないことがある問題を修正しました。 Ver.3.7.0 ・SDカードにコンテンツを保存できるようになりました（Android4.4以上）。 ・最終ページからだけでなく、開いている本の同シリーズの次巻・前巻をメニューから簡単に開くことが出来るようになりました。 ・Reader Storeからのお知らせが届くようになりました。 ・Reader拡張機能無しで雑誌の閲覧が可能になりました。 ・いくつかの不具合を修正しました。 Ver.3.6.1 ・他のアプリから読書画面に復帰するときに異常終了することがある問題を修正しました。 ・一部のEPUB3書籍コンテンツとデバイスの表示品質を改善しました。

description: Avec ExoNathan ça donne tout simplement envie de s'entraîner! Une application pour réviser efficacement et de façon ludique partout et à tout moment ! Complète et facile d’utilisation, elle offre un large choix d’exercices interactifs, qui permettent de revoir tout le programme de Français en 4e . Cette application universelle conçue pour smartphone et tablette peut être téléchargée en 3G ou wifi Une application offrant de nombreuses fonctionnalités • 1 000 exercices permettant de varier son entrainement. Différentes typologies d’exercices comme des cases à cocher, des étiquettes à déplacer, du texte à sélectionner ou à saisir, des tableaux à compléter, etc. • Chaque exercice possède un corrigé détaillé • Deux modes de révision au choix : - « Entraîne-toi » : 10 exercices variés sont proposés de manière aléatoire en fonction du thème de révision choisi. - « Tests » : Ce mode permet de se tester en un temps limité pour valider ses connaissances. • Un espace de jeu intégré avec le mode « Défis », qui permet de lancer des défis à ses amis (2 à 4 joueurs possibles). • Un suivi personnalisé des résultats : - Chaque série d’exercices est notée sur 20. - Un tableau des scores permet de suivre sa progression. • Des ressources complémentaires - Des cours complets pour rappeler l’essentiel. - Des indices pour aider l’élève à répondre. - Des documents sous forme d’images et de sons. • Une ardoise effaçable pour s’exercer avant de répondre - Également disponibles dans la même collection, les applications Français CE2, CM2, 6e, 5e, 3e, With ExoNathan it gives just want to train! An application to revise effectively and fun everywhere and anytime! Comprehensive and easy to use, it offers a wide range of interactive exercises that allow to review the entire French program in the fourth. This universal application designed for smartphone and tablet can be downloaded over 3G or wifi An application with many features • 1000 exercises to vary your workout. Different types of exercises such as check boxes, labels to move the text to select or enter, complete with tables, etc.. • Each exercise has a detailed answer • Two modes of revision to choose from: - "Train yourself": 10 different exercises are offered randomly according to the theme selected for review. - "Tests": This mode allows you to test a limited time to validate their knowledge. • A play area with integrated mode "Challenges", which allows to challenge his friends (2-4 players possible). • A personalized results: - Each set of exercises is marked out of 20. - A scoreboard keeps track its progress. • Additional resources - Courses for complete recall the gist. - Clues to help the student to respond. - Documents as images and sounds. • An erasable slate to practice before answering - Also available in the same collection, the French CE2 applications, CM2, 6th, 5th, 3rd,

description: It was an encounter of destiny. I was a wandering wolf. It was until the day when I came across the head of the wolf pack which saved me from the evil group of other wolves. The story of how I fought to become the head of the wolf pack starts here. It is a game that deals with a story of a wandering wolf that enters a wolf pack led by a head wolf. All the things that the wolf must do amongst the wolf pack are included as mission tasks. You will go through a minor test in order to become a part of the wolf pack as well as learn how to survive/hunt and also learn how to group hunt with fellow wolves. There will be times when you will have to fight against strong predators on its own but it will fight with fellow wolves when going against big and strong predators. If you wish you experience the life of a wolf, then this game might just be what you have been looking for. *Eating prey If you approach a dead animal after succeeding in hunting, you will eat the prey and your vital force will go up. *Hunting method Preys bait warning front. Because you move to prey back, you should attack slowly.

description: 3 great games in 1!!! The magic Car Scratch Game for kids lets your child scratch away the color to reveal a secret car pictures hidden underneath. Also included is the magic water coloring in game which lets you add colors to existing black and white images to complete the picture, and now you can also paint your own pictures. The magic car scratch game includes - - Scratch card game - Watercolor game - Painting game The free edition of the Car Scratch Game game is an ad supported, complete and unrestricted version of the app. To play ad free, please download the premium edition of the Car Scratch Game for Kids from the Google play marketplace. This children's game is suitable for all ages.

description: The application called Cityinfo is the application to mobile phones of website www.cityinfo.hu, which use the adventages of Android devices, for example mobility and flexibility. The application has features, which can facilite us to the nearest discounted products and and services to locate, and are satisfied with your selection of events and programs. Within the application you can choose your city, then you can look for the moment current actions in categories, for example shops, technical shop or even a pizzeria. In addition, in the chosen city we can also look for the current events, parties, cultural events. It is an extra function, that we can see the offers of shops, which was rated by another users, even you can also rate them. If you only want to browse the offers of the shops, it can be also done. An interesting of the application is the option „What is nearby?”, where the application use the current location of us to list the shops, which are the near of us. The nearest shop is in the top of the list. We can see the shops in map view and the navigation help us to navigate to the interesting shops. The program is available in Hungarian.
