description: Mobile Online-Filiale. Die „VolksApp“ zum Banking inkl. VR-NetWorld Brokerage! Mit der mobilen Online-Filiale stets die Bank in der Tasche haben: Diese App bietet voll Funktionalität bei höchstem Komfort. Keine andere Lösung für den mobilen Kontozugriff ist umfassender, sicherer und flexibler. Die richtige Wahl für alle, die einen mobilen, aktiven Lebensstil pflegen oder auf größtmögliche Flexibilität Wert legen. Die Applikation ist ideal, wenn sich gerade keine Filiale einer Volksbank Raiffeisenbank in der Nähe befindet oder es einfach mal schnell gehen muss. Die mobile Online-Filiale ist damit die perfekte Ergänzung der genossenschaftlichen Präsenz-, Telefon- und Online-Dienste. Zu den wesentlichen Pluspunkten der mobilen Online-Filiale gehören die zahlreichen Funktionen im direkten Zugriff, eine hohe Lauf- und Übertragungssicherheit sowie ein einfaches, klares und komfortables Handling. Hinzu kommt, dass zukünftige, neue Services gleich für die mobile Online-Filiale mit entwickelt werden und nahezu zeitgleich zum Filialkonto auch für die mobile Anwendung zur Verfügung stehen werden. Hinweis: Ab sofort steht Ihnen zu der App Online-Filiale auch die Online-Filiale+ mit dem Plus an Leistungen kostenlos im App-Store zur Verfügung. Mit der Online-Filiale+ können Sie zusätzlich zu Ihrer Volksbank Raiffeisenbank alle anderen Kontoverbindungen übersichtlich über eine App verwalten. Die Registrierung erfolgt einmalig und für die Einrichtung Ihres Kontos bei der Volksbank Raiffeisenbank benötigen Sie Ihre Kundennummer und VR-Kennung („VRK…“) sowie Ihre PIN für das Online-Banking. Ihre Zugangsdaten erhalten Sie über das Online-Banking unter „Service & Verwaltung“. Die Verwendung des Alias ist aktuell noch nicht möglich. Bei Problemen wenden Sie sich bitte an Ihren Berater in der Bank. Leistung & Features: • umfassende Kontenkontrolle mit Finanzübersicht, Umsatzdetails, Kontobewegungen, Überweisungen, Aufträgen, Vorlagenerstellung, PIN- und VR-Kennung-Verwaltung, etc. • VR-NetWorld Brokerage für Kunden der Volks- und Raiffeisenbanken: - ausführliche Informationen zu den Kapitalmärkten - aktuelle Depotbestands- und Depotumsatzabfragen - die Möglichkeit Wertpapiere schnell und direkt zu handeln (Käufe, Verkäufe, Limitfunktion, Orderbuch) • einfache Personalisierung – entscheiden Sie selbst, welche Banking-Funktionen Sie über Ihre Navigation im direkten Zugriff haben möchten • direkte Prepaid Handy-Auflade-Möglichkeit • Geldautomaten-Finder • selbsterklärende, sichere Benutzerführung durch Übernahme des optimal strukturierten VR-Internet-Layouts: schnelle Orientierung, kurze Wege • hohe Lauf- und Übertragungssicherheit Technik: • Optimale Lösung für freigeschaltete Kunden Volksbanken oder Raiffeisenbanken in West-, Nord- und Ostdeutschland (ob dies der Fall ist, sagt Ihnen Ihre Bank vor Ort); die App für Kunden in Süddeutschland finden Sie unter „vr.de“. • Zu Ihrer Sicherheit wird der Versand von mobilen TANs per SMS nicht unterstützt (Gewährleistung der 2-Wege-Sicherheit). • Kompatibel mit allen Android Smartphones mit Android OS 1.5 (Cupcake) oder höher. • Bei der Nutzung der mobilen Online-Filiale fallen eventuell Verbindungskosten über Ihren Provider an. Kurz: Wenn Mobile-Banking – dann die mobile Online-Filiale! Und falls Sie doch die nächstgelegene Filiale einer Volks- oder Raiffeisenbank aufsuchen wollen, nutzen Sie einfach den Filial- und Geldautomaten-Finder unter „vr.de Suche“. Hinweis: Mit älteren Endgeräten und OS ist Sm@rtTAN optic u.U. nicht nutzbar. Online mobile store. The "VolksApp" for banking including VR NetWorld Brokerage! With the mobile online store always have the bank in your pocket: This app provides full functionality with comfort. No other solution for the mobile account access is comprehensive, secure and flexible. The right choice for those who maintain a mobile, active lifestyle or put a premium on flexibility value. The application is ideal if just no one branch Volksbank Raiffeisenbank is near or it just needs to go fast times. The online mobile store, making it the perfect addition to the co-presence, telephone and online services. One of the main plus points of online mobile store includes numerous functions for direct access, high mileage and transmission security and a simple, clear and comfortable handling. In addition, future, new services will be developed with the same for the online mobile store and almost simultaneously to the Branch Account will also be available for the mobile application. Note: As of now, the online store + with the extra benefits available to the online app store for free in the App Store. With the online store + you can also manage your Volksbank Raiffeisenbank all other bank accounts clearly about an app. The registration is done once and for setting up your account at the Volksbank Raiffeisenbank you need your customer number and VR identifier ("VCLT ...") and your PIN for online banking. You will receive your login information via the online banking under "Service & Management". The use of the alias is not currently possible. In case of problems, please contact your advisor in the bank. Performance & Features: • comprehensive monitoring accounts with financial statement, sales details, account transactions, transfers, contracts, template creation, PIN and VR identifier management, etc. • VR NetWorld brokerage for customers of the local cooperative banks:   - Detailed information on the capital markets   - Current vault inventory and depot sales queries   - The ability to act quickly and directly securities (purchases, sales, limit function, the order book) • easy personalization - you decide which banking functions you want to have direct access to your navigation • direct prepaid mobile top-up option • ATM Finder • intuitive, secure user interface by adopting the optimal structured VR internet layout: quick orientation, short distances • high and transmission security Technology: • Optimal solution for activated clients Volksbanks or cooperative banks in Western, Northern and Eastern Germany (if this is the case, you say your local bank), the app for customers in Southern Germany, see "vr.de". • For your safety, the delivery of mobile TANs via SMS is not supported (ensuring 2-way security). • Compatible with all Android smartphones running Android OS 1.5 (Cupcake) or higher. • When using the mobile online store may be subject to connection charges from your provider. In short, if mobile banking - then the online mobile store! And if you still want to visit the nearest branch of a popular or Raiffeisenbank, simply use the Branch and ATM Finder under "vr.de search". description: It's a fast and easy way to read Portugal News (Notícias) in Portuguese (Português) on Android. Portugal Notícias gives you easy access to read the most popular news sources from Portugal on your Android device. Take this app with you and stay informed with access to the latest news. FEATURES: √ News by site. √ News by category. √ Download news briefs automatically. √ Offline reading. √ News widget. √ Convert webpage to mobile format. √ Remove or sort news sources. √ Edit default news sources √ Subscribe more news sources via RSS √ Import more news sources via OPML √ Option to block images (reduce bandwidth). √ Share news via SMS, Email, Facebook, Twitter... *NOTE*: If the application crashes after upgrading, please uninstall and reinstall it.

description: Need help constructing, organizing and managing your academic citations or references? Look no further! Reference Generator is designed to simplify the often tedious task of constructing and managing academic references. It currently supports books, journals, and websites and allows users to build references, convert them to the required style and even view in-text examples. It supports a wide array of referencing styles, including: Harvard, Numeric, MHRA, APA, Chicago, IEEE and Royal Society of Chemistry. Alongside the manual data entry, the application features a built-in barcode scanner, which allows users to simply scan a book’s barcode or introduce its ISBN in order to retrieve all the relevant information. References are organised in projects and can be copied or shared through a wide range of apps (Email, Messages, Notes, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Facebook, Twitter, Dropbox, Google+, etc.) so you can easily continue your work anywhere.
release_text: 1.0.4 - Fixed minor bugs

description: Fight again waves of invaders in a pure arcade space shooter. A refresh of the old school arcade space shooters, with invaders made of voxels. Control is ultra simple, just move the spaceship in space with one finger, and auto-fire on the invaders. Collect power-up to obtain new weapons and lives, make your way through asteroid fields and collect power-up that suddenly switches to a 3D space mode. "If you’re a fan of addictive gaming and/or retro titles on Android, be sure to check this awesome game out." -- androidtapp (4.7/5) Features include: - Full free version (with ads) - 24 levels containing more than 140 stages - dozens of different alien invaders including big bosses - 9 different weapons - various gameplay depending on the levels - 3 levels of difficulties - intuitive single-finger control - 3D OpenGL based voxel graphics - original vintage sound effects and electro soundtracks
release_text: Full version, with ads between levels.

description: Data Monitor is an app that measures your data usage in an intuitive manner with a simple design interface. This app is useful for accurately measuring your daily data usage, and warning you if you are using too much. Automatic data usage measurement - simply start the app once, and it will automatically measure your data usage from that point on. Whenever you are concerned about your data usage, just open the app to check. High-precision data usage measurement - the app gives an accurate measurement of your data usage, without any inconsistencies at any moment. Wi-Fi data usage measurements are organized by each SSID. Easy-to-read statistics screen - measured data usage is separated by Wi-Fi usage and mobile usage and displayed in easy-to-read graphs. Data usage per app can also be displayed, so you can know which apps use the most data. Transfer speed monitor - a transfer speed monitor can be displayed permanently in the upper-right corner of the screen. Instantly check when and how much data is being transferred. Widgets - widgets are supported, so you can check your data usage without opening the app. (For premium users only.) description: 猛禽通指鷹、鷲、鵰、隼等掠食性鳥類，以各種小動物為食，位居食物網的頂層，對生態系的平衡至為重要；全世界約近290種，台灣有記錄者有34種，而在墾丁國家公園區內就紀錄到33種之多，可謂猛禽多樣性熱點之一。 本軟體含有墾丁會出現的猛禽圖鑑(共33種)，圖鑑中含有多張猛禽的圖片，圖片有幼鳥、成鳥、雄鳥、雌鳥辨識，辨識輪廓圖、詳細出現地點、詳細資料(中英文名字、學名、習性等)，方便大家在外可以快速的辨識出眼前的猛禽是哪一種！ 另外整合了墾丁的地理資訊，能夠查看各種猛禽的分布狀況，還有墾丁的主要賞「鷹」地點，結合了Google地圖導航，帶領大家一同去賞鷹！ 本軟體也整理了與猛禽相關的網站與法規，讓大家能夠更加深入的去了解猛禽與保育的重要！ 最適合給喜歡旅遊與大自然愛好者、解說員與志工，以及參與戶外教學的學生，任何喜歡猛禽的男女老少都適用！ * 本App係參加103年度「墾丁賞鷹任我行 App創意應用程式徵選競賽」得獎作品，版權為墾丁國家公園管理處所有。
release_text: *增加「國家公園法」 *修正錯誤、英文名顯示問題 *調整版面，支援各種字體大小而不會切字

description: ⏎ Searching for unit converter free download? Search no more! This is one of those “tool apps” that features unit conversion calculator. Convert as a real PRO! ⏎ Conversion of units is the conversion between different units of measurement for the same quantity, typically through multiplicative conversion factors. There are many different unit converters available for you, but this one has multiple advantages. • Eye-appealing graphics • Well-designed conversion chart • User-friendly interface • Moveable to SD card • Round-based on decimal places • Commonly used abbreviations for units such as cm for centimeters, km for kilometer, in for inches etc. • Both Imperial and Metric conversion Another great feature of this converter is that it is not overwhelmed with thousand different unit categories but it actually contains those most commonly used ones. If you want to convert feet to meters, you can do that quite easily without too much searching for the length converter category. This toolbox has 14 different categories including length, mass (weight converter), volume and area as the most popular ones that you can use to convert Celsius to Fahrenheit or to check how many pounds there are in 33 kilograms. Other categories here are Speed, Fuel consumption and Time Converter that go hand in hand and are excellent when on road trip. Angle, power, pressure and force converter are put in this app for the more advanced converters, such as physics students or other scientist who got tired of manual calculators. Digital Storage or data and Digital Imaging categories are cool extras. If you think there is an important unit category missing from this app, please inform us ASAP! ★★★★★Things you didn’t know★★★★★ The system of imperial units or the imperial system is the system of units first defined in the British Weights and Measures Act of 1824, which was later refined and reduced. The system came into official use across the British Empire. The metric system is an internationally agreed decimal system of measurement that was originally based on the mètre and the kilogramme introduced by France in 1799. Over the years, the definitions of the metre and kilogram have been refined and the metric system has been extended to incorporate many more units. The term is now often used as a synonym for "SI" or the "International System of Units"—the official system of measurement in almost every country in the world.
release_text: - New category has been added: Energy conversion - New units of measurement have been added: cm2, mm2, micrometre, nanometre, dag - Fixed the issues with the conversion among units

app_name: Mynd: 興味にマッチする記事を届けるニュースアプリ
description: 【ver2.0 Android Wear対応！いますぐ試そう】 Android Wear端末を持っている人は、このアプリを本体のAndroidデバイスにインストールするだけで、あなたのWear端末でもMyndが使えるようになります。手元でニュースをウォッチしよう。 ※時計盤を左スワイプすることで、本体の「あとで読む」リストに追加されます。「あとで読む」リストは、「My朝刊」「My新着」の隣に現れます。 ① 毎朝届く厳選ニュース「My朝刊」 いつも忙しいあなたに。毎朝あなたにぴったりマッチした数十記事が届きます。「あなた専用の朝刊1面」です。 ② 新しい発見に満ちたタイムライン「My新着」 情報に敏感なあなたに。すき間時間に、最新ニュースをリアルタイムにチェックできます。 もちろん、あなたが興味を持ちそうな情報が選ばれて配信されます。 さらにMyndなら、まだ話題になっていないニュースも見つけ出してくれます。 誰も知らない情報を、Myndで見つけましょう。 ★★Myndの特徴★★ 1. 高度な機械学習アルゴリズム 興味のあるニュースを読んでいくだけで、Myndはどんどんあなたを理解していきます。さらにTwitterやFacebookなどのアカウントと連携すると、推薦の精度はぐっと増します。 使い続けるうちに、あなただけのMyndが育ちます。 2. シンプルでミニマルなインターフェース 見えないところで複雑な計算をしていても、届けるときには綺麗に整理。まるで有能なアシスタントのような仕事をするのがMyndです。 タブもカテゴリも無いすっきりした画面で、気持ちよく情報を摂取できます。 3. 知識を深める関連記事 Myndは関連記事も表示。流し読みする中で、気になった記事の深堀りや知識の消化を助けます。さらに、FacebookやTwitterなどのSNSでいいね！した記事や、Evernote、Pocket、はてなブックマークに過去に保存した記事も思い出させてくれます。 ★★こんな方におすすめ★★ ・情報収集を効率化したい人 ・普段から新聞や雑誌を読んでいる人 ・スキマ時間を活用したり、暇つぶしをしたい人 ・趣味の知識やおもしろネタ、雑学を仕入れたい人 ・知識を深く吸収したい読書家 ・誰も知らない情報を収集したいブロガーやライター ・電車での通勤時間や待ち時間を有効活用したいビジネスパーソン ・Wikipediaをどんどん辿るWikipediaサーフィンをしたことがある人 ・就活で業界研究・企業研究をしたり、時事ニュースを読みたい学生・就活生 ・Feedly, Flipboard、RSSリーダーアプリを使いこなしている情報通 ・日経新聞、毎日新聞、朝日新聞、産経新聞などの新聞アプリを使っている人 ・SmartNews(スマートニュース)、Gunosy(グノシー)、NewsPicks(ニューズピックス)、Antenna(アンテナ)、vingow(ビンゴー)、kamelio(カメリオ)、LINE NEWS(LINEニュース)、Yahoo!(ヤフー) ニュース、mixi(ミクシィ)ニュースなどを使いこなすキュレーションアプリマスター ★★あらゆるジャンルに自動で対応★★ Myndはあなたの好みを自動で学習。だから、難しい設定をすることなく読みたい記事だけが読める。ジャンルにとらわれない新しいニュース・リーダーです。 ・政治、経済、社会、国際、金融といったビジネスニュースも。 ・ネットやガジェット、ベンチャーやスタートアップといったテクノロジーニュースも。 ・ファッションやコスメ、恋愛や育児、グルメ、インテリアなどの女子向けニュースも。 ・芸能人や音楽アーティスト、映画やドラマ、海外ゴシップなどのエンタメニュースも。 ・プロ野球や海外サッカーなどのスポーツニュースも。 ・アニメやゲーム、サブカル、まとめ記事、おもしろネタも。 あなたの興味や趣味に自動で適応。新聞のような雑誌のようなキュレーション・アプリ、それがMyndです。 【サポートについて】 バグや不具合などの報告やお問い合わせは、 corp@mynd.jp までお気軽にご連絡ください。 ※Myndはあなたが読んだ記事をもとに推薦の精度が向上する仕組みになっています。また、TwitterやFacebookなどのアカウントと連携すると、推薦の精度が向上します。レコメンドの精度が低いと思われる場合は、是非お試し下さい。 【対応デバイス】 スマートフォン、タブレット、パソコン、メールとあらゆるデバイスで使うことができるユニバーサル・アプリです。 PC版: https://mynd.jp こんなワードでも検索されています。 Mynd, Mind, マインド, まいんど

description: The KicVidz Story KIC stands for "Keep it clean” and all videos featured inside this app have been verified as kid appropriate. What this means is that the videos do not feature any of the more common and popular curse words such as the “s” word, the “f” word, and the word used for “behind”. Hi. My name is Shane Keller and I am the parent of a 7 year old MC fanatic. I created the KicVidz app series because I wanted my son to be able to watch and enjoy all of the incredible MC videos that were being uploaded to Youtube. Because so many of them are being produced by older kids and adults, the use of curse words find their way into many of these videos. I decided to create an app that would allow parents the ability to let their child watch and discover YouTube videos worry free. Features: Video Categories: Parkour, Survival Games, Music Videos, Animations, and many more. "What's New" group featuring only the most recently added videos. Save any video to your "Favorites" group. New videos updated automatically and frequently. We really hope that you and your child enjoys the app. Please do pass it on to any other MC parents that you think could use and enjoy it too. Also, if you want to help us get the word out, please rate the app. It REALLY helps a lot! Thank-you, Shane Keller (aka DaddyBigz)

description: Please enjoy 5 sets of HSK1 old exam papers in listening as well as superior voice quality. The unique assistant system will urge you to study effectively. Both learning time and accuracy are crucial to your grades. Assistant will set suitable task for you everyday. All the questions of high error rate will be added to a new plan. In this way, there'll be no blind spot in your study. Many kinds of display pattern provide you with mock exam mode and practice mode. What's more, you can enjoy brilliant functions such as screen word-capturing, vocabulary notebook, speed adjustment, background play, sentence-by-sentence play and so on. Features of the unique assistant system: 1. You can choose from low, middle or high study intensity according to your own level. 2. Two assistants are offered. One is stricter Kate. She is suitable for those who demand high standards; the other one is less stricter Ken. He is suitable for those who demand low standards. 3.Daily assistant will schedule tasks according to your settings. Remember that high scores and medals depend on learning time and accuracy. So please study carefully, otherwise all wrong questions will be added to following tasks. 4.Assistant will evaluate your performance every few days. If you don't study hard,being scolded is quite possible. 5.Your body is more important than grades. So assistant will give you some health tips every day. Please pay attention to that. 6.The Station Agent, maxims and epigrams, funny jokes as well as testing technique are also provided to adjust your mood. Join us in the HSK listening assistant plan!

description: 영어신문, 이제 어렵지 않게 세련된 영어를 공부해보세요! 클릭한번으로, 또는 모아뒀다 한번에 검색으로 좀 더 효율적인 단어 습득과 해석에 도움이 됩니다. 조금 더 성숙한 언어 습득으로 초딩영어를 탈출할 수 있습니다. 1. 단어검색 영자신문을 보며 모르는 단어가 있으면 클릭 한번으로 바로 검색할 수 있습니다. 기존의 영자신문 앱은 드래그를 해야 하는 단점이 있었습니다. 이제 어려운 드래그 대신 클릭하세요! * 추후 업데이트될 예정인 영어단어장을 이용해 오늘 공부한 영어단어를 체크할 수 있습니다. 2. 숙어검색 여러 단어를 한꺼번에 검색해 보세요 ! 복수검색 기능을 제공하므로 숙어 검색 뿐 아니라 모르는 단어를 한꺼번에 담아 검색할 수 있습니다. * 영영 사전이 연동된 "영문 버전"의 새로운 앱이 곧 출시 예정입니다. 영영사전으로 더욱 자연스러운 영어를 학습해 보세요! 연동될 영영 사전 사이트는 현지인들이 어학연수 중인 학생들에게 추천하는 사이트로 좀 더 직관적인 영어공부에 도움이 됩니다. 곧 출시될 영문판도 많은 이용 부탁 드립니다. * 영어신문은 실제 사용되는 고급어휘들과 세련된 표현들로 이루어져 있지만 어려운 단어가 나오는 경우가 많습니다. 추후 업데이트 예정될 영자신문뽀개기 팁과 단어장을 활용해 보세요! [ 추후 업데이트 예정 ] - 현재 서비스되는 코리아헤럴드, 뉴욕타임즈, 네셔널 포스트 외에 "로이터 통신" 이 추가될 예정입니다. - 영어 단어장 추가 예정 영어단어 검색 후 바로 영어단어장에 저장, 관리 할 수 있습니다. (기한 미정) * 위 앱은 스마트 폰에 최적화 되어 있어 타블렛 PC에선 다소 UI가 깨질 수 있습니다. 양해 부탁 드립니다.
release_text: 원활한 어플 이용을 위해서 항상 최신버전으로 업데이트 해주세요 ! 1. 로이터 통신 추가(14.03.02) 2. 뉴욕타임즈 버그 수정 및 서버 복구(14.02.03) 3. 메인 디자인 업데이트(13.11.23) 4. 코리아헤럴드 서비스 중단 신문사 측의 요청으로 인해 서비스를 중단하게 되었습니다. 5. 서버 이전(13.08) 어플 업데이트를 하지 않으시면 9월 부터는 단어검색 서비스를 이용할 수 없습니다. 현재 제공되는 신문사 외에도 이용하시고 싶으신 신문사가 있으시면 말씀해 주세요. 추가 요청 주신 신문사에 대해서는 별도로 서비스 추가가 가능한 신문사에 대해 선별 작업을 하고 있습니다. 앞으로도 많은 관심 부탁드립니다. 소중한 관심 감사드립니다 :D

description: Download this FREE language pack to use it with your GO Keyboard in Hungarian . Enjoy your every tap and personalize your keyboard! Are you bored with plain android keyboard? We offer the personalized and customized keyboard, from theme, font to key tone, etc. GO Keyboard is a Emoji Free keyboard that delivers smart auto-correction and a user-friendly interface. It supports 60+ languages. The symbols in the keyboard are compatible across all popular apps, including Facebook, SMS, Gmail, Whatsapp, etc. The most important for us - always listening to your feedback! FAQ 1. How to use dictionary pack and enable GO Keyboard on my mobile? Step 1: Download and install Hungarian FOR GO Keyboard Step 2: Click open GO Keyboard icon from home menu, and click through 2 steps to enable GO Keyboard and set as default one; Step 3: Click into Settings -> Languages -> Select your language For more fun and info, follow us on FACEBOOK: http://goo.gl/kLxbSl MORE FEATURES: ★ FREE 800 Emoji and other cute smiley faces explosion (ʘ‿ʘ) It is free to use a pack of 800 emoticons, emoji, and smiley faces. They are grouped into different categories so you are able to find it real fast. ★ PERSONALIZED EXPERT - type fun There are 10000+ colorful themes in market that are compatible with GO Keyboard and new free themes are delivered weekly ! You could also set keyboard background wallpaper image free. Plus, we have several features to make your typing more fun. Voice recorder can transfer your voice into a different one and it is so fun to send to your friends. ★ WORD CORRECTION and suggestions Smart enough to recognize mistyping and provide correction suggestions to you. Sloppy typing is away from you. ★ TYPE what you speak It supports voice input and it frees your hand. ★ GREEN and Pro It is small(smaller than most of the keyboards), green and professional. ★ PRIVACY and security We will never collect your personal info including credit card information. However, you may receive a warning when activating GO Keyboard saying “This keyboard may collect your personal data.” The warning message is just a standard message in Android for ANY third-party keyboard app, so don’t worry.

description: Send your phages to infect all the cells and become a dominant species. Start by selecting (tap) one of your cells. Then select one of the enemy cells or neutral white cells to send phages. Send to your cell to make it stronger. Win by infecting all the enemy cells. Play this real time risk like strategy game for free. You can play 'Match 3' game mode when you are bored. Features: ☆ 45 levels ☆ Puzzle game mode - Match 3 ☆ Beautiful graphics and bacteria movement ☆ Unobtrusive ads More levels soon! If you like this game you can support us with buying ad-free version.

description: The official app for Fantasy Premier League 2014/15 is now available for you to download. As the official fantasy football game of the Premier League, the game has over 3 million players and is the biggest fantasy football game in the world. Managers that have already registered a team for Fantasy Premier League 2014/15 need only download the app before signing in to enjoy managing their team using the app. Alternatively, download and register a team via the app. FEATURES: Pick your team Select your starting XI, nominate your captain, select a vice-captain and change the order of your substitutes. Latest points Review your team’s performance each Gameweek via either the pitch or data view and watch the live points update during Barclays Premier League matches. Transfers Research and make transfers each Gameweek with helpful filters to narrow your options to valid transfers only. Player profiles View player profiles and review each of their points histories throughout the season. Fixtures A full breakdown of key points scorers are provided by Gameweek for every one of the 380 Barclays Premier League matches during the season. Leagues Keep track of your progress within each of the mini-leagues you’ve joined. NEW The Scout Both of the weekly Scout articles are now available within the app. NEW Push notifications Receive alerts when points have been updated, fixtures have moved Gameweeks, when a Gameweek deadline is approaching and when The Scout is available. PRIZES: 1st Prize The overall winner of Fantasy Premier League 2014/15 and his/her guest will be treated to a 7-night break in the United Kingdom and will experience VIP hospitality at TWO Barclays Premier League matches, visit a selection of major UK tourist attractions such as the Tower of London and Madame Tussauds or experience the spectacular Brecon Beacons countryside in Wales. Transfers to and from the UK and 7 nights’ accommodation is also included in the prize. Quarterly Prizes The season will be divided into four quarters: Q1 (GW 1-9), Q2 (GW 10-19), Q3 (GW 20-29) Q4 (GW 30-38). The person that finishes top of each quarterly leaderboard will receive a VIP trip to watch a Barclays Premier League team of their choice with pre-match meal, two nights’ accommodation and transfers included. Monthly Prizes The person that finishes top of the monthly leaderboard will be declared Manager of the Month and will receive a tablet device, a Nike Ordem match ball and EA SPORTS FIFA 15 game. For full terms & conditions and to register a Fantasy Premier League 2014/15 team, please visit http://fantasy.premierleague.com
release_text: - Add both fixtures to Pick Team when players have a double game week

description: Bring prosperity – and hilarity – to your village in this utterly enthralling farming game! Ready to hoe your way to happiness? Plant fruit trees and herbs, care for crops and perfect your fishing skills so that your villagers are never hungry. Create a village layout that’s suitable for agriculture, with new barns, workshops and other buildings. Cooperate with your friends so that you all thrive and succeed in this funny world of farms, crafts and trade! YOU CAN UNLOCK ADDITIONAL BONUSES VIA IN-APP PURCHASE FROM WITHIN THE GAME! ● FARM! – 17 crops to cultivate on your farms ● CRAFT! – Produce goods and tools to grow the economy ● BUILD! – 50+ special buildings to construct ● DECORATE! – 220+ decorations to spruce up your village ● DEFEND! – 14 enemies to fight with all your might ● VISIT! – Catch up with friends and help each other out ● Google Play game services support Plunge into the fastest growing farming simulation game on the Google Play today! _______________________________________ Game available in: English, Chinese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Brazilian Portuguese, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish _______________________________________ COMPATIBILITY NOTES: ***Note*** This game supports high-end smartphones and tablets such as Nexus 7 and Nexus 10. _______________________________________ VISIT US: www.g5e.com WATCH US: www.youtube.com/g5enter FIND US: www.facebook.com/g5games FOLLOW US: www.twitter.com/g5games
release_text: Update 1.8.1: The friends’ list bug is fixed! Now you can visit ALL your friends ALL the time! Update 1.8: Spring has finally sprung! Your favorite farming and village-building game needs your skilled hands. Download this update today! SPRING COLLECTION: Gather 10 unique decorations for a limited time only! BUILD A HARBOR: Dock a ship and trade with overseas merchants. 50 NEW QUESTS: Stay entertained for weeks as you complete each one. MANY IMPROVEMENTS: Enjoy faster gameplay and new interfaces!

description: *** NEW VERSION !!!!! *** The best Android app to manage your Zone! This is the international version of the best Italian Diet Zone app "Calcolo Zona". The Zone Diet isn’t about eating “low-carb” or “high-protein” or anything like that. It’s a diet balanced in • Protein (lean, natural meats are preferred) • Carbs (mostly low glycemic-load fruits and vegetables) • Fat (one of the most important macronutrients!) With the right balance of protein, carbohydrates and fats, you can control three major hormones generated by the human diet – insulin, glucagon and eicosanoids. * English app * * English food database * * GRAMS ONLY * * Banner free * Very simple to use: select food, define miniblocks and the app will give you the weight (only grams) of every part of your meal! Tags: Diet Zone, Blocks, Food, Macronutrient, Barry Sears, Mass index, Weight loss.
release_text: Compatible with Android 4.4 UI improvments

description: Photo Snap will Edit, Organize, Show, and Share your Phone Photos. You can create Photo Albums to Organize Photos and exchange with other devices running Photo Snap. A Slide Shows can be created with Transitional Effects and music playing in the background. You can have any number of Slide Shows and Photo Albums. Photos can be quickly edited with many editing features, and saved in Photo Albums separate from your Camera Roll. Photos can be easily selected to be copied to the Camera Roll, sent using EMail, and shared using social networks. Some of Photo Snaps editing options include Contrast, Brightness, Blur, Invert, Monochrome, Bloom, Gloom, Paper Sketch, Pencil Stroke, Sepia, Hue, Sharpen, Emboss, etc. Slide Show Transitional Effects include Saturate, Slide, Line, Magnify, Spot, Dissolve, etc. Different Times for display can be set for each picture, and the use of priorities to set the order of photos. A 3 dimensional slide show similar to Photo Show is included. You can send photos to your PC running Photo Snap 6.8 (PC, iOS, Android) or Photo Snap 64 bit, FIle Viewer Express (PC and Android), and Photo Show (PC, Android, iOS, and, Macintosh) through your Wi Fi Network from Photo Snap for Android. Photo Albums can be sent and received from your Android, iOS, or PC device running Photo Snap through your WiFi Network.
release_text: Interface Improvements. WiFI Connectivity Improvements.

description: NQ Family Guardian, used with our web portal, allows parents to monitor their children’s location and smartphone usage and manage how kids use their devices. Install the app on your child’s phone to monitor their smartphone activities, including web browsing, app downloads, photo libraries, contacts, text messages and more. With Family Guardian v1.8 we have made a number of feature enhancements, making our app even better! Download NQ Family Guardian for a 30-day FREE trial! Subscribe for US $4.99 per month. Award-winning Parental Controls • Parent Tested Parent Approved Seal of Approval • National Parenting Publications Awards “Honors” Recipient • Best Mobile App Awards “Platinum” Award • International Business Awards “Gold” Award for Best New Software Product or Service of the Year Features: Web Filter: Block inappropriate websites. App Filter: Make smart choices about which apps your children can download. Contact Filter: Prevent harassing calls or texts by blocking certain numbers. Monitors: Keep track of your children’s locations, messages, calls, browsing histories, apps, and photos. Schedules: Control your children’s smartphone use by setting up times when they can make calls, browse the web, text, and play with apps. Geo-Fences: Set up safe zones for your children and receive messages when they’re outside their zone. Parent Portal: Checking up on your kids is as easy as opening a browser window! Our portal lets you monitor your child’s smartphone activities and change their settings, without ever needing to pick up your child’s phone. Locate/Check-ins: Encourage your kids to tell you where they are by using an easy check-in function on their smartphones. You can also locate them if they forget to check in. Panic Alarm: If your kids are in trouble, they can press the Panic Alarm button to send an alert message with their exact location to your phone. Get started in 3 simple steps: 1. Download and install the NQ Family Guardian app on your child’s smartphone and follow the instructions in the setup wizard. 2. Sign up for an NQ account as part of the setup wizard in the app, or at family.nq.com. 3. Sign in at family.nq.com to see your dashboard and view your child’s recent activities. Having “The Talk” Before you set up NQ Family Guardian, download our Kids and Smartphones Toolkit (www.nqmobilefamily.com/familycontract). Developed with the National Cybersecurity Alliance, the kit includes tips to help parents and kids learn about how to stay safe when using your smartphone. Use our Mobile Family Contract so you and your kids can have a clear agreement about appropriate smartphone use. We want to hear your thoughts Love it? Please take a moment to add a review to the Play Store. Problems? Contact us at help@nq.com . With your help we’ll continue to make NQ Family Guardian the best solution for parents and their smartphone loving kids. Keep in touch with the NQ Mobile team. Our blog: http://blog.nq.com/ Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/NQMobile Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NQMobile Like NQ Family Guardian? You’ll love our other products: • NQ Mobile Security: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nqmobile.antivirus20 • NQ Mobile Vault: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.netqin.ps About NQ Mobile NQ Mobile Inc. (NYSE: NQ) is a leading global provider of mobile Internet services. NQ Mobile is a mobile security pioneer with proven competency to acquire, engage, and monetize customers globally. NQ Mobile's portfolio includes mobile security and mobile games as well as advertising for the consumer market and consulting, mobile platforms and mobility services for the enterprise market. As of December 31, 2013, NQ Mobile maintains a large, global user base of 481 million registered user accounts and 136 million monthly active user accounts through its consumer mobile security business. For more information on NQ Mobile, please visit http://www.nq.com/ .
release_text: Bug fixed

description: Diese praktische und kostenlos nutzbare Anwendung ermöglicht Ihnen, die passenden Adressen unter den 987 Campingplätzen, die dem Verband Camping Qualité angehören, zu finden. Wenn Sie in Frankreich unterwegs sind, haben Sie trotzdem unbeschränkt und ohne Internetverbindung Zugang zum Campingführer „Camping Qualité“, denn einmal heruntergeladen ist die Anwendung auch offline verfügbar. Wo auch immer Sie sich befinden, können Sie die nächstgelegenen Campingplätze sowie alle Sehenswürdigkeiten ausfindig machen oder einen Campingplatz über die Suchmaschine suchen und auch auf dessen Verfügbarkeiten zugreifen oder auch Fotos ansehen, um eine Hilfe bei der Auswahl zu haben. Sie können weiterhin den Campingplatz mit einem einfachen Klick auf dessen Telefonnummer oder auf dessen E-Mail-Adresse kontaktieren. Diese Anwendung ermöglicht Ihnen auch, eine Routenbeschreibung für den Weg zum Campingplatz oder zur Sehenswürdigkeit Ihrer Wahl zu erhalten. Zudem haben Sie die Möglichkeit, ihre bevorzugten Campingplätze unter Ihren Favoriten oder im Adressbuch Ihres Telefons zu speichern, damit Sie diese rascher wiederfinden. Viele weitere Funktionalitäten erwarten Sie noch ... Die Anwendung wurde von Planet Bourgogne im Auftrag von Camping Qualité erstellt. This practical and useful free application allows you to find the right addresses to under the 987 campsites, the members of the Union Camping Quality,. If you are traveling in France, you have downloaded still unlimited and without an Internet connection access to Camping Guide "Camping Quality" because once the application is also available offline. Wherever you are, you can make the nearest camping and all attractions locate or find a campsite on the search engine and also access and availability, and also view the photos to be a help in the selection have. You can still contact the campsite with a simple click on their phone number or their email address. This application also allows you to get a route description for the way to the campsite or on the attraction of your choice. You also have the option to save their favorite campsites in your favorites or in your phone's address book, so you can find them quickly. Many capabilities that you expect ... The application was created by Planet Bourgogne on behalf of Camping Quality.
release_text: • Netz 2015 Die Campingplätze haben ihre Informationen aktualisiert und die Neulinge wurden hinzugefügt. • Haben Sie Zugang zu den Beschreibungen der Campingplätze, auch offline

description: Download the Skogman Realty app and discover a variety of different search options and filters, making it easier than ever to search for homes on-the-go in a variety of areas servicing Cedar Rapids and the surrounding areas. Areas of expertise include the following: Corridor, Cedar Rapids, and Iowa City. ________ Version 3 has arrived! We reviewed your feedback and vigorously tested to come up with our best release to date. We improved our back-end system to make searching for your next dream home easier and faster than ever. Next, we simplified our design and created a layout optimized for your home searching experience. Upgrades to the new version includes: Map Pins: Consistent with the new web map search, we color coded the map pins based on property status. Map Callout: Redesigned this to highlight property photos and maintain consistency with our list view. POI Data: Added in the ability to see places of interest while you search for your next home. List View: Updated the look of our list view page to highlight property photos. We also added the ability to lazy load property results as the users scrolls down the list. Property Details: Redesigned this page to achieve a cleaner look including a reorganization of the property’s features. Help Menu: Created a more descriptive and fluent help menu for our apps. We have also added helpful suggestions within the app as the user navigates around. Account/Menu: Restructured this section to focus more on the user’s account information. This set up will allow us to easily add and upgrade features with future updates. Agent Branding: It is easier than ever to brand the app to your favorite agent.

description: The official 2015 Head2Head Fantasy Football Salary Cap app is here to provide you with everything you need to keep track of your Head2Head Fantasy team on the go. Easy to Play Using a salary cap of $100 Million, pick your team of 10 NFL football players who you think will rack up the most points each week using our Head2Head (or "H2H") scoring system. All players have been assigned a salary based on past performance and expected performance this season. You must choose 1 Quarterback, 3 Running Backs, 3 Wide Receivers/Tight Ends, 1 Kicker, 1 Defense/Special Team and 1 Flex Position (any position except a D/ST). Your players will earn H2H Fantasy Points based on their actual on-field performance. Go Head2Head All entries will be placed in a 32-team league made up of eight 4-team divisions - just like the NFL. You'll have the option to create or join a buddy pool (2 up to 32 players) with your friends, family, or co-workers. Or, if you prefer, join a public league! During the H2H regular season that runs for 17 weeks from Thursday, Sept. 10th through Sunday, January 3rd, 2016, you will compete Head2Head each week against a new opponent. Score more points than your opponent and you will post a win for that week! Score Big Points Each week, your players earn points for their actual on-field performance. Points are awarded according to the official H2H scoring system. Making Trades During the season, your players may get injured, suspended or fall into your doghouse. To maintain the strongest lineup possible you can make trades. Dump Romo for Brady or Lynch for McCoy... You make call! H2H Playoffs The top 18 teams in your league will qualify for the H2H Playoffs with the top teams from other leagues. The H2H Playoffs will run Saturday, January 9th, 2016 through Super Bowl Sunday, February 7th, 2016. Winners, including league and overall, will be determined by most cumulative points earned during the H2H Playoffs. Talk some smack! Use league messaging to talk some smack to your opponents or buddies in your league. You'll receive a message indicator on your team account and an email alert that you've been sent a message. This is a great way to talk up your game and get to know your opponents! Important tips! Have fun!! H2H Fantasy Baseball is intended solely for entertainment purposes. But we all know that losing sucks. Try any combination of asking for our advice, throwing objects or even some 12 ounce curls to bring back your sanity. Keep an eye out for good values, aka the "sleeper" (players who have low salaries and yield high H2H point totals). Take note that the salaries may change twice during the season. Once in the middle of the season some salaries will decrease only. Just prior to the playoffs, all player salaries may go both up or down. The National Football League and Google Play and its affiliates are not sponsors or otherwise affiliated with this fantasy game in any way.
release_text: Welcome to the 2015 NFL season.

The naughty Leprechaun is helping Oogie Booogie, he will try to steal the gifts from you and give them to the Boogie man. Get the candy canes to use Santa's power. Run, Santa, Run!!!

description: The outdoors at your fingertips! AllTrails is THE app for exploring the outdoors. Going on a trip to a national park? Looking for a place near home to hike, bike, or run? Searching for something new to do on the weekends? Even in a big city you might be surprised by how much nature surrounds you, and never has it been easier to discover and share! Browse through guides for 50,000 trails across North America complete with photos, reviews, and tracks for outdoor activities including everything from hiking and mountain biking to fly-fishing and snowshoeing. EXPLORE TRAILS • Browse or search for trails closest to you • See community photos, reviews, and tracks • View topographic maps and routes for trails RECORD & SHARE • Track your activities with your phone's GPS • Add geo-tagged photos to your recorded tracks • Easily share your adventures with friends CONTRIBUTE • Add new trails not already in our database • Read and write trail reviews • Share your photos with others MORE • Syncs with your AllTrails.com account • Access our entire trail database without Internet GO PRO • National Geographic TOPO! maps (US only) • 250+ Trails Illustrated maps (US only) • Save map areas to your phone for offline use • Create trip plans & routes with Map Editor • Print maps on-demand before hitting the trail Access more AllTrails Pro features on our website: http://alltrails.com/pro Go out and rediscover the outdoors!
release_text: v3.5 - You can now edit your profile! - ...and also view other members profile v3.4 - Introducing the new AllTrails Outdoors map layer! - By popular demand - you can now add geo-tagged photos & waypoints while recording a track - Easily report an issue on a specific trail - More bug fixes & speed improvements We love hearing from you! Drop us a line: android-support@alltrails.com

description: “Составь слова из слова 2” - это официальное продолжение одной из лучших игр для улучшения и расширения Вашего словарного запаса, тренировки памяти и мозга! Если Вы хотите провести время интересно, весело и с пользой, эта игра создана именно для Вас! Правила игры на удивление просты и гениальны одновременно: в игре ДВЕСТИ ЗАДАНИЙ, которые разбиты на ПЯТЬ уровней по СОРОК заданий в каждом. Для перехода на следующий уровень Вам необходимо выполнить все задания на предыдущем. В каждом задании Вам дается ключевое слово, из букв которого необходимо составить как можно больше слов. Варианты слов должны состоять из трех и более букв. Чем больше слов Вы угадаете, тем больше получите очков. Также за угаданные слова даются монетки, которые можно использовать для покупки различных подсказок, открывать первые буквы в словах или слова целиком. Цель игры - решить все задания и пройти все уровни! Возможности игры: • 200 интересных уровней • Стартовый капитал • Возможность приобрести монеты для получения большего количества подсказок • При покупке любого пакета монет РЕКЛАМА отключается автоматически • приятный интерфейс • соревнование за позиции в таблице рейтингов Game Center • постоянная поддержка и развитие приложения. По всем вопросам, связанным с работой наших приложений пожалуйста обращайтесь к нам по адресу: maxus.desing@gmail.com Тренируйтесь, играйте и получайте удовольствие! "Make a word from the word 2" - is the official sequel to one of the best games to improve and expand your vocabulary, memory and brain training! If you want to spend time interesting, fun, and with the benefit of this game is created just for you! Rules of the game are surprisingly simple and brilliant at the same time: the game TWO JOBS, which are divided into five levels by FORTY jobs each. To move to the next level you need to complete all the tasks in the previous. In each task you are given keyword, the letters you want to make as many words. Variations of words must consist of three or more letters. The more words you guess right, the more points now. Also for the guessed words are coins that can be used to purchase a variety of tips to open the first letters of words or whole words. The goal - to solve all the assignments and pass all the levels! Game features: • 200 exciting levels • Start-up capital • Opportunity to purchase coins for more tips • When purchasing any package coins Trade off automatically • a pleasant interface • Competition for positions in the league table of Game Center • ongoing support and development of the application. On all matters relating to the work of our applications please contact us at: maxus.desing @ gmail.com Train, play and have fun!

description: Ancient Egypt is the perfect app for exploring the secrets of hieroglyphics, mummification, the Pyramids, Tutankhamen, Cleopatra, and other popular Egyptian topics. Learn and play at the same time through a variety of games like Memory Match, Jigsaw Puzzles, and the Magic Square among others. Learning has never been more fun with this interactive and educational app that is based on school curriculum. Britannica apps are fantastic homework help to make sure children get their homework done. At the same time they get fun, excitement and sheer astonishment at the high-tech delights of these new Britannica apps. And as it’s from Britannica you can be sure it’s appropriate and safe for the whole family. Learning about ancient Egypt has never been more fun with this quick, interactive and educational app based on the school curriculum. Ideal for homework help, the app features: Exclusive Encyclopædia Britannica curriculum-based features with high quality videos, pictures and captions written specifically for ages 8-12. Table of contents Chapters: The Ancient Egyptian World Dynasties of Egypt The River Nile Gods and the Afterlife Writing Everyday life Egyptian Gods A-Z -14 top Gods including: Anubis Hathor Isis and Osiris Ptah Re Thoth Then the fun starts: • Map – With this amazing tool you can locate where you are anywhere in the world. Want to see the Pyramids? It’s easy with our map tool, and use the zoom feature to see one of the largest structures ever built up close and personal! • Jigsaw Puzzles, created from amazing graphics of ancient Egypt. Break apart the puzzle and have some fun by shaking your device and then sliding the pieces back into place to complete the puzzle - it’s not as easy as it looks! • Scramble images of ancient Egypt in The Magic Square game by shaking your device. Challenge yourself by re-arranging the squares to unscramble the image. • Brush off - brush the layers to reveal images of ancient Egypt and then try to guess what it is – how many can you answer correctly? • Test your knowledge on ancient Egypt with the Quiz feature - how much have you learned? But hurry: you must answer quickly as the quiz is timed! • Test your memory with the popular Memory Match game and match up the pairs! Why not take your exploration into ancient Egypt a step further and link to Britannica’s online services – Britannica Online for Kids or Britannica Online – to continue your discoveries. Try it today!

description: The Basic/EMT task of Medication Administration is fully illustrated using 3D graphics and the critical skills are tested using interactive exercises. This Administering Medicine lesson includes: verifying the rights of medication administration, how to choose the correct route, how to administer medications in various routes (oral, sublingual, inhalation, nasal, transdermal, subcutaneous, intramuscular, IV, intraosseous injection) and correct technique for monitoring the patient for various complications. It does not cover drug dosages and drug administration. Medrills, presented by Archie MD, provides compelling training material for preventive and general medical tasks such as obtaining IV access, performing CPR, or using an AED. The app is dedicated to an individual medical task and includes:​ 1. An instructional animation providing a deep understanding of the medical task. 2. Training with interactive exercises which enable practicing the task to prepare for assessment. 3. In app purchase of $.99 for a testing section to evaluate the user’s knowledge and skill of a task. Score above 85% with no critical task failures to receive a certificate for nationally recognized 1 CEH credit hours certified by CECBEMS. NOTE – IN ORDER TO RECEIVE CEH CREDIT HOURS AN ADDITIONAL CHARGE OF : $0.99 MUST BE MADE AS AN IN-APP PURCHASE. USERS WHO DO NOT PURCHASE THE CEH AND TESTING MODE MAY VIEW THE INSTRUCTIONAL VIDEO AND TRAINING MODE BUT WILL NOT BE PARTICIPATING IN A CECBEMS ACCREDITED COURSE. CECBEMS verifies that sound education principles have been demonstrated in the development of this educational offering as evidenced by the review of its objectives, teaching plan, faculty, and program evaluation processes. CECBEMS does not endorse or support the actual opinions or material content as presented by the speaker(s) and/or sponsoring organization.
release_text: Added Testing and certification mode. Receive 1 CEH basic hour upon scoring 85% or better in testing mode.

description: Не официальный клиент для сайта GdetoEdet.RU. Данная программа позволяет просматривать состояние ваших почтовых отправлений. Информация о статусах посылки берется с сайта gdetoedet.ru где можно зарегистрироваться прямо из приложения. Клиент получает данные о изменениях в статусах Ваших посылок каждые 6 часов (в полной версии можно изменить этот интервал!) и уведомит Вас об изменениях! Пожалуйста не минусуйте, старюсь учитывать все Ваши пожелания, Спасибо! ВНИМАНИЕ! Иногда китайцы дают фейковые треки типа RW480783741CN, которые gdetoedet не может принять. Такие треки используются, когда они используют более дешевое отправление без трекинга. Если трек не добавляется через приложение, возможно и сам сервис его не принимает. Not an official client for the site GdetoEdet.RU. This program allows you to view the status of your mail. Information about the status of the parcel taken from the site where you can register gdetoedet.ru directly from the application. The client receives data on changes in the status of your parcels every 6 hours (in the full version, you can change this interval!) And notify you about changes! Please do not minus Old consider all your wishes, Thank you! WARNING! Sometimes the Chinese give the fake tracks type RW480783741CN, which gdetoedet can not accept. These tracks are used, when they use the cheaper item without tracking. If the track is not added through the application, and the service itself may not accept it.

description: Create your own spelling test. Speak words or words in sentences, type in the correct spelling and your off! Add unlimited numbers of words and group them into an unlimited number of tests. I created this app to help me with my 10 year old boy's spelling tests. It saves me time when all I have to do is set up a spelling test once and simply hand him the phone to practice each night. Spelling Test Pro keep's track of the words my son gets wrong, and also how many he gets right or wrong. Its super simple to use and saves me lots of time. WHY SPELLING TEST PRO FREE IS BETTER THAN OTHER SPELLING APPS * Create a test with the exact same words you get in homework. Create your own spelling bee. * You'll Know Exactly What Questions Your Child Is Getting Wrong * So Easy Your Kids Will Practice By Themselves * Unlike other spelling apps, there is NO LIMIT to the number of spelling tests you can create! This app will save you hours and hours of time each week. You no longer have to sit down take time out of your day and go over spelling words with your kids. HOW TO USE SPELLING TEST PRO * Create Your Test - Choose the name for your test. - Then add words to the test. - For each word, you type the word and record yourself saying the word. * Take The Test - Select the test to take. - Listen to the word. - Spell the word and hit submit. - See and hear instantly if you spelled the word correctly before going to the next word. * See Scores in real time! - Each time you take a test, you will know which words you got right and which ones you got wrong. Spelling test pro is the best time saving and mobile spelling bee out there! No other Spelling test or spelling bee app out there has so many features for free! If you like this app, please purchase the paid version @ https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.elearning.spellingpaid

description: An addictive & fun memory game. An enhancement of the famous “Simon Says” Test your memory and boost your brain power with this great game Watch the lights and try to repeat the sequence. The sequence will get longer and faster with each round. But be careful, one wrong "tap", and the game over!. This great retro game can be enjoyed by all ages. Features: • 4 Levels of Difficulty (3 to 6 lights) • Timeout (race the clock) • Best Score by level • Language: English / Spanish. • High quality graphics and sounds • Ideal for kids to Develops recognition, memorization and concentration. If you like the game, please rate the app to help us keep improving the game and create new ones. Thank You !!! We invite you to play our free games : - Learn Coloring - Coloring Book - Cartoons - Learn to Spell - Simon - The Game - Piano Magic - Puzzle Mania for Kids - MemoMatch - Memory Game

description: 7th Grade Math Learning Games is a year’s worth of math lessons, worksheets, and problems for seventh graders. Covering 19 common core subjects with a near endless amount of questions, it is perfect for teachers or parents who want to give their students a fun way to practice and learn. Track your student’s progress with detailed reports and multiple profiles. And students will want to keep playing as they earn tokens to spend in the arcade! This free version allows for up to 20 questions per day, 1 arcade game, and 1 profile. Get the full version through a simple in-app purchase to unlock the entire game. *** Features *** + Common Core Aligned - All subjects and questions are aligned with Common Core State Standards (CCSS) + Thousands of Questions - The problems are randomly generated, so every round will be different + Track Students Progress - Create multiple profiles for each student and track their progress with detailed reports + Fun Way To Learn - An arcade with 5 fun games makes students want to keep playing and earning more tokens *** Topics *** + Ratios and Proportions -- Compute Ratios; Proportional Relationships; Multi-Step Ratio and Percent Problems + The Number System -- Add and Subtract Rational Numbers; Multiply and Divide Rational Numbers; Real-World Problems with Rational Numbers + Expressions and Equations -- Properties of Operations / Linear Expressions; Rewriting Expressions, Multi-Step Problems with Rational Numbers; Simple Equations and Inequalities + Geometry -- Scale Drawings; 2-D Figures From 3-D Figures; Circles; Angles; Area, Volume, and Surface Area + Statistics and Probability -- Sampling and Populations; Measures of Center and Variability; Probability; Probabilities of Compound Events
release_text: null

description: Double-Alpha Academy and On-Core Software are proud to bring you the SHOTMAXX Trainer. This advanced new app is the perfect tool to keep track of your IPSC / USPSA / IDPA training sessions. Designed to allow you to record your time and points of every practice string that you shoot, the SHOTMAXX Trainer provides you with the tools you need to keep accurate logs of your training sessions and maximize the effectiveness of your practice. With the SHOTMAXX Trainer you can create drills, enter and save shooter’s details, record total scores or individual target hits. It allows you to enter the time manually, or links by Bluetooth to the DAA SHOTMAXX timer to automatically receive the individual split times of each shot fired. You can then enter comments related to each shot if needed. With SHOTMAXX Trainer you can create a training session with an unlimited number of shooters and drills. You can record your sessions and then share the results by email, Facebook or utilizing the Dropbox cloud feature. SHOTMAXX Trainer features include: • Track training sessions for one or more shooters. • Enter Drill details and include a picture of the drill for future setup convenience. • All IPSC and IDPA divisions are available to choose from – or you can add additional divisions/categories of your own. • Double-Alpha SHOTMAXX timer integration. Split times can be received vie Bluetooth directly from your SHOTMAXX timer, or entered manually. • Times can be entered manually via a big button keypad. • iOS devices can be backed up and synchronized using the Dropbox Cloud. • Sessions will keep track of your score, shot time and hit factor. • You will be able to sort the results per sessions, sorting by name, time, points or hit-factor. • You will be able to enter comments regarding individual split times, to record information about a particular shot. • Drill scores can be entered as one result (IPSC 95/100 for example) or using the individual Target scoring calculator, which allows you to enter the hits on each target. • A Repetition can be exported to Messages, Mail, Twitter or Facebook. • The whole Session can be exported by Mail. • Drills can be Imported or Exported. Download pre-made drills from users on our Forums. • Batch mode for only recording shots, without scoring points/score.
release_text: New in this version: - Fixed Dropbox sync - Cosmetic fixes when importing Drills

description: This is a safe and easy-to-use application which is intended to help you record and keep track of your working hours across multiple projects or jobs . You'll be able to use this application in almost any career or field: Sales, Accountants, Clerks, an Office setting, Doctors, Consulting, Cashiers, Waiters, Managers, freelancing and the list goes on... Every working person should be able to find a use for such an application. There is no right or wrong way of using it - use it the way it works best for you - its really very easy to use. We wish that you find this tool to be very useful, we are actually also using this product and will provide many upgrades for future improvements. This version of the app is completely ad-free!! Current Features: -Manage Projects/Jobs. -Record duration of Task(s). -Application Notifications. -Work on multiple projects at the same time. -Ability to attach Names and Summaries to Tasks. -Maintain existing Tasks (Editing of task Times, Names, and Summaries). -When opening a Project you can currently view or edit tasks previously recorded. -Ability to set preferences on using the Application settings Window. (Will be extended with new Features) -Ability to export tasks to Files and Share them. Our current features are limited, but stable. Try it out and grow with us and let us know what special requirements and use cases you have. Road-Map (Future Features): -[In Progress] Ability to backup and restore data from specific file formats. -[Pending] Automatic Backup. -[Pending] Backup & Restore using Google Drive and DropBox. -[Pending] Ability to view simple statistics from your devices. -[Possibility] Ability to sync data to a server and sync data to different devices. -[Possibility] Ability to manage data and view statistics from a website. PLEASE NOTE: * When removing this application, your information related to this application (Tasks and Projects) will be removed. A backup, restore and data migration tool is in development at the moment. * This application does not provide any guarantee of any kind. (e.g. Loss of recorded Information) Please use at own risk. Special Thanks to: -Graphics: C du Toit -Developer: IP Hough Privacy of your information: -We do not collect any personal information from you although we do collect non-personal non-project usage data to determine where to improve the application's user experience e.g. frequency of use of specific application screens. -We might allow you to store your recorded information on our servers at a later stage (For backup purposes). -No ads at this time. Thank you for your support! If you have any queries please contact us: http://www.meerkathut.com/?action=contact
release_text: Version 2.1.0 - FILE EXPORT & SHARING * Exporting of Data and Sharing it. * Security and stability improvements. * Fixed renaming of multiple unnamed projects. * Fixed issue opening Project from Notification. * You can now create unnamed projects. * Increased button sizes. * Fixed task name validation, now limited to 35 characters in length. * Redesigned user interface. * Some new UI elements which will help make things easier for you.

description: SCIENCES ET AVENIR vous fournit une information complète et accessible sur toute l'actualité scientifique, des articles de synthèse dans toutes les disciplines: les sciences naturelles, l'environnement mais aussi les sciences humaines. Cette application est un kiosque numérique. Elle reproduit l’intégralité du magazine papier publié chaque semaine. Grâce à l’interface de consultation, vous pouvez ensuite : - Lire le journal avec un grand confort et faites défiler les pages en une fraction de seconde - Feuilleter le journal en mode portrait ou en mode paysage A propos de miLibris : miLibris conçoit et développe sur mesure des solutions de lecture numérique pour les éditeurs et pour les groupes de presse. SCIENCE AND FUTURE provides you with a comprehensive and accessible information on all the news scientific review articles in all disciplines: natural sciences, but also the environmental sciences. This application is a digital newsstand. It reproduces the entire print magazine published weekly. Through the consultation interface, you can then: - Read the newspaper with great comfort and scroll through the pages in a fraction of a second - Browse the Journal in portrait or landscape mode About miLibris: miLibris designs and develops custom solutions for digital reading for publishers and media groups.

description: Play NFL Football with Your Friends Every Day in NFL Showdown! The New NFL Team Manager Game is Now Available on Mobile! Create your very own NFL football dream team and compete in daily showdowns! Manage your favorite NFL franchise, win the Super Bowl and build the ultimate dynasty. Compete in head-to-head matchups with your friends as well as other NFL fans all week long. Choose from real NFL players and even receive real-time stat boosts based on Fantasy Football player performance. You get to develop the winning strategy: update rosters, choose a starting lineup, sign free agents, train players and build gameday tactics. Instantly pick up and play with no long-term league commitments. It’s authentic NFL fun 365 days a year, even in the off-season. Join a short season to start winning trophies and prizes today. Every day is Gameday with NFL Showdown! • Authentic NFL League Structure - Manage Real Teams and Real Players • More than Multiplayer - Compete in Daily Head-2-Head Matches • Connect with Friends and Meet New NFL Fans Each Season • Live Out the Highs and Lows of Real-Time NFL Drama • Build and Upgrade Your Dream Team with Auctions and Trading • Train and Strategize to Gain a Competitive Advantage • Collect Trophies and Earn New Rewards as You Progress • Watch the Field and Stadium Simulated Experience Streaming Live in Real-Time • Be a Manager Not Just a Quarterback or Running Back • Passing, Tackling, Touchdowns and Field Goals are Just the Beginning • Don’t Play in Solo Mode or Flick - Champions Win Online with Skill! • More Community, Challenge and Excitement than Fantasy Football • Features Virtual League Updates, Live Scores and Schedules Officially Licensed Product of National Football League Players Incorporated | NFLPLAYERS.com ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES • Use of this application is governed by the Zynga Terms of Service. These Terms are available at http://m.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service . • For specific information about how Zynga collects and uses personal or other data, please read our privacy policy at http://m.zynga.com/privacy/policy . Zynga’s Privacy Policy is also available through the Privacy Policy field in the Developer section below. • The game is free to play, however in-app purchases are available for additional content and premium currency. In-app purchases range from $0.99 to $99.99. • This game does permit a user to connect to social networks, such as Facebook, and as such players may come into contact with other people when playing this game. • Terms of Service for Social Networks you connect to in this game may also apply to you. You will be given the opportunity to participate in special offers, events, and programs from Zynga, Inc. and its partners.
release_text: The 2014 NFL season may be over but with NFL Showdown you can win a Super Bowl each month! We’re listening to our players so keep an eye out for MANY more great features coming soon. Check out what’s new in this update: • Sponsorships – A new way to earn coins! Once your team is sponsored, follow the sponsorship details to earn your free coins. • Variety of Crash & Bug Fixes – We’re continuing to monitor and update the game to create the best experience possible!

description: Note: a 10-15MB content download will be required the first time the application starts. Bring Canada's national historic sites and the best of Canadian heritage cooking into your home with the Parks Canada Heritage Gourmet food app. Embark on a culinary journey through Canada’s rich history and across Canada’s vast territory by trying out the recipes – which have been updated for modern cooks - and reading the stories in this app. Aussi disponible en français. * Choose from over 70 recipes, each with a stunning photograph of the finished dish. * Browse recipes from the 18th century to today, representing all of Canada's regions. * Enjoy traditional recipes that have been chef-tested and modified for today's cooks, with both imperial and metric measures. * Search or browse by ingredient, course, menu, period or region. * The app is self-contained - no internet connection is required after the initial download and periodic updates. Save recipes to your personal recipe collection. * Add ingredients to your Shopping List to bring with you to the grocery store. * Share recipes with friends and family using email, Facebook and Twitter. * Cook traditional favourites like Acadan Bouilli, West Coast Finnan Haddie and Newfoundland’s Jiggs Dinner. * Enjoy national historic site tried-and-true favourites like the Fortress of Louisbourg’s French Soldier's Bread, Woodside’s Marmalade or Lower Fort Garry's famous Corn Bread * Try out recipes like Bannock, Luski and Sourdough Flapjacks that were originally cooked over an outdoor fire. * Cook an entire meal using one of the menus. * Learn a story about each recipe - tell your dinner guests or family which notable Canadian enjoyed a particular dish, how a dish got its name or which 18th century cookbook a recipe first came from. * Watch a behind-the-scenes video of the chefs and photographers at work. * See a video of chefs creating an 18th century dessert using today's ingredients. * Find out about the national historic site of Canada that submitted the recipe and start to plan your next culinary adventure.
release_text: Now optimized for tablets. Share recipes using Facebook and Twitter.

description: Need a Pebble Smartwatch? http://getpebble.com The FREE, ad supported version of Coffer for Pebble. Has all the features of Coffer for Pebble, but supported with an ad banner. I realized that this app was made to satisfy a need that existed before the Pebble 2.0 App Locker; therefore I've decided to make it available to everyone to store personal watch faces and apps still available for download outside the Pebble App Store. Enjoy! Overview: -A perfect place to store your personally generated watch faces. -Categorize watch apps into watch faces, apps and games -One touch install directly to your Pebble smart watch -Add your most used watch apps to your "My Coffer" list for quick access -Quickly add a picture to your apps -Add an app by entering a web URL, scanning a QR code, clicking on a web link or even by opening in a file explorer Details: Not sure where to put all your personally generated watch faces? Want to save all those mini games for later use? Coffer offers a versatile and intuitive way for you to keep track and store all your favourite watch faces, apps and games. Instead of always browsing web sites to find and restore your favourite watch apps, simply store them in Coffer and install them directly to your Pebble with a single click. You can quickly populate Coffer with Pebble watch apps already stored on your Android device, by browsing the web on your device and clicking on links to watch apps, by scanning app QR codes or by manually entering web URLs. You can even add a picture to remind you of exactly what the app looks like! As soon as you select a watch app, the app's name and summary will automatically populate in Coffer! If you are ready to take control of the Pebble watch apps you use and love, give Coffer a try.

description: Can you identify the Asian Country by name? Do you know all the countries and capitals in Asia? Test your knowledge of the Countries this Asian Country Quiz. A great quiz game for all ages. Learn the Countries as you play. Keep Score on how well you know the Countries. Choose from 2 different categories: * Country's Name - Try to associate a picture of the Country with its name. * Country's Capital - Match the Capital to the correct Country You can choose from 3 different game types: * Choose the correct Country from 4 different pictures. * Choose the correct Country clue from the picture. * Flashcards - View different pictures of Countries to help you at identifying states. Includes a link to get more information about the country. The score is based on the number of questions, the percent answered correct, and the time it takes to complete the quiz.

description: CHRISTMAS SPECIAL The same game than Luckiest Wheel, but now in special Christmas version. It has the same panels than the original one, but it looks more Christmas friendly and also has some Christmas special panels to guess. We hope you enjoy it and... MERRY CHRISTMAS! ;-) Solve as many panels as you can before the time's up! Make your self millionaire spinning the wheel! Win virtual dollars, or duplicate the available time, but be careful! you can also fall into bankrupt losing all your money, or get your time cut by half. Challenge your friends on multiplayer mode and show who is the clever one. Lauch the wheel sliding your finger over the yellow arrow. The more nexted panels you solve, the more money you will get to beat your own scores. DISCLAIMER: "The Luckiest Wheel" is NOT an official game from "The Wheel of Fortune" and it has no endorsement and no relationship with no TV show or TV channel. There is no help screens yet, although I think it is rather intuitive, here are a couple of tips: - You cannot solve the panel before discovering a given percent of the letters that varies with difficulty level. At that time the light bulb key will be enabled and you may use it to solve the panel. - To use vocals you must buy them and the price is $200 ($2000 from 1.7.1+) for each. So if you have less than such amount they will be disabled until you reach such quantity. - It uses no punctuation chars like ',', or '.', etc. so the genitive is formed without ' char, i.e. "Joe's car" will be shown as "Joes car" instead.

description: ****IMPORTANT:Calibrate your device by moving it in figure 8 pattern before each use to ensure compass is accurate (this will calibrate it against magnetic interference). Hold your device flat, use just like a real compass.**** Compass PRO is the compass in your pocket, when you need it, where you need it. Compass PRO has the following functions: - Shows direction of north, south, east and west - Shows degrees in “side window” - Rotating bezel ------------------ HOW TO USE COMPASS PRO? First we’ll need to cover a little bit of compass jargon first. The part of Compass PRO that moves and always points north is called the card (with N,S,E, and W indicated, and a beveled edge with a series of numbers on it). There is a movable ring around the edge of the compass, called the bezel. A red double line across the top of the compass is called the lubber line, and finally, there is a little window above the compass which is often named as side-window (as it is on the side of a real compass). Side-window navigation couldn’t be simpler. You point the lubber line on top of your compass at where you want to go. Now as long as you hold your compass flat in front of you with the lubber line pointing in the direction you’re going, you should always see the same number in your window as long as you’re going the right way. If you see a different number, turn until you see the same number. The downside of the side window method is that you need to remember your number. Navigating with bezel works essentially the same as using the side window, but your bezel remembers your number for you. All you do is, point the lubber line on top of your compass at where you want to go, and then wait until the card settles down and stops moving. Then turn your bezel until the double triangle on the edge of the bezel (the notch right by the number zero on the bezel) is bracketing the north arrow on the card. Now as long as you hold your compass flat in front of you with the lubber line pointing in the direction you’re going, you should always see the north arrow inside the notch, as long as you’re going the right way. If not, turn until you see the north arrow inside the notch. Notice that if you’ve adjusted the bezel correctly, the number in the side window is also the number directly across from you at the front end of the lubber line. In other words, if you turned the bezel counterclockwise until the notch bracketed the north arrow, the 120 on the bezel would be at the far end of the lubber line. Notice that on the card, the number showing in the side window is 120. If you were holding this compass and going in the direction of the lubber line, you’d be on a heading of 120. Now you should have learned how to go to desired direction. But how do you get back? Easy! If you’re thinking in terms of the bezel, simply turn until the north arrow faces not to the notch, but to the single triangle that’s exactly across from the notch. Now you’re pointed back where you came. The really tricky part of using your compass isn’t learning what the numbers mean and how to adjust the bezel. The most common mistakes are not holding your compass flat, and not actually going in the direction your lubber line is pointing. Large iron and steel objects can influence the magnetic sensor in your Android device, causing it to point in the wrong direction. This is called deviation. If you suspect this is happening, simply move away from the object several feet and the problem should correct itself. ------------ Other features: - Simple to use, use it like a real compass - Professional design - Large numbers and large rotating bezel - Audio Effects on rotating bezel - Incredibly smooth movements - Professional and optimized coding to keep application size as small as possible - It’s FREE

description: Monotag is an experimental application which was developed by Yahoo! JAPAN Research using our image recognition technology. Please note that monotag service might stop without preliminary notification because it is just an experimental application. If you take a picture of what you want to know using monotag, monotag tells you what it is. Currently monotag can recognize books, CDs, DVDs and food/beverage packages. Please note that these products are Japanese. Even if monotag cannot recognize the object, you can register the object to monotag. Then, monotag can recognize the object. Since the object which you registered are shared among monotag users, if everyone registers a few objects, monotag will be able to recognize most objects around you. Moreover monotag can track the object with a decoration image, when you turn on the decoration mode. Please enjoy it! description: Erfassen Sie ganz einfach Ihr Krafttraining mit Hilfe des Fitnesstagebuchs. Legen Sie dafür einfach einen neuen Trainingstag an und erfassen Sie die durchzuführenden Übungen in einer Liste. Pro Übung können Sie eine beliebige Anzahl an Trainingssätzen eintragen, die jeweils Gewicht und Anzahl der Wiederholungen enthalten. Ein weiteres Feature ist die Countdown-Funktion für Pausen zwischen den Sätzen, die eine vorher definierte Zeitspanne in Sekunden runterzählt. Eine vordefinierte Liste mit Muskelgruppen und Übungen erleichtert den Einstieg. Jede Übung ist einer Muskelgruppe zugeordnet, was die Erfassung eines Trainings beschleunigt und die Übersichtlichkeit fördert. Weitere Muskelgruppen und Übungen können über die Einstellungen hinzugefügt werden. Tags: Kraftsport, Kampfsport, Fitnesstraining, Bodybuilding, Fitnessstudio, Dokumentation, Gym, Muskeln Easily capture your strength training with the help of fitness diary. Put it simply a new day of training and record the exercises to be carried out in a list. Per exercise, you can enter any number of training sets, each containing weight and number of repetitions. Another feature is the countdown timer for breaks between sets, which counts down a pre-defined period of time in seconds. A predefined list of muscle groups and exercises facilitates entry. Each exercise is associated with a group of muscles, which speeds up the detection of a training and promotes clarity. Other muscle groups and exercises can be added via the settings. Tags: Weight training, martial arts, fitness training, bodybuilding, gym, documentation, gym, muscles

description: Phantom Slayer is a simple but fun maze/exploration game, based on the original game for the TRS80 Color Computer. You explore a 3D maze, attempting to kill off the phantoms in the maze. You get an audible clue when phantoms are nearby, rapid heavy breathing. Your gun has a two second recharge time, and there is also a teleport in the maze which takes you back to your start. You can have either modern or retro graphics. This game is now nearly thirty years old, but the original was notoriously creepy. I think I've managed to get some of the original 'creepiness' in the game. This game is free as in really free, it is open source, there are no adverts, nothing you can buy, sell or rent, no extra levels. It's just there for a bit of fun if you want. Or not if you don't.
release_text: I have changed the breathing effect so it gets louder the closer you get - thanks for that idea Mandie.
