description: Test your swiping skills in this exciting, ultra addictive candy matching game, featuring four different and fun modes. Use awesome power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous candy packed levels as you try your hardest to master the game. Beat your friend’s scores on the leader board and share your successes with them on Amazon’s Game Circle! From the developers who brought you the incredibly popular gem matching game 'Gem Collapse'! ☆ NO IAP whatsoever. DELUXE VERSION FEATURES (You are looking at the deluxe version) ☆ NO ADS! ☆ Zen mode; relax, chill and play without the timer in the Arcade, Candy Collector and Score Panic modes. ☆ Time Attack mode; help the candy store collect enough candy to feed kids on the school bus. ☆ Lots more candy pieces ☆ Additional backgrounds for the boards ☆ Good karma for supporting an Indie developer! Note: any game save from playing the free version can be used in the paid version. ALL VERSION FEATURES ☆ Super-charged match-3 puzzle game play. ☆ Stunning graphics, fully optmised for small, medium, large and extra large screens. ☆ Four uniquely different modes; Arcade, Candy Collector, Score Panic and Time Attack (deluxe only) ☆ Many different types of delicious looking candy - don’t let your friends catch you lick the screen :) ☆ Each mode is easy to learn, yet hard to master. ☆ Explosive power ups. ☆ Separate leader boards for each mode and a combined board to show who’s really the candy king or queen! ☆ Progress is saved in every mode - try out the different modes without losing your saves. ☆ Use Amazon cloud backup to play on all your mobile devices without losing your progress. Game saves work across iPhones, iPads, Android devices and Kindles. ARCADE MODE Candy town has been attacked by a very sour tasting candy virus. The population are revolting, as are the sweets! The nasty tasting candies have occupied the board and injected their virus into the tiles, turning them sickly white. Your mission is to swipe and remove the rougue candies, killing the virus in the tiles and turning them back to their normal sweet color. CANDY COLLECTOR The candy monsters, Fungy, Freddie, Flora, Fury and Flimsy are very, very hungry. Their keeper took an unexpected holiday and has left them without any of their favourite food, candy! Your job is to collect the candy and feed the monsters before time runs out. SCORE PANIC You've been charged with looking after little Billy. His Dad’s gone shopping and left you to keep him happy! Don't panic! Billy loves candy, and you've got plenty. TIME ATTACK (Deluxe Version) Help! The candy store is low on candy and a bus load of hungry kids have just arrived! Your job is to make sure the store has enough candy to feed the kids, before time runs out and the kids have to get back on the bus. GUARANTEE The loyalty and trust of our customers is very important to us. If you are not completely satisfied with a MeYuMe product then please contact us at meyume-games@xtremics.biz . JOIN US! ☆ Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/meyumeapps ☆ Twitter: http://twitter.com/MeYuMeApps ☆ Tweet: @MeYuMeApps ☆ Web: http://meyume.com ☆ Sugar Candy Swipe on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/SugarCandySwipe GAME PLAY Match 3 games are puzzle games. You need to match 3 or more candies by swiping them with your finger in any direction. Swiped candy are removed from the board and new candy dropped back onto the board. Matching more than 6 pieces of candy can trigger the spawning of power ups with special abilities, helping you clear larger areas of the board.
release_text: Fixed bugs

description: Schedule Deluxe - the ultimate helper for school and study. The app is designed for pupils who want to have their entire school life under control, students who want more control in their studies or simply parents who want to their childrens schedule with them. In addition to the curriculum itself can also manage homework and grades easy and straightforward. In order not to go into detail, I will mention only briefly discuss the five main reasons for this timetable: 1) Main Function: Schedule Colors for subjects can be chosen freely. Day View (Classic) Week, next x subjects. Several lesson plans are created. 2) very comfortable input (without limitations): Speech recognition and date picker. Entries can be edited, deleted and copied. 3) homework assignments with priority and due date 4) exams and grades Exams can be created and applied including weighting grades (credit). The average is calculated automatically. 5) widget and backup function Note: Widgets do not always work from SD card! Have fun with the app. For further details and questions: http://tobiasschuerg.de/stundenplan

description: A aplicação Económico Digital permite-lhe subscrever, descarregar e ler a edição digital do Diário Económico todos os dias antes mesmo de chegar às bancas. Poderá acompanhar toda a informação económica, rigorosa e independente. Uma ferramenta de trabalho indispensável, quando e como quiser. Económico. Está onde você estiver. Principais Características e funcionalidades: Lista de últimas edições: subscreva, descarregue e aceda a edição diária do Diário Económico Informação de Bolsa: consulte os valores dos títulos os principais mercados mundiais Secções: toda a informação económica das principais categorias informativas Quaisquer dúvidas poderão ser esclarecidas através de assinaturas@economico.pt através deste email poderá ainda enviar as suas sugestões. The Digital Economy application allows you to subscribe to, download and read the digital edition of the Economic Journal every day before you even hit newsstands. You can follow all the economic, accurate and independent information. An indispensable work tool, when and how you want. Economic. You are where you are. Key features and functionalities: List of past editions: subscribe, download and access the daily edition of the Economic Journal Scholarship Information: See the values ​​of the world's major securities markets Sections: all the economic information of the main informational categories Any questions will be answered via email through this assinaturas@economico.pt can also submit your suggestions.

description: Recently featured as Amazon's free app of the day! Calling all able-minded crew members: The human race has made contact with aliens and is facing the worst threat to mankind in history. The Paladin stands alone against this superior race, the Cholerans, and you are its captain. Astral Plague is a "top-down 2D shooting bonanza" in the unique genre of part shooter and part 'tower defense' games. Combining diverse levels, varied enemies and superb graphics, this game brings a new level of awesomeness to the fight to save humanity: the Cholerans must be fought at any cost, or the human race will fall. Features: ** Numerous ship and turret upgrades, as well as powerups and high-explosive extras ** Free demo with the first 3 levels ** Spend your hard earned cash from defeated Cholerans in the high-tech weapons shop ** 4 different turret types, all upgradeable to defend your planets ** A choice of either on-screen joystick or tilt-control for tailored gaming ** 3 different enemy types, trying to kill you and your planets in many ruthless ways "Astral Plague is an inventive twist on the retro space-shooter genre, with intuitive tower-defense aspects and a slew of additional weapons and power-ups. While I found it remarkably tough at times, it’s still compelling and enjoyable to play. If you like modern takes on retro classics, or just enjoy the pulsating gameplay of slick futuristic shooters, this is ideal for you. The game is well worth downloading and checking out and, with more levels to come in the new year, it will only expand and improve in the coming months. 4.5 / 5" Paul Wilks, AndroidTapp.com If you like games such as Pew Pew, Geometry Wars or Gun Bros, you'll like this one too. Here are some other search terms to help people find the game: space game shooter action awesome tower defense tilt accelerometer dual stick bullet hell
release_text: 10th November 2012: It's been a long time since we've worked on Astral Plague! But it was an old favourite of ours, and we thought it was time to refresh it a bit. This update is primarily about improving first impressions for new users - the first few levels are significantly shortened in length, and some buttons are clarified. However, it also makes a significant change that should be appreciated by all - upgrading a tower now fully repairs it as well.

description: Speed Cameras by Sygic is a FREE, most accurate and easiest to use GPS based app, which lets you: • See the speed limit for the road you are traveling on • Get the real-time alerts of mobile radar traps and fixed speed cameras location • Know about speed limit changes & exceeding the speed limit • Drive more safely thanks to acoustic and visual warning • Display speed limits and warnings also in other apps, such as Google Maps • Track your mileage and useful driving stats using Trip log feature • Record videos of your trips with the premium Dash Cam function ★★★★★ “It's a perfect driving companion.” - Tuaw.com Get real-time alerts of 60,000+ fixed speed cameras & radar locations ► Know where the red-light cameras are hidden ► Know the location of fixed speed camera Join other drivers & report new traps ► Report new traps, police radar, mobile camera with a single tap ► Get help from other drivers and stop worrying about speeding fines The easiest to use speedometer, speed limit, trip log & dash cam app ► Beautifully designed app with essential features only ► Choose your metrics – km/h or mph & set your own speed alert Keep track of useful statistics about your driving with Trip log ► Speedometer by Sygic is your perfect GPS mileage log tracker ► Track your mileage and view your driving history ► To have the best picture about your driving behavior, see the useful statistics in your Trip log PREMIUM FEATUES Speed limits ► Know the speed limit for the road you are travelling on ► Get the real-time alert when you exceed the speed limit ► Worldwide coverage of speed limits is available in 120 countries Head-Up Display ► At night, info is projected directly into your line of sight - the windshield ► This allows you to process information faster and keep your attention on the road ► Works when it’s dark without any additional accessories or devices ► When HUD is running, tap on it to flip the screen and place under the windshield Speed limits and warnings in other apps ► The app can display your current speed, speed limits, and warnings also in other apps (such as Google Maps) ► All information will be displayed as an overlay above the apps you choose Premium speed cameras ► The world’s largest online speed cam database from premium providers ► 300 000+ real-time alerts of mobile speed cameras and police traps each month The 1st speedometer app with integrated Dash Cam ► Record videos from your trips with Dash Cam (black box) feature ► Use the videos as evidence in case of an accident or an insurance fraud ► Record 5-minute videos in 1-minute segments, with the oldest video deleted ► Dash Cam (black box) feature records video and audio, including date, GPS coordinates & speed ► Head-up display mode let's you use your windshield as a state-of-the-art HUD device * Sharing recorded videos by Dash Cam is forbidden by law in following countries: Slovakia, Austria, Spain, Switzerland, Luxembourg, Belgium and Portugal Sygic | Bringing life to maps.
release_text: Improvement: accuracy and reliability of speed limits Update: speed limits updated worldwide Update: thousands of speed cameras added and updated Fixes & improvements: various bugs and stability issues If you like the app, please take some time to leave us a nice review. Thank you for your support!

description: Description This application will allow you to use your phone as a dashboard camera. Background recording is supported so you can use your phone for navigation, music, receiving phone calls, or even turn the screen off while continuing to record looping video in the background. DashCam is currently being actively developed. If you encounter a problem, please consider using the Email Developer link below rather than just leaving a low rating, that way I can attempt to resolve the problem for you ASAP. Free Features: * Background video recording. * Notification for background recording with stop recording, keep current video and open application actions - all three available together only from Honeycomb (Android 3.0+). * Set file duration, and number of files to keep - oldest files automatically removed. * Disable recording beep - only available on Jelly Bean MR1 (Android 4.2+). * Tap screen to store current file permanently while app is running. * Video preview with the option to disable preview while recording (reduces battery usage). * Select storage folder location. * KitKat SD Card access supported. * Estimated storage requirements and warning if these exceed available space. * Current file duration display. * Disable sound recording from settings * Lock App Orientation * Configure Camera Rotation Offset - Some devices incorrectly report the orientation of the camera, causing a rotated image, this can be manually corrected. * No ads / no internet connection required for use (you will need to be connected to upgrade to premium, but only for the purchase process). Premium Features * Auto Start Stop Recording - When App starts, on Paired Bluetooth profile connect/disconnect, on Dock connect/disconnect (car dock, any dock, any power), on Car Home Screen open/close. * Auto stop is delayed till the end of the next file, so that in the event of an accident and the phone coming out of the dock, or Bluetooth failing a few minutes of extra footage is recorded. This can be disabled in settings. *option to log GPS for each video file, saved as GPX, KML or KMZ format. * View route for kml and kmz files in Google Earth from file manager. * Set Video Resolution - NB This feature is limited to only max or min resolution for Gingerbread and earlier (Before Android 3.0). * Set Video Frame rate * Lock the camera focus on infinity (experimental feature to stop some devices focussing on the windscreen). * Auto keep current recording on high G-Force detected. * Manage stored and temporary files - Permanently keep temporary files, delete files, view files (using the default player for mp4 files, this may require installing a 3rd party player of your choice). * Clear all storage Notes: Files are written to the subfolder "/DashCam" under the location you select. Files you tap to keep are moved to subfolder "/DashCam/Keep" Caveats / Known issues: Some older phones ignore the video rotation when recording. The Nexus One for example. This means if you mount these phones at an orientation other than their default the video will appear rotated on playback. This happens with the stock camera too. If you close the app while recording, or if it is backgrounded when receiving a phone call, and you have the video preview while recording turned on, you will lose the preview until the next file starts recording.
release_text: Fixed bug with mute during call. Improved stability and error handling Improvements to responsiveness Significant bugs resolved for background triggered recording Better handling of in app purchases when offline Premium feature partial upgrade removed, now only free or full premium available. (all existing purchases will still work) Notification added to lock screen (Lollipop+) Added start and stop from Tasker Allow triggering from multiple Bluetooth devices, ie more than 1 car.

description: The friendly Gem Genie will give you many precious jewels if you can match 3 or more gems of the same colour on the board (horizontally or vertically). But there is a catch... you only have a limited amount of time to gather as many as you can! If you align more than 3 gems at a time you get bonuses and more time to play. If you run out of moves, not all is lost! Being magnanimous, the friendly Genie will give you a whole new board... but you will incur a 3 second penalty :-) Try to earn bonuses by aligning 4 gems or more and zap entire lines or columns! If you play well, the Genie will even play for you for a few seconds ("Autoplay" function). Gem Genie is a classic match 3 game (like Bejeweled or Candy Crush) which is 100% free (no ads, no in app purchase). It is safe for kids :-)

Se puede configurar a través de: Configuración -> Entrada de voz y los ajustes de salida -> Ajustes de voz -> velocidad de la voz P: ¿Cómo puedo cambiar el acento de la voz? description: Are you ready to learn Indonesian? Welcome to Babbel. Discover Babbel's wide variety of courses and start making progress quickly. Try it now! WHAT THE PRESS SAYS “The app I’ve found most powerful is Babbel.” – New York Times “7 apps you don’t want to miss.” – Mashable "9 out of 10" – Wired FEATURES - For users with or without previous knowledge - Extensive selection of interactive courses - Entertaining listening, writing, and speaking exercises - Vocabulary trainers for a wide variety of topics - Easily graspable grammar exercises - Effective pronunciation training with voice recognition - Integrated Review Manager to help consolidate what you've learned - Synchronization between website and mobile or tablet PLEASE NOTE You'll need a Babbel subscription in order to access courses and features. The quantity of courses offered may vary according to which display language you use. There are two subscription options: One-monthly subscription for $US12.95 per month, automatically renewed until canceled. One-yearly subscription for $US83.40 per year, automatically renewed until canceled. Your subscription will automatically renew unless it is canceled before the end of the current payment period. You can manage and cancel a subscription in your Google Play Store account. -------------------- About babbel.com: Learn Indonesian with Babbel: With the babbel.com website learning system, you can learn Indonesian flexibly online. The courses are divided into manageable themes and offer you a variety of different Indonesian exercises: Beginner and refresher courses, grammar, verb training, tongue twisters, phrasebooks and much more. The courses have been developed by experts and improved with years' worth of customer feedback. Interactive Indonesian exercises for vocabulary and grammar as well as other tools enable you to pinpoint and learn what you need. Fear of speaking? No problem. Thanks to integrated speech recognition, you can rate and practice your Indonesian pronunciation. The intelligent review manager presents the vocabulary you've learned in optimal intervals for review. This helps embed what you've learned in your long-term memory. Learning languages on the internet has never been so easy! With Babbel you won't just learn quickly, intuitively and flexibly, but also more affordably than with traditional language courses. You can try the first Indonesian exercises online - free of charge and with no obligations. Learn English, Spanish, French, Italian, German, Brazilian Portuguese, Swedish, Turkish, Polish, Dutch or Indonesian and communicate with people from all over the world. Just give it a try! We're happy to have your feedback. Write with your questions and suggestions to: support-mobile@babbel.com -------------------- VISIT US: http://www.babbel.com FOLLOW US: http://twitter.com/#!/babbel CIRCLE US: https://plus.google.com/+BabbelPlus FAN US: http://www.facebook.com/babbel.languages

description: Самый большой сонник! Около 10.000 предметов для толкования сна. В работе приложению "Сонник" не требуется интернет, все данные загружаются локально, что позволяет получать толкование снов мгновенно! Основные особенности приложения "Сонник": 1. История – каждая статья, которую вы когда-либо просматривали, сохраняется в истории. 2. Избранное – вы можете добавить статью в список избранного, нажав иконку “звездочка”. 3. Управление списками Истории и Избранного – вы можете редактировать эти списки или очистить их. 4. Различные настройки – вы можете менять шрифт и тему (выбрать одну из цветовых тем). 5. Виджет “Случайная статья дня”. Чтобы увидеть виджет в списке, приложение должно быть установлено в память телефона (база данных может быть установлена куда угодно). В приложении содержится реклама. The biggest dream book! About 10,000 items for the interpretation. In this paper, the application "Dream Book" does not require internet, all the data is loaded locally, which allows to obtain the interpretation of dreams instantly! Key features of the app "Dream Interpretation": 1. History - every article you ever viewed is stored in history. 2. Favorites - you can add an article to your favorites list by clicking "star" icon. 3. Manage History and Favorites - you can edit these lists or clear them. 4. Various Settings - you may change the font and theme (choose one of the color themes). 5. Widget "Random article of the day." To see the widget in the list, the application must be installed to the phone memory (database can be installed anywhere). The annex contains advertising.

description: Jewels Blitz is a classic jewel matching game with many new exciting features and awesome visual effects. The best free Bejeweled style puzzle game on Google Play! Easy and fun to play, Challenge with your friends! Enjoy this social crazy jewel casual game! Your goal is Solve all the puzzles and try to get 3 star for each levels! Have fun in this puzzle adventure!' How to play: Match 3 or more identical Jewels. Collect target Number of jewel on the board in each level to level up. Eliminate the Jewels quickly can get extra time bonus. Do not forget submit you highscores to leaderboard,have fun!! Features and Props: Well-designed levels,easy to bring you lots of fun but it could train your reactivity ability. Row-Lighting (Eliminate all the same-row jewel) Column-Lighting -- Eliminate all the same-column jewel. Bomb -- Eliminate all the around jewel. Changing -- Eliminate all the same-color jewel. Leaderboards in your friends circle and world. Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master. Many challenging puzzles to make the game more addictive. Tasty graphics with HD UI and cool Effects. It is suitable for everyone, and play it at any time. A big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played jewels Blitz!

description: ★Join the bold and wily Puss in Boots in his exciting adventures as he tries to make his master’s fortune. The latest in the acclaimed series of Grimm’s Fairy Tales from StoryToys★ Text and voice-overs in English, French, German and Spanish StoryToys adds a much-loved story to the award winning series of Grimm’s Fairy Tales. Young readers will love the re-telling of this classic tale of no ordinary cat. With a wealth of 3D pop-up scenes, puzzles and games to be discovered, expect to be captivated from start to finish. ★Chase the squeaky mice away from the mill ★Choose from a variety of outfits for Puss in Boots to see him magically transformed ★Help our hero leap over obstacles as he makes his way to the castle ★Try to balance a see-saw by filling a bag with the King’s treasure ★....and many many more! StoryToys specialises in bringing fairytales into the digital world while retaining the substance and tactility of real books. Magical interactive pop-up scenes and a range of rich features keep readers returning to our apps over and over again. ★ Full 3D experience - it’s just like a real book ★ Wonderfully illustrated, with beautiful, colorful imagery ★ Fully narrated in each language by professional actors ★ Read to Me, Read it Myself, and Autoplay modes ★ 33 beautifully presented pages of text ★ 9 interactive 3D pop-up scenes with simple tasks and games to perform ★ Featuring a beautiful musical score and plenty of amazing sound effects Editor Picked by AppEggs.com! Now includes optional extras - a 3D Sticker Book and a Jigsaw Puzzle Pack, with lots of content absolutely free, plus the option to purchase more (this feature can be turned off in the Parent Center).

description: Farkle Dice is an exciting fast paced dice game for 2 – 4 players. It's a duel to 10,000 points as you play against famous western heroes, outlaws or your friends. Roll the dice to earn big points! That one combination of skill and luck could make you the new Sheriff of Old Town, USA. *** SUPER OPTIMIZED FOR BOTH TABLETS & PHONES *** *** English | Spanish | French | German | Japanese | Korean *** *** Leaderboards and Achievements using Google+ *** *** Downloaded over 850,000 Times *** Farkle Dice has stunning artwork, engaging sound, and is both fun to play and user friendly. You'll have hours and hours of entertainment for FREE. Both new and experienced players will love the clarity of the score board and how quickly you can jam out a game while in a meeting (before someone notices). Make sure to turn down the sound effects first or you'll be caught. 100% dice randomization to prevent cheating. Each roll uses a robust randomization algorithm implemented by our lead engineer. The computer player has the same chance you do. Sometimes, you have to take that extra risk and roll again! • Optimized for Tablets and Phones • Tons of customization options! You set the scoring rules to how you want to play. • Customize Break-In Score • Customize Points to Win • Customize Three Pair Scoring • Customize Rolling a Farkle Score • Customize Hot Dice Setting • Customize 4, 5, 6 of Kind Setting • Customize Straight Score • Customize three 1s Score • Play against up to three of your friends (Pass and Play) • Play against different western outlaws and heroes, each one offering a unique challenge • Share your winning score in Facebook or Twitter • Fantastic graphics, professionally drawn • Professional sound track and sound effects • Stats to track your best game, turn, wins, and more • New player hints pointing out which dice can be scored (they can be turned off in settings) • Perfect for that five-minute break or long commute ** Frequently Asked Questions ** Q. How do you play Farkle Dice? A. The rules can be found by tapping 'Menu' then 'How to Play'. Q. When does the 'Score It' button become active? A. You need to select at least one scoring dice. Q. Which dice can be scored? A. The dice with the arrows above them can be used for scoring. You can turn the arrows off in Settings. Also known as Zonk, Zilch, 5,000, 10,000, Wimpout, Hot, Piffle and Farkel. We are constantly updating the game. If you experience any problems, please email our team and we will investigate the problem right away.

description: PLAY POKER, FREE SINGLE PLAYER HOLDEM POKER OFFLINE on your Android and beat every cowboy in Texas in this great Texas Hold'em Poker RPG game called Governor of Poker 2. Millions of poker players have enjoyed Governor of Poker, without an internet connection. With an easy Texas Holdem poker tutorial for players that don't know how to play poker, but want to learn poker and good opponents for star poker players with real poker skills! The poker chips you win are required to buy houses, win transportation, play against advanced poker AI opponents, win Texas and beat the new Governor of Poker. •Get ready for many hours and hours of Hold'm Poker play: - Over 80 challenging poker opponents to beat; - 27 stunning card saloons in 19 amazing Texas Holdem cities; - Get hold of the five big poker assets. •Amazing Texas Poker AI Engine: A great poker engine will challenge new poker players and world poker champions alike. Refine your tactics to match the countless poker playing styles of your opponents and watch them go "Steamy" and Tilt after showing off your great card bluffs! Players will play better in each new city and poker tournament, no cheating allowed! •Full Story: Governor of Poker 2 starts where the first game ended. A new Dallas government decided to put a ban on all Texas Holdem poker games and now considers the game to be illegal. Time to take matters in your own hands and prove them wrong! Poker isn't a game of luck, but requires poker skill. •Play Always and Everywhere Offline Poker, no internet connection required: Because there is no live internet connection needed to play a good game of Texas hold'em poker, you can just play Governor of Poker 2 offline anywhere you want! Don't wait for human players in multiplayer poker games, that don't respond or leave the pokergame or go allin all the time. Just play this offline poker game ! •Customize poker characters: Prove you are a bigshot by customizing your poker style to fit your reputation. Be sure to visit one of the many great hat shops across Texas and get yourself the poker deluxe hat of your dreams! The game includes HD Poker graphics for a great experience on all Android phones and tablets. Travel through Texas by Train, Casino Boat or Stage Coach and play poker whilst on your way to the next poker city in Texas. description: Do you like to solve crossword puzzles? Or do you make crossword puzzles? Then this app will stand with you side by side to face the challenge. - Large word/clue collection: the app is built on top of a database of 240K+ words and over 2 million clues, which were collected from major daily newspapers in the past 50 years! - Bi-directional search: the app has two modes: CLUE TO WORD and WORD TO CLUE. CLUE TO WORD mode is for crossword solvers, while WORD TO CLUE is for crossword puzzle makers. - No microSD card required. Your phone/tablet doesn't have a microSD slot? No problem. Unlike some other large apps, it doesn't need one. Note: When you run Crossword Clue Finder for the first time, it will automatically install the database. The process may take a few minutes to finish, but you only need to do it once.

description: Would you like a math ACT score in the 30's? I had a feeling you'd say that. description: Ever imagined to capture real life motions like walking or dancing in a single click ? Presenting one of the best stroboscopic effects app on android. Now capture every single moment without a miss. --------------------------------------------------- x ---------------------------------------------------------- What is stroboscopic Effect all about - ▶ It is a technique of making objects in motion freeze. ▶ Captures in between picture frames from a running video. How to use the app - ▶ Hold the camera for 3 seconds to capture a video ▶ For better results, hold the camera still ▶ At an interval of 3 seconds, a frame is captured automatically. ▶ Enhance captured image with finishing filter ▶ Edit the photo using simple editing tools such as crop, rotate, contrast and more ▶ Save your image in the phone gallery ▶ Share your photo creation in Facebook, Mail and Twitter For best results keep some distance between the moving object and the app! Find out more about InstaFusion and our other apps at http://www.techblavision.com and follow us on Twitter @techblavision For any support please contact us at support@techbla.in

description: The first known documented tarot cards were created between 1430 and 1450 in Milan, Ferrara and Bologna in northern Italy when additional trump cards with allegorical illustrations were added to the common four-suit pack. Have you ever feel confuse about your future,love affair,fortune,career,study and health?Do you want someone who could give you some suggestions when you feel upset?Why not using tarot?You can find the answer form tarot. Features: 1.22major arcane. 2.Comprehensive analyses for each cards. 3.Perfect animation effects for presenting you good using experience. 4.Discover your status from past,present to future. 5.The more complex the spread is the more accurate the divine would be. Spreads: The Three card(simple)spread:This is probably one of the oldest spreads in existence. It is good for a quick answer to most questions and looks at the past, present and future surrounding the question.It gererally use for Love、Relationship and Career and Study. Greek Cross Spread:This is the quickest and easiest tarot card spread to use when you want an answer to a specific question. To make this spread, you only need to use the major arcana.It generally use for diving Love. Celtic Cross spread:This is a very useful spread when trying to decide a given course of action. Card 4 will often reveal a subconscious impulse - perhaps a blockage which is stopping you from achieving your desired result. Card 5 shows the possible results from taking a given course of action. The spread works best if, whilst selecting the cards, you concentrate on one aspect of the decision, rather than either/or type questions.It generally use for diving Love ,Relationship ,Career and Study. Hexagram Spread:this is a traditional way to arrange the cards, and uses seven cards. After you choose your six cards, flip them over to see what secrets they reveal about your situation. Choose to ask questions about Love, Career, Study, Health, and Relationship. The Horseshoe Spread:this is a simple and versatile spread. It will help the seeker understand how personal beliefs and expectations shape the future outcome.

description: ◆Math Wars - The popular web based math game that was played more than 1 million times is now available on Android! If you are bored with typical app with endless single digit additions, or looking for a math game for kids where they can make a progress towards more advanced math while having fun, this game is for you. In a 1 minute test, it first starts with elementary school additions and quickly the level of problems presented is adjusted to best fit the player's expertise in calculation. Therefore, this game is suited for both grade 1 kids and grownups with good mental arithmetic skills. At the end of the test, your score and your estimated "brain age" is shown. Although brain age is far from scientific, it's fun to share with your friends and motivates kids to play the game with joy. It usually takes some mental math tricks to score brain age under 30, but you might pick up along the way if you kept practicing everyday. Problems presented in Math Wars are limited to calculations with basic arithmetic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division). Some problems are solved faster if you are familiar with the likes of fraction, sum of arithmetic/geometric sequence, factorization, etc (which you will see only when you are very good at math).

description: You are a Mad Scientist who in a matter of seconds can invent just about anything and build it from almost nothing. Just a couple of minutes ago, you had a makeshift rocket and a strong desire to get away from an uninhabited island. Getting away was simple enough; but the problem is your best friend, the most loyal Dog in the world, got left behind. A regular scientist would be devastated. Even a good scientist wouldn’t know what to do in this situation. A genius would come up with a formula to avoid anything like this in the future. But a Mad Scientist is simply going to fly around the Earth and come back to the island to reunite with his canine partner. All he needs is a little bit of help... Around the world in ten minutes! Vast seas, high mountains, scorched deserts, treacherous ice, and dangerous jungles -- nothing can stand between the two best buddies. description: MasterCalc's Features: -User defined: formulas, math functions and constants. -Evaluate automatically your own formulas. -Evaluate your own functions (up to 3 functions), the same way as built-in functions. -Greek and Latin alphabet. -Built-in functions: Logarithms, trigonometric and hyperbolic functions, factorial, combinations, permutations, greatest common divisor, least common multiple, absolute value, modulus. -Solve systems of linear equations and determinants up to a size of 5 x 5. -Built-in formulas to compute: Vectors: norm, scalar and vector product, trigonometry. -Implied multiplication. -Retrieve last result and recent calculations. -Function Graphing.(up to 3 functions). description: "File Locker" allows you to browse files and folders on your device and encrypt all private files and folders with (or without) a password. encrypted (locked) files can never be opened on your device or any other device (or PC) even if "File Locker" is not installed. encrypted file can only be opened after being unlocked by "File Locker" with the same password used to lock it. "File Locker" encrypts the whole file, not just the beginning of the file so, your file is completely secure. "File Locker" appends ".flk" to the locked files/folders names to distinguish locked files from other files. "File Locker" has elegant user interface, clean design, great reliability, and extremely high performance. =================== To lock files or folders: =================== 1- browse to the target file(s) or folder(s) and check the checkbox beside it (its name turns into green). 2- press the lock button, enter a password or leave empty. 3- an encrypted file with the same name plus a ".flk" extension is created to replace each selected file or folder. 4- that's it. =================== To unlock files or folders: =================== 1- browse to the target ".flk" file(s) and check the checkbox beside it (its name turns into green). 2- press the unlock button, enter the password used to encrypt the file(s) or leave empty if you didn't use a password. 3- original files and folders are restored to replace ".flk" files. 4- that's it. =================== Note: Red files and folders are system files and can't be encrypted. =================== Note: this app is a highly-secure encryption app and that prohibits providing any password-recovery procedures. the user is responsible for maintaining the used password. if i provide any password-recovery methods, your data will not be secure. ===================

description: How to play, pause and skip music tracks in Google Maps or any other app (for example Navigon, TomTom, CoPilot, Skobbler, WhatsApp, Chrome) without switching to your music player app? This app automatically detects when Google Maps, Google Navigation or any other app of your choice is active and shows an overlay displaying music controls. Features: - No advertisements! - No internet access necessary, no backdoors sharing your private information; - Controls a music player app of your choice on your device; - Compatible with many music player apps, like most stock music players, Google Play Music, Spotify, Deezer etc; - It automatically shows and hides, depending whether Google Maps/Navigation (or any other app of your choice) is active or not; - Three music controls: play/pause, previous track and next track; - Choose between horizontal or vertical orientation; - Adjustable transparency; - Adjustable size; - Adjustable position, just drag it anywhere you like; - Can be used with any app installed on your device. Please contact us if this application does not work properly on your device. We will try to fix the problem for the next release. Explanation of permissions: Display system-level alerts This app will remain active in the background (no battery drainage) and shows an overlay on top of Google Maps/Navigation while active. Draw over other apps With this permission the app is able to detect if Google Maps/Navigation is active.

description: BLUE/BLACK SYSTEM THEME THIS THEME IS COMPATIBLE WITH HDPI OR XHDPI DEVICES THAT ARE RUNNING CM9, CM10, OR AOKP BASED CUSTOM ROMS WITH THEME ENGINE SUPPORT PLEASE BE AWARE THAT THIS IS A "LITE" VERSION, WHICH THEMES ALL OF THE SYSTEM APPS, AND MANY OF THE MOST COMMON CUSTOM ROM INCLUDED APPS, LIKE ROOT EXPLORER, TWITTER, FACEBOOK, BUSYBOX, ROM MANAGER, CMUPDATER, LAUNCHERS, ETC. THE PAID VERSION OF THIS APP, JellyBlueX, HAS OVER 600 DIFFERENT APPS THEMED, PLEASE CHECK IT OUT FOR A COMPREHENSIVE THEMING EXPERIENCE! THIS THEME REQUIRES ROOT! This is a thorough system theme with frequent updates that incorporates many "holo" style blue/black attributes. INSTALLATION (PLEASE READ/FOLLOW FOR SMOOTH RESULTS): 1) Download theme application 2) Go to System Settings and select Themes 3) Choose JellyBlueX_free and click "Apply Anyway" through the standard "missing assets" warning. 4) Reboot (This is a MUST for changes to apply correctly!) 5) Enjoy ***If you are using a Paranoid Android based ROM, make sure to set your per-app UI layouts and densities appropriately...for instance, if you're phone has a 480x800 screen size, make sure your density and UI settings aren't set for a 1280 screen*** Themed Features: Animated statusbar notification icons Power menu icons Settings icons and buttons (works for all configurations) Notifications pulldown Popups Just about every system app (Email, Dialer, Calculator, etc) Battery, signal, wifi icons Tons of apps (including ADW, Rom Manager, Root Expl, Google apps, xda developers, etc) Volume sliders Notification power control Incoming call slider Tons more...too much to list here For more information and support, go to: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1835458 ">JellyBlueX Thread at XDA Forums Special thanks: Team Cyanogen, http://www.team-carbon.com/ ">Team Carbon, Romanbb, http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1873300 ">Kroz, and KinGDaViD63
release_text: 7/20/2013: Themed more icons and some bug fixes. Still working on Gmail issues when using the "Dark" feature on some custom roms All new launcher theme to match this theme perfectly, with 700+ icons and 15+ docks, is up on the Play Store now. For use with ADW, Apex, Nova, or Go. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mmapcpro.JellyBlueX_Icons_Theme 7/17/2013: More icons and various coloring fixes

description: Benefits: • View, edit and create your documents that you needed to bring to your PC • Create professional diagrams with rich style with your finger tip • Apply transition effects and run animations on your presentation • Simple and intuitive user interface optimized for your smartphone and tablet Main Features: • Fast to open and scroll • Mobile-friendly editing menu • Insert various objects (Support to insert video clip) • High rendering quality and compatibility • Add annotation, memo and highlight on PDF file • Optimized file management on mobile devices • New documents with templates • Online storage service (ThinkFree Online) • Template download * File Manager Optimized file management and UX make it easy to perform common tasks such as multi-selection, open, rename, search, copy, delete, and send. Quick and easy access to the recent files list enables you to find recently edited documents conveniently. * Online Storage Documents can be uploaded or downloaded via web storage service such as ThinkFree Online. In the future, various cloud services will also be linked through the Cloud Connector Service for synchronizing content on various devices and platforms. * Edit Menu Intuitive UI and optimized UX provide a PC-like editing experience, making it easy and convenient to perform edit tasks. * Insert Objects The option to insert various objects allows you to create unique documents. You can insert tables, shapes, drawings and video clips with the best UX. A library of 23 images, 36 shapes, 8 line styles, and 12 charts helps you create professional looking documents. * Rendering Quality Compatible with respect to 3D shapes, Pro provides high quality figures and renders various object effects such as neon, shadow, and reflection. It also displays smart art that is compatible with MS Office. Advanced Features: • Dynamic & visual effects • Inserting video clips • Slide note • Inserting annotations on PDF • Easy calculation • PC-like functions • Various fonts • Integrated quick text-viewer • Extra features * Animation & Transition effects Pro supports a variety of animation effects such as entrance, fly in, pinwheel etc. Slides with animations are displayed with a star (★). Adding a transition effect (24 kinds of effects) is also easy using the contextual menu on slide’s thumbnail view. * Insert Video Clips Show supports multimedia effects to grab an audience’s attention by delivering dynamic presentations. * Slide Note Show supports slide notes that allow you to add annotations with a stylus pen or finger during a slide show. * Insert PDF Annotations PDF viewer supports highlighting on important content and annotations using shapes, comments and lines for emphasis. * Numeric Keyboard & Easy Calculation Calc not only provides accurate and complex functions, but also supports function search, which is similar to the MS Office feature. * Various Fonts A variety of font types corresponding to MS Office are provided, enabling you to select exactly what you want to use in your documents. * Integrated Quick Text Viewer If you need to open and read a large text heavy document, ThinkFree Mobile Pro will quickly change to a text viewer mode. * Hyperlink, Dictionary, TTS Inserting hyperlinks to objects helps you to support documents with more detailed explanations. You can also search for the exact meaning of words using the built-in dictionary and listen to the words via the TTS (Text-to-Speech) feature.
release_text: * Now supports Android 4.4 Kitkat! * Several bug fixes

description: Best Snow White theme free casino slots machine - pokies game that you will love for outstanding graphics highlighted by a number of cool Snow White animals-related icons. Furthermore, the effects are also exemplary. Snow White slots have 5-reels and 15-paylines where there are Irish folklore related icons - canons , frigates , solders and mademoiselle , as well as sticky wilds, free spins, and win-both-ways play! You never know what you could catch within this Snow White jorney pokies game; like up to 205,500 coins! How to play Snow White Casino Slots: This pokies is played using the following buttons: Paytable - Push this button to get an overview of the various features of Casino Slots Machine. Level:-/+ - These buttons determine the number of credits wagered per line. This may be as little as one and up to as many as ten. Autoplay - Enable the pokies autoplay feature by clicking on this button. Spin - Push the big, central, green button to spin the reels with the settings displayed on the screen. Max Bet - Click here to maximum the highest wager possible with the coin value showing. Coin Value: +/- - Adjust the coin value by clicking on these two pokies buttons. Sticky Wilds: Substituting all symbols except scatters, this bonus feature shows up on reels 2 and 4 and stays on the reel for as long as it’s a winning symbol on an active payline. The wild symbol is represented by a white wolf, perfect for catching those big wins. Snow White slots Free Spins feature: Three or more scatters landing anywhere on the reels will activate the Free Spins feature. How many free spins you win depends on how many scatters you lured onto the reels (speaking creatively, of course; if only it were that easy!). 3 scatters reel in 10 free spins. 4 scatters reel in 15 free spins. 5 scatters catch 20 free spins. Free Spins can retrigger, and all free games are played at the activating wager.

description: If you're like me checking the futures charts every day or so, you'll love this little widget that I made for you. With this widget on your homescreen (*see how do I add a widget to my homescreen below if you don't know), you're just a click away for a quick look at the markets that really interests YOU! ★★★ 4x2 cells minimum (4 horizontal - 2 vertical) required by this widget ★★★ You can choose the following timeframes for your charts: - 5 minutes charts - Hourly charts - Daily charts - Weekly charts Indices, Bonds, Currencies, Energy, Metals, Meats, Grains, Softs ... pick the ones you like (double click on the widget to enter your own settings): Dow Jones, S&P 500, Nasdaq 100, Russell 2000, Nikkei 225 10 Year Bond, 30 Year Bond USD, EUR, JPY, GBP, CAD, CHF, AUD, NZD Crude Oil, Natural Gas Gold, Silver, Copper, etc ★★★ CLICK on the widget => update and go to the next chart ★★★ ★★★ DOUBLE CLICK => enter the widget settings ★★★ ★★★ The widget does not update itself automatically for the moment (to save your battery life), I may add this option in a future version. You need to click on the widget to update the charts ★★★ You can resize the widget to your taste if you have Android 4.0 and above. You can add more than one widget on the same or different homescreens. Enjoy! I hope that you’ll enjoy this little widget and that it will save you time going through your favorite futures list... Please get back to me with some feedback, Regards, cousinHub WaveStock.com Charts are coming from FINVIZ - Thank you so much Alex. Copyright © 2010 FINVIZ.com. All Rights Reserved. ★★★ It is still under development, so please rate it accordingly ★★★
release_text: v1.09: PRO v1.06: SHARE+ button v1.03: refresh first chart on homescreen (before going to next chart) if the last click on the widget was more than 1 minute ago v1.02: launcher screen added (w/ a quick help on how to add a widget to the homescreen) v1.01: Button 'Choose All' and 'Clear All' added in the settings. When you click on the widget it shows 'Loading...' in the header and footer to show that the widget is busy getting the chart on the internet.

description: Crash landing on an uncharted planet for Zap has been a bad day. Help him out by gunning through all the waves of enemy bugs coming at him. Purchase bullets for the many different weapons to smash the insect invasion. Similar to asteroids you are placed in the middle of the area and tap all over the screen to shoot the bugs before they reach the center. This fast paced one touch input game will get your heart pumping and fingers tapping. Included is amazing in game artwork by the talented Paul Conway at DoomCube.com. • 21 Levels • 5 Different weapons • Unique enemy bugs • Great Art by Paul Conway • Ants, Beetles, Wasps, and more • New areas and upgrades coming soon. This game is still young many more levels, areas, purchases, and updates will be coming soon. Rate it and leave a comment. Send us an e-mail with requests, ideas, or issues.

Click on Legende Anzeigen to see the listing of the element groups. The app is in German with an option to switch to English when displaying the details of the elements as well as the listing of element groups. Diese App stellt eine bildliche Darstellung des Periodensystems der Elemente. Klick auf jedes der Elemente um Details dieses Elements sehen. Klicken Sie auf Legende Anzeigen, um die Auflistung der Elementgruppen siehe. Die Fähigkeit, Informationen auf Englisch anzuzeigen ist ebenfalls verfügbar.

description: Random Logic Games is proud to present our take on this popular style of pics and words quiz game! It is a fun and addicting game that will challenge your logic and reasoning abilities while at the same entertaining you for hours! If you love to solve problems and consider brain teasers to be fun then you’ll love Guess The Word!. All of the images will have one thing in common, and it’s up to you to figure it out! The game starts out pretty easy, but as you progress, it becomes more challenging! Instructions: When you open the game, you’ll see an image and a word blank. Type your answer with the letters provided to fill in the blanks! Have fun! --- HINTS! --- Guess The Word offers three different ways to help you solve a puzzling puzzle: · Expose a Letter reveals the next correct letter! · Remove Letters takes away some unnecessary letters! · Solve the Question gives you the answer so you can skip to the next puzzle!
release_text: We've added 200 MORE questions! This brings the total to 800 questions for you to guess! Can you guess them all? Enjoy!

description: Superamos las 120000 descargas entre todos los Ayuda PSU, gracias a todos por al apoyo y su feedback. Estoy ahora avanzando en actualizaciones para las aplicaciones, agregando más contenido y otras funcionalidad que los ayuden más. Los invito además a revisar un canal de youtube que creé, en donde estoy agregando preguntas interactivas de PSU. http://www.youtube.com/user/AyudaPSUClases Voy a subir vídeos también allí para que contesten preguntas, y que la gente que no tiene smartphone con Android pueda practicar de forma parecida también. Practica para la PSU mientras vas en la Micro, en tu dormitorio, donde sea! Esta aplicación permite practicar, con rondas breves de ejercicios, las preguntas de la PSU de Química referentes a: - Química Plan Común - Química Electivo Las rondas son de 10 preguntas cada una, escogidas al azar de una base de datos de más de 120 preguntas en total, a la cual se le incluirán más preguntas constantemente para evitar la repetición de ejercicios. Cada pregunta a su vez cuenta con su solución y explicación correspondiente, con la finalidad de poder aprender el razonamiento sobre el cual se soluciona cada interrogante. Espero que puedan aprovechar los contenidos entregados y que les vaya muy bien! Siento haber sacado la aplicación tan tarde, espero que sirva para el próximo año...

description: Paiement Mobile Sans Contact de La Banque Postale – clients Orange Avec le Paiement Mobile Sans Contact(1), réglez vos achats directement avec votre mobile simplement et avec plus de sécurité ! Aujourd’hui La Banque Postale lance sa toute dernière solution de paiement innovante. Cette application(2) vous permet de régler vos achats du quotidien avec votre mobile, chez les commerçants équipés d’un terminal de paiement électronique ou d’une borne de paiement affichant le pictogramme Sans Contact. Une technologie qui vous simplifie le quotidien : - Pratique et rapide : votre smartphone vous accompagne partout et devient votre moyen de paiement. Fini le temps d’attente en caisse, vous n’êtes plus jamais en manque de monnaie, vos achats sont réglés en un seul geste. - Simple : vous pouvez payer jusqu’à 300 euros par transaction en France et sans limite de montant à l’étranger(3). Les transactions sont directement débitées de votre compte bancaire. - Sécurisé : le moyen de paiement est chargé dans votre carte SIM, qui est aussi sécurisée qu’une carte bancaire classique. En cas de besoin, un Service Client dédié est à votre écoute. Les fonctionnalités de l’application : L’application « Paiement Mobile Sans Contact » vous permet de bénéficier de plusieurs fonctionnalités intégrées : - la personnalisation du mode de paiement automatique ou manuel, - l’historique de vos dernières transactions, - la géolocalisation des paiements effectués, - le guide d’utilisation, la FAQ et les contacts utiles. Pour bénéficier du service Paiement Mobile Sans Contact de La Banque Postale, rendez-vous en bureau de poste des villes proposant la souscription. Pour connaitre la date de mise en service dans votre ville, connectez-vous sur www.labanquepostale.fr(4). Téléchargez gratuitement l’application « Paiement Mobile Sans Contact » pour découvrir le service et les modalités de souscription. Vous avez une question ? Contactez votre Service Client dédié au 09 69 320 004(5), du lundi au vendredi de 10h à 21h et les week-ends et jours fériés de 10h à 18h. (1) Sous réserve du bon respect des conditions d'éligibilité et après acceptation de dossier par La Banque Postale. (2) L’application de Paiement Mobile Sans Contact est réservée aux clients de La Banque Postale, âgés de 16 ans et plus (avec accord du représentant légal pour les mineurs), résidant en France métropolitaine et détenteurs d’un équipement mobile (carte SIM, smartphone et forfait) compatible avec la technologie NFC auprès de l’un des opérateurs partenaires (Orange, SFR et La Poste Mobile). (3) Dans la limite du plafond d’utilisation de l’application de Paiement Mobile Sans Contact fixé à 600 € utilisables sur 30 jours glissants. Plafond en vigueur au 01/01/2014, susceptible d’évolution. (4) Coût de connexion selon fournisseur d’accès. (5) Appel non surtaxé, coût de communication selon le tarif des opérateurs de télécommunication en vigueur. Contactless Mobile Payment La Banque Postale - Orange customers With the Mobile Contactless Payment (1), make purchases directly from your mobile easily and more safely! La Banque Postale today launches its latest innovative payment solution. This application (2) allows you to pay for your purchases with your mobile daily, in shops equipped with electronic payment terminal or a payment terminal contactless symbol showing. Technology that simplifies your everyday life: - Convenient and fast: Your smartphone is always with you and become your method of payment. No more waiting time on hand, you're never short of money, your purchases are made in a single step. - Simple: You can pay up to 300 euros per transaction in France and unlimited amount abroad (3). Transactions are directly debited from your bank account. - Secure the means of payment is charged to your SIM card, which is as secure as a conventional credit card. If necessary, a dedicated Client Service is for you. The application features: The "Mobile Contactless Payment" application allows you to take advantage of several built-in features: - Customization of the automatic payment method or manual - The history of recent transactions, - Geolocation of payments, - The use, FAQ and contacts useful guide. For service Contactless Mobile Payment La Banque Postale, go to post office towns offering subscription. To know the date of service in your city, log on www.labanquepostale.fr (4). Download the free application "Mobile Contactless Payment" to find the service and how to subscribe. Have a question? Contact your dedicated Customer Service 09 69 320 004 (5), Monday to Friday from 10h to 21h and on weekends and holidays from 10h to 18h. (1) Subject to the smooth fulfillment of the eligibility conditions and after acceptance of the file by La Banque Postale. (2) The application of Mobile Contactless Payment is reserved for guests of La Banque Postale, aged 16 years and over (with consent of the legal representative for minors), residing in France and holding a mobile device (card SIM smartphone package) compatible with NFC technology from a partner (Orange, SFR and La Poste Mobile) operators. (3) In the ceiling of use of the application of Mobile Contactless Payment set at 600 € used 30-day rolling. Ceiling effect at 01/01/2014, likely evolution. (4) Cost of connection according to ISP. (5) international call, communication cost as the price of telecommunication operators in force.

description: AnVICE is a VICE x64 port for Android. VICE is an emulator from VICE Team which emulates lots of Commodore computers. This port included the x64 portion which emulate a Commodore 64 (C64). IMPORTANT: Require your C64 ROM and Disk/Tape image to work, and make sure your sdcard can be accessed through /sdcard. Please check the general tips section for instruction. We appreciate any rating, comments and suggestions, but in case you need some answer, please check description below, check FAQ on homepage, or email us directly ( android.locnet@gmail.com ). This app is based on VICE and AnDOSBox, for GPL enquiries please email to developer. Features ======== - Support True Drive Emulation mode which greatly improve compatibility - Compatible with wide range of C64 Disk/Tape image format, like .d64, .prg, .tap - Convenient Unlock Speed mode for fast forward - Multiple savestates - Tape control - Customize VICE config file for advance configuration, such as changing palette - Work in Portrait or Landscape mode with free resize - Support Sound - Work with Software and Hardware keyboard - Support entering special keys like CBM, Run/Stop and Function keys - Built-in Virtual TrackPad and Virtual Joystick Known Issues ============ - On some device it failed to call out the software keyboard. In this case, try holding the "menu" hardware key, or turn on (menu->input mode->show keyboard fix). General Tips ============ - Put C64 and Drive ROM into a writable sdcard under folders named "c64" and "drives" respectively and place them side by side, e.g. /sdcard/vice/c64 and /sdcard/vice/drives. Get WinVICE for reference. - If have problem running some program, try turning on "True Drive Emulation" before emulation start. - Use "menu->buttons->show buttons" to check hidden buttons and joystick area. - Holding Special Keys onscreen button (Top Left) for Unlock Speed (Warp) mode. - Savestate will bind to the autostart disk/tape inserted BEFORE the emulator started, disk change after that will not change the binding. - To avoid accidental mouse click, switch to Joystick mode/Scroll Screen mode, or turn off "Tap screen as Click" from "menu->input mode". - Select change disk then press Back without selecing a disk file will eject a disk from the drive. - Use Right-Alt instead of Left-Alt (or turning off "menu->input mode->map left-alt key") to type special letters on physical keyboard. - To use D-Pad as keyboard arrows, make sure Joystick Keys is not in D-Pad mode ("menu->settings->joystick keys"). - To use Button Mapper, make sure Joystick Keys is disabled. - Edit sdl-vicerc located in /sdcard for advance configuration. - Use our "GameKeyboard" or "Flit Keyboard" with it's Extra Plugin as companion if needed. Joystick Tips ============= See FAQ in homepage. To input C64 specific keys ========================== See FAQ in homepage.
release_text: 1.0.5 -[new] add various screen resize options (Menu->Settings->Resize Option) For users looking for enhanced gaming keypad, please check out our "GameKeyboard" app. Latest version supports customizable virtual gamepad, physical-key re-mapping and user defined macro.

description: Localize seus familiares, seus veículos sem a necessidade de adquirir outros equipamentos especiais de rastreamento, utilizando apenas 2 aparelhos celulares com sistema Android. (Obs. O descritivo passo a passo de como funciona encontra-se no final da descrição). (ATENÇÃO: O aplicativo necessita da internet apenas para exibir o mapa) (ATENÇÃO: Caso o numero que você deseja enviar sua localização NÃO for LOCAL coloque o 0XX(Operadora) e o código de área, para que o aplicativo funcione corretamente.) (Caso for utilizar no veiculo coloque o celular no painel para não perder o sinal do GPS). Este aplicativo tem como objetivo fornecer as coordenadas de GPS em locais que não possui internet. Um sistema de localização programado. Assim quando você estiver com o modo viagem ativado o sistema enviara suas coordenadas via SMS para que os contatos selecionados saibam sua posição no mapa, os pontos onde você passou com data e hora e também as coordenadas de latitude e longitude. O usuário cadastra os números que ele quer que seja informado sua posição, o sistema ira capturar sua localização via GPS e ira enviar via SMS aos números cadastrados sua posição. O sistema automaticamente intercepta a mensagem e salva assim quando você quiser localizar alguém basta ir em localizar contatos e clicar no contato e selecionar ver localização no mapa e as posições do contato serão marcadas com bandeiras. Passo 1: clique em ver contatos selecionados para inserir o contato que receberá o SMS (nome e numero do telefone). Passo 2: clique em definir tempo de espera para envio do SMS. Passo 3: ativar modo viagem. Como visualizar as posições. Passo 1: clique em localizar contato. Passo 2: clique no contato que deseja visualizar. Passo 3: clique em ver localização no mapa (clique na bandeira e verá as coordenadas a data e a hora). Locate your family members, their vehicles without the need to purchase other special equipment tracking, using only 2 mobile devices with Android system. (Note The step by step description of how is the end of the description). (NOTE: The application requires only the Internet to view the map) (NOTE: If the number you want to send your location is NOT LOCAL put the 0XX (Operator) and the area code for the application to work correctly.)   (If you use the vehicle place the phone on the dashboard to not lose the GPS signal). This application aims to provide GPS coordinates for locations that do not have internet. A location system programmed. So when you are traveling with the mode enabled system coordinates sent via SMS to selected contacts know your position on the map, the points you spent with date and time and also the latitude and longitude. The user registers the numbers that he wants to be told their position, the system will capture your location via GPS and will send SMS to numbers registered its position. The system automatically intercepts the message and saved so when you want to find someone just go find contacts and click the contact and select to view the location map and the positions of the contact will be marked with flags. Step 1: Click to see selected contacts to enter the contact who will receive the SMS (name and phone number). Step 2: click to set timeout for sending SMS. Step 3: Activate way trip. Viewing positions. Step 1: click locate contact. Step 2: Click the contact you want to view. Step 3: click to see location on the map (click the banner and see the coordinates date and time).

description: Do you have device memory management issues? Do you want to get notification when newly installed app can be moved? Do you want to auto clear all applications cache on start-up? App Manager is smart app for smart users. App Manager helps you to manage applications easily by providing categorized application view as Movable, Internal, External and Installer There are many app management related apps, so why chose this one ? - It is simple and well designed. Try it. It's simply the best at what it does. Features: ★Manage applications separately, categorized as Movable, Internal and External ★Also view all applications together in a single list-view. ★Move installed applications to either internal or external storage via default android system settings ★Search and navigate to App Info never been easy before! App Manager made it easy and simple to search any installed application and it's information. ★Uninstall multiple applications easily ★Count app and data size used on external storage (only supported for Android 4+ devices) ★Install applications directly from the external media (SD card) ★Quick way to export all installed applications to the external media (SD card) ★One tap to clear all app cache ★Enable/Disable Notification to notify movable newly installed app ★Navigate to default battery info ★Sort apps in ascending or descending order based on it's name, data size, code size, cache size or total size ★View available and total storage space on internal (Phone) and external (SD card) media. ★Share app and it's Google Play link through Bluetooth, Email, Message, Whatsapp, Facebook, Twitter etc. Disclaimer: App Manager does not intended to copy licensed Apps. Note: * If app uses any of the following features, it cannot be installed on the external storage. * App Widgets, Services, Input Method Engines, Live Wallpapers, Live Folders, Alarm Services, Account Managers, Sync Adapters, Device Administrators. * No Notification Ads - we don't use any notification ads. * Movable feature does not works with devices: Galaxy S3, Note 2, Galaxy Nexus, Tablets

description: Speech Therapy for Apraxia-Words is a convenient, effective tool for: • children with Childhood Apraxia of Speech/dyspraxia • adults with apraxia • use by anyone working with individuals with apraxia, either therapists or parents • can also be used for traditional articulation practice Developed by the National Association for Child Development team, including a certified speech-language pathologist, this app practices articulation at the word level and is a logical follow-up to the original syllable-based app, Speech Therapy for Apraxia. This newer version provides choices of different patterns of articulation within words and moves through a progression of levels that challenge motor planning for speech. It begins at the production of single words with easier patterns of articulation and progresses through increasingly more difficult production sequences all the way to the production of sequences of random words. ::: Features :::: • Choose from 9 different word groups to target. • Words are categorized according to place of articulation of the phonemes and pattern of articulation within the word. • For each group, choose the level at which to practice. • Detailed instructions explain how to choose an appropriate word group and practice level. • Moves through a logical progression of 8 different levels for motor planning for speech. • Illustration and audio provided for each word. • Option to repeat levels, reset, or move to next level. • Can also be used for straight articulation drill for particular types of phonemes.

description: Home & Away is a personal monitoring service that connects you directly to response professionals via your cellular device during an emergency. • Home & Away lets you enjoy monitored protection, wherever you go • When you feel in danger, are injured, or need help for any reason, simply tap the app on your phone to activate Home & Away Monitoring. Your phone's live video, audio and GPS is transmitted to our UL-Listed central monitoring station, where professional, US-Based agents are waiting to assist you. Your phone's screen will display live chat-style text messaging with the agent. The agent can then initiate a voice call with you, text you, or alert the proper authorities- depending on what the situation calls for. Home & Away can only be activated by you, so there is no risk to your privacy. Protect yourself, your family or your company wherever life may take you. With Home & Away, help is only a tap away! • No More Wires. It’s Mobile • By installing the application on your mobile device and linking it to the Home & Away Monitoring Service, you enable direct, one-touch communication with a professional responder, including live video, audio, and GPS information. • 24/7 response System • Professionally trained, US-based responders are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week to provide you with immediate service and assist you though any emergency. Simply Tap the App or use the Zomm wireless panic button to get connected to the help you need, when you need it.

description: Free educational game for children aged 1 - 4 years from the series “Little One Learns Words”! Together with your child, you can watch wonderful images of different animals, all while learning their names and listen to the animals’ unique sounds! These carefully selected photographs allow your child to not only learn the names of the various animals, but also glimpse into the animal’s beautiful world and everything it offers! After your child looks over and experiences the animal flashcards, there is a fun game waiting for them, which tests how much they’ve understood. Regardless of the number of correct answers, the player earns stars and young talent is rewarded with thunderous applause and balloons! In the free app, the animals are divided into three groups: “domestic animals and pets”, “forest animals”, and “animals of the world” (animals that live in Asia, Africa, the Arctic, and Antarctic). Additional animals, like “birds”, “insects”, and “world of water” (fish and water-thriving animals), are available in the full version of the application. A significant feature of this app is that there are no unrealistic drawings. Instead, full-length beautiful pictures are used that resemble actual animals (as they look in real life), which helps the child easily remember their names and features. Do you have older children in primary school? If so, this educational game will also come in handy for them because in addition to English, the app supports German, Russian, and Ukrainian languages. Playing these types of games with flashcards has been proven to aid students in quickly learning a foreign language. They can discover new words and are able to easily impress their teachers and classmates! Your child doesn’t even need to know how to read with this app! Its simple interface and voice prompts allow even the youngest kid to play and learn the names of the animals by themselves! After playing the game, be sure to visit the zoo or pet store with your child – you’ll be happy and impressed as they present their newly acquired knowledge of all the animals they see! Experience has shown that for most children, viewing and learning from bright and vivid images becomes a favorite pastime and having them play this game often reinforces their knowledge. According to Glenn Doman, an American physical therapist and founder of the “The Institutes for The Achievement of Human Potential”, training just 5 - 10 minutes a day stimulates the development of various parts of the brain. This allows for the development of a photographic memory, which means your could can develop faster than her or his peers, and become more open to the vast knowledge of the world. Doman is undoubtedly right! The younger the child, the easier they absorb new information. Don’t delay!
release_text: Supports English, German, Russian, Ukrainian and Animal languages. Free version has 3 albums: "domestic animals", "forest animals" and "animals of world". In addition, full version includes: "Birds", "Insects" and "World of Water" albums.

description: *** This app does not work correctly with Android 4.4 (KitKat). *** Google changed the way timers work in KitKat, breaking the app. Please do NOT download this app if you are running Android 4.4 (KitKat) until I update it with a fix! The Run/Walk Intervals Timer (Timer) is a quick and easy way to enjoy your run/walk interval training while listening to music, enjoying the scenery, enjoying the company of others, and/or recording your run via GPS ... but NOT worrying about keeping track of your intervals. The Timer keeps track of those intervals for you! (The scenery, company of others and GPS NOT included ☺ ) After opening the application, set your desired times and intervals and press Start. The Timer keeps track of the time for each interval, how many intervals you have completed, and the overall time you have spent in the activity. When an alarm directs you to transition, the Timer will: sound ON: - Mute any music - Vibrate the phone (if selected) - Tell you to run, walk or cool down (as appropriate) - Return the music back to its original level sound OFF: - Vibrate the phone (if selected) - Display a note instructing you to run, walk or cool down (as appropriate) - During a phone conversation, the Timer will react to an alarm as if the sound is OFF. The conversation is not interrupted in any way. You can also use other applications without error while the Timer is running - all audible alarms will be played (sound ON) or notes will be displayed (sound OFF). For example, I use the Timer, Pandora, and My Tracks for testing. After starting the Timer you can Stop it. Once it is stopped, you are free to either Reset the application back to the default choices or Resume the training values previously setup. Resuming will begin everything exactly where you stopped it at with no loss of information or time. General application settings are available at Menu | Settings. It contains options for Text-To-Speech, Interval Announcements and the Vibrator. Select specific run settings on the Timer's main page by clicking on the appropriate edit or toggle button. Toggle buttons: - Toggle a warm up interval on or off - Toggle to run first or walk first (both the Running and Walking toggle buttons function like this) - Toggle to choose a specific number of interval sets or continue indefinitely - Toggle a cool down interval on or off Edit buttons: - Select the interval for the associated item - The 'Stop after' edit button allows you to select how many run / walk intervals you want prior to run completion or the cool down interval firing. If the sound does NOT work: The Timer uses Android's 'Notifications' audio stream so you must set the sound level for notifications on your phone: - While at the phone's home screen, click on the Menu button, then Settings. - In the Settings screen, click on the Sound category. - Click on the 'Volumes' or 'Set audio volume' entry. The entry may be different on your phone, you are looking for the 'Notifications' audio stream control. - Set the Notifications audio stream to its maximum. (Personally, I just max out all the audio volumes.) - There may also be a checkbox labeled "Use incoming call volume for notifications". If checked, RWI will use the incoming call volume instead of the notification volume. If you check it or leave it checked, set the incoming call volume to its maximum. - Your device may differ slightly from these instructions, but they should be close. - Click the back button until you get back to your Home screen. - Start the Timer and the sound should work properly. Thank you for using Run / Walk Intervals Timer and I hope it helps you to meet your fitness goals.
release_text: - Moved the the setup for Interval Sets to the Main page from the Cool Down setup page. - Refactored how RWI uses Google Analytics & updated it to GA v2.0 beta 5. - Updated Google AdMob Ads SDK to v6.4.1. - Refactored how RWI creates & uses the 4 different notifications - Warmup, Run, Walk, & Cool Down. - Removed Crittercism and ACRA & the READ_LOGS (read sensitive log data) permission they needed. - Bug fixes.

description: Cosmos Space Simulator is the best space simulator already created for Android! We focus our efforts and development team on bringing the best set of commands to our spaceship! So, the experience of flying on the infinity space is very accurate! The game simulates the spaceship, it`s engines, moving parts and all planets from our solar system! Become an astronaut! And explore the space at your will! The simulator is compatible with more than 5000 android devices! Features - Realtime Earth rotation. - You can watch the night becoming day, and day becoming night in different places of the planet! - All planets from solar system. - Realistic sun - Asteroids ring. - All planet moons! Some technology provided by Nasa: - Realist terrain using Nasa’s photos and elevation. - Realist texture for all planets from Nasa’s photos. - Using Nasa’s utility FoilSim 3 to calculate the physics of the spaceship (really realistic). - Using real airfoils from our library, the engines, rockets and trusters are very accurate. Real world simulation: - Weather forecast. - Turbulence and G-Force - Real clouds We are thinking about everything we can do to improve the space simulator experience! So please, feel free to contact us to give your feedback! Have a good trip astronaut!
