description: Hi, I’m a MewSim cat and I’m looking for someone to give me a name and cater to my every whim. That means keeping me fed with tasty treats, buying me a stereo or a radio-controlled helicopter, brushing my fur, keeping the fleas away and generally making sure I’m always happy. I think you’ll like my apartment. It’s a bit boring and dull right now, but if you look after me well enough I’ll let redecorate it to your taste. I’ve got two absorbing mini-games so we can have tons of fun! My friends tell me that I’m artistic and reckless by nature, and I think they’re right. I love to make funny faces and do crazy things! I’m full of surprises, as you’ll see if I decide to adopt you as my owner. If you want to be an important part of my life, to become my friend and provider, and to feed me with tasty meat, fish and ice-cream, then you’d better hurry up. I’m already starving! Yours sincerely, Your future MewSim Pet Cat. Key features: + An amusing and comically animated main character. + Nurture a uniquely talented pet. + Choose your MewSim’s color, name and sex to influence your cat’s personality and behavior. + Redecorate your MewSim’s home to your taste. + A wide range of in-game items to diversify the gameplay. + Two absorbing bonus mini-games. + Optimized for tablets with up to 1280x800 pix. resolution
release_text: null

description: Free yourself from your studio with Painter Mobile for Android. Experience this incredible new art app on your Android device. Sketch and paint on the go and then import your work directly into Painter to add the professional finishing touches. Now you can take your art to the streets and find new inspiration anytime, anywhere with Painter Mobile. • Access familiar tools, including: Paint, Eyedropper, Paint Bucket, Eraser and Crop • Transform your work, with the ability to Scale, Rotate, Flip, Skew, Apply Perspective or Distort • Take advantage of Horizontal, Vertical and Kaleidoscope symmetry • Work with up to 15* layers • Import photos from a gallery, camera or Google Images search • Save as JPEG and send documents to Corel Painter on the desktop (Upgrade to Full and also save to PNG or PSD) • Work quickly using two finger canvas rotation • Map functions to hardware keys or common gestures (long press and double-tap) • Use your finger to blend, navigate the canvas or select a color while you paint with your stylus • Use brush sets designed for artists • Work with a resolution of 1024 x 1024 or upgrade to Pro for 2048 x 2048 high definition* • Use real-world art tools, including: Pencils, Chalks, Charcoals, Pens, Markers, Calligraphy, Paintbrushes and Watercolors • Create unique effects with built-in Sprayers and Blenders • Choose from 16 brushes or upgrade to Full and get 70+ Natural-Media® brushes • Create and organize brush sets • Fine-tune control with a multitude of brush settings • Jitter nearly every attribute from brush size to brush color • Blend and mix colors naturally with the Blender Brushes • Experience life-like painting with pressure-sensitivity and stylus support • Work with a non-obtrusive interface for optimal drawing space • Optimized for the Wacom Cintiq Companion Hybrid and other stylus devices *Not available on some devices Thanks to Ivan McKinnon, Terri Cooper, Manuel Mendoza Reyes, Jeffrey Hebert, Emmanel Charon, Sathish B.R., Regina W, massimo, and Tiriasu for permitting us to use their amazing artwork.
release_text: -Fixed crashing on share in -Three finger gestures: tap to show / hide interface, slide up / down to change size -Save after 3-sec delay -Transform tool: tap to lock and unlock proportions -Fixed multiple crashing issues -Other minor bug fixes

description: 35 εκατομμύρια άνθρωποι δεν μπορεί να κάνουν λάθος! Βρείτε φθηνές πτήσεις γρήγορα με τη Skyscanner- την καλύτερη εφαρμογή αναζήτησης πτήσεων στον κόσμο. Πάνω από 35 εκατομμύρια άνθρωποι έχουν ήδη κατεβάσει τις υψηλής βαθμολογίας εφαρμογές μας. Γίνετε κι εσείς μέλος αυτής της παρέας! Συγκρίνετε εκατομμύρια πτήσεις και εκατοντάδες αεροπορικές εταιρείες σε δευτερόλεπτα. Skyscanner: είναι γρήγορη, ευέλικτη και δωρεάν! Πρέπει να βρείτε φθηνές πτήσεις καθ'οδόν; Εξοικονομήστε χρήματα και χρόνο με τη Skyscanner. Χάρη στο ευρύ φάσμα πτήσεων το οποίο καλύπτουμε, μπορείτε να αναζητήσετε εκατομμύρια πτήσεις από εκατοντάδες αεροπορικές εταιρείες ανά τον κόσμο - χαμηλού κόστους και προγραμματισμένες για να βρείτε τις ιδανικές πτήσεις στη φθηνότερη τιμή. Μόλις βρείτε τις πτήσεις σας, σας συνδέουμε με την αεροπορική εταιρεία ή το ταξιδιωτικό πρακτορείο για να αγοράσετε απευθείας και να λάβετε την καλύτερη προσφορά - όλα αυτά με μερικά κλικ. Δυνατότητες: Αναζήτηση "Οπουδήποτε" – θέλετε να αποδράσετε αλλά δεν ξέρετε για πού; Ας σας δώσουμε μερικές ιδέες. Φιλτράρετε τα αποτελέσματα ανά τιμή, κατηγορία θέσης, αεροπορική εταιρεία, ώρα απογείωσης και ώρα προσγείωσης. Προβολή γραφήματος: δείτε τιμές για ολόκληρη εβδομάδα ή μήνα Διατίθεται σε 30 γλώσσες Δημιουργήστε ένα εύχρηστο widget για να βλέπετε πρόσφατες τιμές για τις προηγούμενες αναζητήσεις σας
release_text: Παρουσίαση καρτών «Now Cards»: Τώρα μπορείτε να ενημερώνεστε για οποιεσδήποτε αλλαγές τιμών στο δρομολόγιο που παρακολουθείτε με τις νέες κάρτες Skyscanner Now Cards στην εφαρμογή Google! Για να ξεκινήσετε, δημιουργήστε μια Ειδοποίηση Τιμών στην εφαρμογή Πτήσεις Skyscanner και βεβαιωθείτε ότι έχετε κάνει εγκατάσταση της εφαρμογής Google στο τηλέφωνο ή στη συσκευή tablet σας.

description: Hotspot Manager manages all WiFi hotspots you want to share with your family, friends and colleagues or to use in different places. Beautiful widget simplifies hotspot toggling and switching to ONE SINGLE CLICK! Features: - Turns on/off WiFi hotspot in one single click (Beautiful Widget!). - Manages multiple WiFi hotspots for different scenarios. - Monitors all connected clients to your device. - WiFi auto recovery: WiFi state will be recovered if the hotspot is turned off (assuming either widget or the app to toggle). Ready? Get it to turn your phone/tablet into a powerful WiFi Router! NOTE: Some devices may not support hotspot or may not grant the app to manage the hotspot. Don't hesitate to send us feedback and let's make it an awesome app together. Comments from our users: "Brilliant! the only app i found supports multiple hotspots." "Good Hotspot Control App This is great thing to manage your Hotspot and see who are using/connected your Personal WI-FI Hotspot." "Simple and Easy, What is not to like?" Please follow us on twitter (@etustudio) for related apps update.
release_text: v1.2 Fix issues in Android - 5.0 Lollipop

description: Mon Calendrier Plus est une application pour vous aider à organiser vos rendez-vous importants, vos penses-bêtes et toutes les choses du quotidien : - Visualiser rapidement les rendez-vous à venir - Entrer facilement dans "Mon Calendrier Plus" le nom de vos événements, l'heure, la date et une couleur pour plus de clarté - Ajouter le widget à l'écran de votre téléphone pour garder un œil sur vos rendez-vous quotidiens - Supprimer et modifier vos événements en toute simplicité - Fonction des rappels et des notifications - Activation et désactivation des notifications pour vos rendez-vous en définissant l'heure des notifications - Présentation graphique et textuelle - Accéder à la vue par semaine pour visualiser l'ensemble de vos événements de façon verticale - 10 thèmes: (blanc et bleu, vert, orange, bleu clair, rose, violet, marron, jaune, noir et blanc, orange et turquoise) sont à votre disposition pour customiser votre calendrier selon vos envies - Effectuer des recherches par mots-clés - Importer des données depuis la carte SD - Exporter des données sur la carte SD - Une démonstration de l'utilisation du calendrier est disponible Astuce : Pour les utilisateurs de la version gratuite, assurez-vous d'avoir exporté au préalable vos données sur la carte SD avant de passer à version Mon Calendrier Plus. Nous sommes à l'écoute de toutes vos remarques intéressantes et vos suggestions qui pourraient faire évoluer l'application et prenons en compte celles-ci pour procéder à des améliorations. Si toutefois, malgré nos soins, vous rencontrez des problèmes, contactez nous à l'adresse e-mail suivante: nader.applis@gmail.com My Calendar Plus is an application to help you organize your important appointments, your think-beasts and all the everyday things: - View quickly go ahead - Enter easily in "My Calendar Plus" the name of your event, time, date and color for clarity - Add the widget to the screen of your phone to keep an eye on your daily appointments - Delete and edit your events with ease - Service reminders and notifications - Enabling and disabling notifications for your appointment setting time notifications - Graphic and textual - Access for a week to see all your events vertically - 10 subjects (white and blue, green, orange, light blue, pink, purple, brown, yellow, black and white, orange and turquoise) are available to customize your calendar according to your wishes - Research by keywords - Import data from SD card - Export data to SD card - A demonstration of the use of the calendar is available Tip: For users of the free version, make sure you have previously exported your data on the SD card before moving to version My Calendar Plus. We are listening to all your valuable comments and suggestions that could evolve the application and take into account them to make improvements. If, however, despite our care, you have problems, please contact us at the following email address: nader.applis @ gmail.com

description: Try something new! Become a public transport tycoon and enjoy this nontraditional strategy and time management game. Play through the history from 1960 up to 2020, buy many of different trams, upgrade the stations and find the best strategy to achieve all trophies in time. Citizens expect comfort trams and this is important - do not let them order a taxi! Each tram offers specific number of capacity, price and XP points for each transported passenger. City is changing each level so you will need your brain. Be a smart director and organize your pocket tram imperium wisely. Tired of tons of confusing tables during growing your virtual business yet? This simulator is really easy to control, tutorial is short and clever so you will enjoy the challenge in the first early moments. Time is running... wake up the drivers, turn on the lights in your trains and put them on the railway! Get this game and transport them all!
release_text: - Engine optimization

description: Break Down Game is a fun block matching game! Click on blocks of 2 or more of the same type to collapse them, as quickly as you can, before they overflow the board. The more blocks you remove at one click, the higher the score you get. In Unlimited Mode, you can play for unlimited time until the board is fully filled by the blocks. More type of blocks will come as you progress. In 50 Taps Mode, you can tap only 50 times. Try to get the best score within these taps. In TImed Mode, you have 2 minutes. Try to collapse the blocks as quickly as you can. 1 second is added to the timer when you collapse 4 or more blocks. In Crash Mode, the whole board is filled when you start. Try to collapse all the blocks to get the best score. Features: - 4 Different Modes. - 6 Types of Blocks to choose from.
release_text: null

app_name: WorldCard Mobile - 名刺認識管理
description: 写真を撮って、連絡先を加える。それだけ! 手入力不要。タイプミスなし。連絡先の混乱がなくなります。 ◆受賞歴◆ WorldCard MobileはCTIA E-Tech賞受賞アプリ。 「WorldCard Mobileは、名刺ラベルが速記を使用している場合でさえ、ファックスやモバイルの番号を正確に読み取って分類した」 - Bob Tedeschi、New York Times - この名刺管理は、携帯電話開発メーカー (HTCなど)、電気通信会社 (CHT / Taiwanmobileなど)、CRM開発メーカー (JustSystemなど) に採用された。2000万以上のユーザーがこの素晴らしいアプリを採用した。 ◆解説◆ スマートフォンのための最高の名刺読み取りアプリWorldCard Mobileは、OCR (光学文字認識) 技術を利用して、名刺の情報をユーザー自身の連絡先情報に即座に転送します。カメラをクリックするだけいいので、名刺やEメール署名の連絡情報を手入力する必要がありません。 最新版は、バッチスキャンカード機能を提供します。高速認識を体感してください。 ◆なぜWorldCard Mobileなのか◆ ★いついかなる時も名刺をキャッチ★ - スマートフォンのカメラで名刺イメージをキャッチ。バッチスキャンカードをサポートし認識します。 認識言語: 日本語、英語 認識した情報を、名前、肩書き、会社、電話番号、ファックス番号、住所、その他のフィールドで分類。 ★管理と連絡が簡単★ 名刺入れ機能で連絡先情報を閲覧・管理。連絡先に直接、電話をかけたりSMSやEメールを送ったりできます。 住所を検索して、地図機能で直接にチェックできます。 Facebook、LinkedIn、Twitterで連絡先を見つけよう。ソーシャルネットワークと職業的ネットワークを広げよう。 ★ビジネスのためのスマートな機能★ Eメールの署名をコピーして、連絡者リストに追加。 連絡先情報を電話連絡情報、Google contacts、Exchange contactsにエクスポート。簡単なバックアップを体感してください。 WorldCardソフトウェアをインストールしたコンピュータやモバイル機器と連絡先データを交換。 ============================ Take a picture. Add a contact. That's it! No manual entries. No typos. No more confusion in your contacts. ◆Application Awards◆ - WorldCard Mobile reaches TOP 10 app in 194 countries' APP Store. - WorldCard Mobile wins CTIA E-Tech Awards. - "For scanning business cards onto your iPhone, WorldCard Mobile stands out" by Macworld. - Winner of the 2010 MOBI Award “Best Mobile App OCR” - "WorldCard Mobile accurately read and sorted fax and mobile numbers, even when the cards labels used short-hand" - Bob Tedeschi, New York Times - The business card management is adopted by mobile phone developer (such as HTC), telecommunications company (such as CHT / Taiwanmobile) and CRM developer (such as JustSystem). Over 20 million users adopt this great app. ◆App Description◆ WorldCard Mobile, the leading business card scanning application for smartphone, uses OCR (Optical Character Recognition) technology to instantly transfer information from business cards to the user's native contacts. With a simple click of the camera, you no longer have to manually input contact info from business cards or email signatures. The newest version provides batch scan card function. Let you enjoy high-speed recognition. ◆Why WorldCard Mobile◆ ★Capture business card anytime & anywhere★ - Capture business card images with smartphone's camera. Besides, also support batch scan card and recognize. - Recognition languages: English and Japanese. - Sort recognized information by name, position, company, phone number, fax number, address, or other fields. ★Manage & contact easily★ - View and manage contact information with Card Holder function. Make a phone call, send SMS and email to your contacts directly. - Search the address and check with map function directly. - Find your contacts on Facebook, LinkedIn and Twitter. Expand your social and professional networks. ★Smart function for your business★ - Copy Email signature and add it to your contact lists. - Export contact information to Phone contacts, Google or Exchange contacts. Let you backup easily. - Exchange contact data with your computers or mobile devices which installed WorldCard software.
release_text: [4.3 - 20150212] 1.Improvement - Dock Mode 2.Improvement - Sync Gmail contacts 3.You can use Traditional Chinese and Simplified Chinese to search whole Chinese data. 4.Bug fixes [4.2 - 20140829] 1. Bug fix - Index 2. Bug fix - Image matching 3. Bug fix - Kernel of recognition

description: COMPLETELY FREE!! NO ADVERTISEMENTS!! NO RESTRICTIONS!! • Transfer as many files of any sizes without any restrictions or cost at mind boggling speeds. • Sharable is the only app that enables you to quickly send & share videos, photos and music across different devices (Android, iPhone, iPad, Mac & PC, all are supported), over a wireless network or a WIFI hotspot. • Transfer large files (e.g. full length, high quality videos) between supported devices (Android, iPhone, iPad, Mac & PC) at blazing speeds without connecting any wires or advanced setups. • Simply install and run Sharable on your devices and start transferring & sharing. HOW IS IT BETTER THAN OTHER APPS. ---------------------------------- 1. CROSS PLATFORM: Can you share a photo from your android phone with an iphone without the internet? Now you can. Share Photos, images and music all seamlessly between Android, iphone, tabs and desktops. 2. NO DATA TRANSFER COSTS: Unlike other apps. Sharable does not use the internet to transfer files. Your local WIFI is free and that’s what we use to transfer files. 3. NO NETWORK STORAGE LIMITATION: Unlike other apps. you are only limited by the free space a available on your device. 4. FASTER THAN BLUETOOTH: Sharable uses the standard WIFI protocol to share files. This makes it faster than any Bluetooth transfer. 5. FASTER THAN DROPBOX: Faster transfers of even large video files. 6. NO MORE WIRES: Transfer any file without any hassle. All you want is a WIFI environment. 7. MORE THAN A USB PEN DRIVE: Now your smart phone is also a USB pen drive.
release_text: Greetings people !! Sharable now has a new set of features for tablet and smartphone to make sharing easier !! - UI changes - Minor bugs fixes Regards Sharable team (contact@sharable.in)

description: How creative are you ? Try 2 Buttons to test yourself ! On each unique level you will face a screen which you have to pass using the red and blue buttons. The game features highly graphical 25 different levels which may surprise you at times (!) Each level will respond to a certain functionality of the buttons, which you will have to find out what it is in order to pass it. The higher the level, the more creative you will have to get to figure out the trick behind it. Getting frustrated ? You can always click on the blue or red hint buttons at the top of the screen, which will maybe help you to get the solution. More levels will be available with future updates. Good Luck !
release_text: null

description: A Live Wallpaper inspired from the stock Android, Phase Beam Live Wallpaper. The wallpaper makes use of the 3D Parallax effect using the gyroscope. Features - Phase Beam theme - 3D Parallax effect - Multiple Screens - Tablet support - High performance OpenGL graphics rendering Instructions to set: Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live Wallpapers Please note that for the parallax effect to be activated, your device needs to be equipped with a gyroscope.
release_text: - Improved visual result - Updated core engine

description: Robot Dance Party, the first mobile rhythm game of its kind, challenges you to assemble your own quirky robot out of a mash-up of scavenged parts in order to compete against other robots in mini rhythm dance battles. The parts you choose not only affect the look and personal style of your Dance Bots, but they determine how you dance, making for fun and entertaining gameplay. After a long day of performing repetitive tasks for humans, robots just want to let off some steam on the dance floor. As the rhythmic beat penetrates their sensors, a competitive spark shocks the room into rival dance battles. These Dance Bots have a knack for crafting new dance styles and unique movement based on their customized assembly. Get ready to dance your nuts and bolts off. It’s the year of the robot! ☆ Build Your Bot and Your Boogie – Customize your robot with different parts for the head, arms, torso and legs. Mix and match the parts that have a built-in magnetism for certain songs to score maximum points. ☆ Dance Til You Short Circuit – Get down in solo mode, throw down in player versus player competitions, and relive your glory with instant replays sharable on Facebook. ☆ Bust a Move – Pull off a perfect dance sequence and backup dancers will slide in to boost your score. Go wild in freestyle mode and finish the dance with your own personalized strike-a-pose stance. ☆ Collect Special Dance Moves – Score big to unlock special dance moves that can be performed with a little rewiring, such as the Helicopter, the Spacewalk, Go Bananas, and of course, the Robot. Collect these moves and many more to show up the competition.
release_text: -Re-assessed Salvage Bot's sorting algorithm to improve Part Sorting in the Junkyard -Improved Battle stability and functionality -Plus, Exterminator Bot fumigated the factory and got rid of several pesky bugs

description: Release Campaign Only now drastically reduce [About this game] Tank Fighting Game, the highly popular downloadable game for Nintendo 3DS, is now available on your smartphone. Control your tank using the cursor on the screen. Fire by touching the desired point on the screen. With this intuitive operation, anyone can play the game. Easy rules: players must destroy all enemy tanks in a stage to complete the stage. Enemies attack with a variety of weapons, including normal shots, ricochets, guided missiles, mortars, and more. The player's power-type tank is equipped with charge shots that destroy and go through walls! Speed-type tanks are agile, faster than missiles!?, and capable of jumping over enemy missiles (jumping tanks!). Set in the near-future, this action shooter tank battle game lets players experience the hottest battle action they've ever seen! [Mission] Two different mission levels are available in this game. The player can start from either level. - Normal Mission: Standard level mission for beginners and intermediate players. Includes 50 stages. Start playing with this mission. - Extra Mission: Advanced level mission for those who complete the Normal Mission. Includes 20 stages. Complete this mission to become a Touch Battle Tank Master. [Player Tanks] - Power-type (Blue tank): Heavily armed and armored; fires magnum charge shots. It is suited for beginners. Fires rounds that intercept enemy rounds and destroys blocks (green) with charge shots. Attack power: 2 Life: 5 - Speed-type (Red tank): Weak attack and armor, but agile with rapid-fire shooting. It is suited for advanced players. Slips between enemy rounds and fires shots that ricochet off walls. Touch two points on the screen at the same time to jump to avoid enemy rounds. Attack power: 1 Life: 3 [Enemies] - Normal type (Green enemies): Fires normal rounds. Attack power: 1 Life: 1 - Ricochet type (Red enemies): Fires rounds that ricochet off walls. Attack power: 1 Life: 2 - 3D type (White enemies): Fires rounds in three-directions at once. Attack power: 1 Life: 4 - Rapid-fire type (Blue enemies): Fires rapid-fire rounds. Attack power: 1 Life: 3 - Guided rounds type (Orange enemies): Fires guided rounds that always follow the player's tank. Attack power: 1 Life: 2 - Intercept rounds type (Black enemies): Fires intercept rounds that go through any obstacle. If the player's tank is close to the explosion when this round lands, the tank suffers one damage even if the player avoids a direct hit. Attack power: 3 Life: 5 - Boss type (Giant enemy): A giant enemy tank. The color indicates the attack method, which is the same as normal-size tanks of the same color. If the player's tank comes into contact with this tank, the player's tank will be crushed. Attack power: 3 Life: 10 *Customers using HTC series When you use the HTC gestures, the game will not be able to play normally. Please play off the HTC gestures.

description: 3D Fly Plane is a 3D Toy Plane Simulation Game, Control the RC Plane and fly it around the room, fly through the waypoints then land in the final waypoint to complete the level, watch out for obstacles and watch your battery! If you take too long the RC Plane will run out of power and crash into the ground!

description: Funny Mirrors is the easiest face changer ever: just move your face in the mirror view and tap the camera button when you have a funny shot. Back camera is also available in case you prefer to "customize" your friend's face. You can browse face warp mirrors using the arrow buttons or by swiping. Pictures are automatically saved into Gallery. You can easily share your pictures with friends using any service.

app_name: Voice Widget for SMS and WApp
description: Write WhatsApp by Voice Widget lets you dictate a message to WhatsApp or record a voice message in the simplest possible way. It also lets you write SMS by voice. After installing, simply select one of the available widgets and add it to your home screen. You can also configure the speech-to-text language. Main Features ** Write Whatsapp by voice - record a message and send it as text, plus edit texts if needed, using the automatic correction helper ** Write SMS by voice - for SMS typer ** Voice recording - send a new voice message ** Widget selection - select theme from a variety of widgets for recording and/or speech-to-text Free vs. Unlimited Version -- Pro Version - upgrade to un-lock pro widget version - the upgrade version is ad free plus it enables unlimited messaging. You can un-lock the pro after installing the app. Important Notes -- Unofficial Product. This application is not endorsed by or affiliated with WhatsApp Inc. & Messenger. Its name, trademark, and other aspects of the app are trademarked and owned by their respective owners. This app is also not related to recently announced WhatsApp with voice call. -- No emoticons - emoticons cannot be added in speech-to-text messages. --------------------------------------- Your feedback is important. Contact us at: info@twiize.com media: www.twiize.com/media

description: Easy to use free simple mathematical calculator with eMail Out function. Localized to: English, Japanese, German, Spanish Functions: Add, subtract, multiply, divide. The M functions act more like a clipboard. The last 3 calculations are displayed in the blue display. Use the @-Button to send your calculation to an eMail account. Operator precedence including brackets/parentheses will be evaluated correctly. The internet access right is used for advertising only. THE calculator for kids girls boys women and men. Use it at home, in the office, at study, at school, on holidays, simply everywhere. For a more complex calculator check out my other apps like Pink Calculator. The calculator has been intensive tested. However, no warranty for the correctness of calculations. If you find any errors or have any ideas for improvements, please report them, thank you

description: "TVBS首部原創概念劇《飛越龍門客棧》APP上線！ 一樁驚動全國的爆炸案，牽扯出20年前的風風雨雨 一座臥虎藏龍的暗黑之城，交錯著四名男女的愛恨情慾 誰，能全身而退？ 《飛越龍門客棧》APP將帶領你走入最神秘的龍門境地，一窺城寨的愛恨情仇，與演員即時互動，掌握第一線的龍門秘辛！ 創造能見度高、差異化的突破。 本劇的題材來自於華人世界中赫赫有名、令人難以忘懷的徐克武俠電影《新龍門客棧》，將這個經典的故事框架移到現代的時空，但保留了每個經典人物的性格，與他們之間因為性格廻異而產生的互動及火花。 故事從一場爆炸案開始 國家慶典前一天，首相突然失蹤了，與他最後接觸的安全局長邱啟賢於是成了嫌疑犯。邱啟賢的女兒、同樣為安全局一員的邱默語為了替父親洗刷冤屈，帶著首相女兒艾心至「龍門城寨」，希望能找到證據替證明父親清白。 邱默語的青梅竹馬周懷安原在國外受訓，為此趕回國同樣到了「龍門城寨」。城寨的主人金湘玉，一個風騷多情身上充滿秘密的女人，加上西區警探小刀，這四人聚首於「龍門城寨」，將發展出一段愛恨情仇。 究竟誰才是綁架首相的兇手？四人感情如何糾葛？ 《飛越龍門客棧》─TVBS即將為您呈現……" *「目前本APP尚未支援平板」
release_text: 1. 修正Android系統部分機型使用「龍門諜影」功能時，鏡頭翻轉會導致APP終止之錯誤。 2. 推播功能更新。

description: Squash Bugs! This fun and addicting game will have you frantically squishing and smashing bugs against the clock. Each progressively harder level has a different mix of bugs to smash including different types of flies, spiders, dragon flies, beetles, ants, inch worms, caterpillars, butterflies, bees, lady bugs, and more! The more bugs you get in a row, the more "rage" you generate to kill even more bugs! And get power-ups like a big hand, double hands and nuke bugs! You can also squash bugs just for fun without caring about the levels or score. Put the game in "kids mode" to keep your little ones occupied without worrying that they will accidentally hit the menu buttons or having to deal with level goals. This game has a Halloween theme with spooky sounds, pumpkins, and even ghosts to try and get! Play this game year round to squash bugs anytime, and enjoy the scary sound effects! The lite (and free) version allows you to try out the game by squashing many of the bugs available. The full version adds progressively harder levels with goals, and more bug behaviors to deal with.
release_text: More new bonus levels. Big time performance improvements. Improved game play and bug fixes.

description: Everyone started going insane. It happens at this cold faraway places. When you were first given the job to work as a scientist on the South Pole you cheered with joy. If you could only see yourself now. Bad weather is coming; your company sent a rescue helicopter to get your team out. It appears that your mad colleagues decided to lock you up and leave you here. You need to find a way to get to the rescue point quickly! Use your wit and explore the station, to find means for your escape.
release_text: Small bug fixes.

description: This app allows residents of Ottawa to instantly check the current garbage calendar for their area. - Automatically finds your garbage calendar based on GPS location or street address. - Notifications the day before to remind you which items will be picked up. - Easily see which bins are collected, and when garbage collection is delayed (ie: holidays) Feedback and feature requests are welcomed!
release_text: Version 1.2: - API changed on me without notice, which broke the initial garbage zone lookup! This should now be fixed. Version 1.1: - Fixed faulty garbage schedules that were caused by special Christmas tree collections. Version 1: - Initial release!

description: *Parents' Choice Award Winner!* Swing with orangutans, swim with dolphins and tap along with woodpeckers in the ultimate adventure app from the hit PBS KIDS show, WILD KRATTS! Features: •30 overall levels •Over 60 stickers and “Wow facts” •Kids can take their own creature power “selfies” •An Orangutan creature power game that lets kids tilt their device back and forth to imitate the swing of the Orangutan. •A Woodpecker creature power game that lets kids imitate the strong beak of the woodpecker by tapping on trees to listen and find beetles. •A Dolphin creature power suit game that lets kids swim and jump with dolphins as they tilt their device to clean up trash in the ocean. Children ages 4 to 8 can tilt and tap their way through multi-level games that encourage exploration of habitats around the world. Focusing on science, each game lets kids observe, explore and use creature power suits to complete missions and help the Kratt Brothers. As levels are completed, kids earn creature power “selfies,” habitat stickers and “Wow! Facts” that help further their animal science and natural history learning. Wild Kratts World Adventure is based on the PBS KIDS series WILD KRATTS, produced by the Kratt Brothers Company and 9 Story Entertainment, and designed to extend the series’ science curriculum. For more learning adventures with WILD KRATTS, visit pbskids.org/wildkratts. For more apps from PBS KIDS, visit http://to.pbs.org/kidsapps . About PBS KIDS Wild Kratts World Adventure is part of PBS KIDS’ ongoing commitment to helping kids build the skills they need to succeed in school and in life. PBS KIDS, the number one educational media brand for kids, offers all children the opportunity to explore new ideas and new worlds through television and digital media, as well as community-based programs. Privacy Across all media platforms, PBS KIDS is committed to creating a safe and secure environment for children and families and being transparent about what information is collected from users. To learn more about PBS KIDS’ privacy policy, visit pbskids.org/privacy.
release_text: This update fixes the sound issues. Please update to hear all audio. Thank you for your patience while we fixed this issue!

description: Extremely easy to set timer / alarm. Quickly set it for a specific time or for a few minutes / hours in the future; all with a simple swipe of the finger. The widget will show you when the timer is going to fire along with the notification in the notification bar.
release_text: New to 3.1 Lots of enhancements for Android 4.1 and higher. * Now count down time remaining in cancel dialog * Better notification with Quick Add to easily add more time * Updated UI

description: Smart Timeout allows you to specify apps that will keep the screen / display on. Once there are no specified apps visible on the screen the normal screen timeout is enabled. Works great while reading articles in web browsers, email, or any app you specify. You'll no longer need to worry about touching the screen to prevent the screen from sleeping, dimming or timing out. If you have any issues or have a feature suggestion please email: androidtouchdev [at] gmail.com Thank you!
